Yes Man.tagline: A guy challenges himself to say "yes" to everything for an entire year.

Gremlins.tagline: A boy inadvertantly breaks 3 important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

Batman Forever.tagline: Batman must battle Two-Face and The Riddler with help of an amourous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

Snatch..tagline: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

Cradle 2 the Grave.tagline: A jewel thief's daughter is kidnapped after he steals a collection of prized black diamonds, which aren't at all what they seem.

production.name: N1 European Film Produktions GmbH & Co. KG

The Order.tagline: A young priest is sent to Rome to investigate the troubling death of the head of his order.

Paulie.tagline: Life from a parrot's point of view.

Under Siege.tagline: A former SEAL, now cook, is the only person who can stop a gang of terrorists when they seize control of a US Navy battleship.

The Ice Storm.tagline: 1973, suburban Connecticut: middle class families experimenting with casual sex, drink, etc., find their lives out of control.

Hero (new).tagline: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.

Private Parts.tagline: The auto-biographical story of Howard Stern, the radio-rebel who is now also a TV-personality, an author and a movie star.

Flyboys.tagline: The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots.

Eight Legged Freaks.tagline: A variety of horrible poisonous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.

Mongol: The Rise of Genghis Khan.tagline: The story recounts the early life of Genghis Khan who was a slave before going on to conquer half the world including Russia in 1206.

Lorenzo's Oil.tagline: A boy develops a disease so rare that nobody is working on a cure, so his father decides to learn all about it and tackle the problem himself.

The Beautiful Country.tagline: After reuniting with his mother in Ho Chi Minh City, a family tragedy causes Binh to flee from Viet Nam to America. Landing in New York, Binh begins a road trip to Texas, where his American father is said to live.

The Return.tagline: Joanna Mills, a traveling business woman, begins having nightmares of a murder that occurred 15 years ago. Soon she is drawn to an old farmhouse, where the murder took place.

1492: Conquest of Paradise.tagline: Christopher Columbus' discovery of the Americas and the effect this has on the indigenous people.

Jungle Fever.tagline: Friends and family of a married black architect react in different ways to his affair with an Italian secretary.

Witchboard.tagline: A woman (Kitaen) finds an interest in her friend Brandon's Ouija Board when he brings it by her party.

Pale Rider.tagline: A mysterious preacher protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

Blade.tagline: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

The Apostle.tagline: After his happy life spins out of control, a preacher from Texas changes his name, goes to Louisiana and starts preaching on the radio.

DOA: Dead or Alive.tagline: The movie adaptation of the best selling video game series Dead or Alive.

Living in Oblivion.tagline: Film about filmmaking. It takes place during one day on set of non-budget movie. Ultimate tribute to all independent filmmakers.

Domestic Disturbance.tagline: A divorced father discovers that his 12-year-old son's new stepfather is not what he made himself out to be.

The Squid and the Whale.tagline: Based on the true childhood experiences of Noah Baumbach and his brother, The Squid and the Whale tells the touching story of two young boys dealing with their parents' divorce in Brooklyn in the 1980s.

Hercules.tagline: The son of the Greek Gods Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

The Benchwarmers.tagline: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children baseball squads.

Guess Who.tagline: A sarcastic father (Mac) has plenty to say about his daughter wanting to marry a white boy (Kutcher).

Go.tagline: Go! tells the story of the events after a drug deal, told from three different points of view.

Christopher Columbus: The Discovery.tagline: Genoese navigator overcomes intrigue in the court of King Ferdinand and Queen Isabella of Spain and gains financing for his expedition to the East Indies.

production.name: N1 European Film Produktions GmbH & Co. KG

Kinsey.tagline: A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey, a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication "Sexual Behavior in the Human Male" was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.

Kingpin.tagline: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

Dancer in the Dark.tagline: An east European girl goes to America with her young son, expecting it to be like a Hollywood film.

Evan Almighty.tagline: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.

Clerks..tagline: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

Tape.tagline: Three old high school friends pass the time in a Michigan motel room dissecting the painful memories of their high school years.

Gridiron Gang.tagline: Teenagers at a juvenile detention center, under the leadership of their counselor, gain self-esteem by playing football together.

Teen Wolf Too.tagline: Todd Howard is a struggling teenager. Nothing seems to be going very well for him, until he turns into a wolf.

Shocker.tagline: After being sent to the electric chair, a serial killer uses electricity to come back from the dead and carry out his vengeance on the football player who turned him in to the police.

Before Sunrise.tagline: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

Bull Durham.tagline: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

Spun.tagline: An out-of-control speed freak (Schwartzman) is introduced his drug of choice's creator (Rourke) by his dealer (Leguizamo). A massive three-day adventure ensues (with Fugit, Murphy, and Suvari in tow).

Looney Tunes: Back in Action.tagline: The Looney Tunes search for a man's missing father and the mythical Blue Monkey diamond.

Bedtime Stories.tagline: A family comedy about a hotel handyman whose life changes when the lavish bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to magically come true.

X-Men: The Last Stand.tagline: When a cure is found to treat mutations, lines are drawn amongst the X-Men, led by Professor Charles Xavier, and the Brotherhood, a band of powerful mutants organized under Xavier's former ally, Magneto.

Gosford Park.tagline: Multiple storylined drama set in 1932, showing the lives of upstairs guest and downstairs servants at a party in a country house in England.

The Texas Chainsaw Massacre.tagline: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding killer and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

The Arrival.tagline: Zane, an astronomer discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it.

How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days.tagline: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days. Andie Anderson covers the "How To" beat for "Composure" magazine and is assigned to write an article on "How to Lose a Guy in 10 days." They meet in a bar shortly after the bet is made.

Made.tagline: Two aspiring boxers, lifelong friends, get involved in a money-laundering scheme through a low-level organized crime group.

Funny Games.tagline: Two psychopathic young men take a family hostage in their cabin.

White Oleander.tagline: A teenager journeys through a series of foster homes after her mother goes to prison for committing a crime of passion.

The Other Sister.tagline: A mentally challenged girl proves herself to be every bit as capable as her "perfect" sister when she moves into an apartment and begins going to college.

Bloody Sunday.tagline: A dramatization of the Irish civil rights protest march and subsequent massacre by British troops on January 30, 1972.

How to Deal.tagline: A teenager (Moore), disillusioned by too many examples of love gone wrong, refuses to believe that true love exists. Then this new guy (Ford) comes along...

Bulletproof (new).tagline: Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Years later the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.

Knocked Up.tagline: For fun loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant.

The Cable Guy.tagline: A lonely and disturbed cable guy raised on television just wants a new friend, but his target, a designer, rejects him, with bad consequences.

X-Men.tagline: Two mutants come to a private academy for their kind whose resident superhero team must oppose a terrorist organization with similar powers.

Can't Hardly Wait.tagline: Multicharacter teenage comedy about high school graduates with different agenda of life on graduation night.

Mulan.tagline: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

Maid in Manhattan.tagline: A senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.

The Day After Tomorrow.tagline: Jack Hall, paleoclimatologist, must make a daring trek across America to reach his son, trapped in the cross-hairs of a sudden international storm which plunges the planet into a new Ice Age.

The Assassination of Jesse James by the.tagline: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

Breaking In.tagline: Professional thief Ernie takes Mike on as an apprentice, but while Mike clearly has "larceny in his heart", it will take him a long time to get as good as Ernie.

Sideways.tagline: Two men reaching middle age with not much to show but disappointment, embark on a week long road trip through California's wine country, just as one is about to take a trip down the aisle.

The Bonfire of the Vanities.tagline: After his mistress runs over a young teen, a Wall Street hotshot sees his life unravel in the spotlight, and attracting the interest of a down and out reporter.

Good Boy!.tagline: An intergalactic dog pilot from Sirius (the dog star), visits Earth to verify the rumors that dogs have failed to take over the planet.

Do the Right Thing.tagline: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

Bingo.tagline: A runaway circus dog befriends a young boy who has trouble fitting in with his friends.

Syriana.tagline: A politically-charged epic about the state of the oil industry in the hands of those personally involved and affected by it.

Masters of the Universe.tagline: A prince turned warrior named He-Man battles against the dark lord Skeletor on the planet Eternia. He-Man and his comrades arrive on Earth and discover two teenage lovers to find the magical Cosmic Key.

Life Stinks.tagline: A filthy rich businessman bets a corporate rival that he can live on the streets of L.A. without the comforts of home or money, which proves to be tougher than he thought.

Oliver Twist.tagline: An adaptation of the classic Dickens tale, where an orphan meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

Agent Cody Banks.tagline: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

Cadillac Records.tagline: Chronicles the rise of Chess Records and its recording artists.

Drop Zone.tagline: A tough cop teams up with a professional skydiver to capture a renegade computer hacker on the run from the law.

The Serpent and the Rainbow.tagline: An anthropologist goes to Haiti after hearing rumors about a drug used by black magic practitioners to turn people into zombies.

Tristram Shandy: A Cock and Bull Story.tagline: Director Michael Winterbottom (Northam) attempts to shoot the adaptation of Laurence Sterne's essentially unfilmable novel, "The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman."

Birthday Girl.tagline: A thirtysomething bank clerk from St Albans has his small-town life exploded by the arrival of his Russian mail-order bride.

Guarding Tess.tagline: A former First Lady of the US wants a particular Secret Service agent to head her bodyguard detail, even though he can't stand her.

Mobsters and Mormons.tagline: A mafia family from New Jersey is placed in the witness relocation program to an all-Mormon community in Utah.

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. Produktions KG

The Wedding Planner.tagline: Mary Fiore is San Francisco's most successful supplier of romance and glamor. She knows all the tricks. She knows all the rules. But then she breaks the most important rule of all: she falls in love with the groom.

A Little Princess.tagline: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.

Half Baked.tagline: The story of three not so bright men who come up with a series of crazy schemes to get a friend out of jail.

Joy Ride.tagline: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychotic killer.

Ghost World.tagline: With only the plan of moving in together after high school, two unusually devious friends seek direction in life. As a mere gag, they respond to a man's newspaper ad for a date, only to find it will greatly complicate their lives.

Scrooged.tagline: A cynically selfish TV executive gets haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

Drive Me Crazy.tagline: A high school girl must find a substitute date to escort her to the prom.

Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid.tagline: A scientific expedition sets out for Borneo to seek a flower called the Blood Orchid, which could grant longer life. Meanwhile, they run afoul of snakes and each other.

Inspector Gadget.tagline: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

The Mission.tagline: 18th century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American Indian tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.

The Upside of Anger.tagline: When her husband unexpectedly disappears, a sharp-witted suburban wife and her daughters juggle their mom's romantic dilemmas and family dynamics.

Con Air.tagline: A newly released ex-con and former US Ranger finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

Money Talks.tagline: Sought by police and criminals, a small-time huckster makes a deal with a TV newsman for protection.

Caramel.tagline: A romantic comedy centered on the daily lives of five Lebanese women living in Beirut.

The Man from Elysian Fields.tagline: A failed novelist's inability to pay the bills strains relations with his wife and leads him to work at an escort service where he becomes entwined with a wealthy woman whose husband is a successful writer.

Jason X.tagline: Jason Voorhees returns with a new look, a new machete, and his same murderous attitude as he is awakened on a spaceship in the 25th century.

Night Watch.tagline: A fantasy-thriller set in present-day Moscow where the respective forces that control daytime and nighttime do battle.

Tarzan and the Lost City.tagline: Tarzan returns to his homeland of Africa to save his home from destruction.

Vampires.tagline: A vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to endure sunlight.

production.name: Kumar Mobiliengesellschaft mbH & Co. Projekt Nr. 2 KG

Barnyard.tagline: When the farmer's away, all the animals play ... and sing, and dance. Eventually, though, someone has to step in and run things, a responsibility that ends up going to Otis, a carefree cow.

The Blob.tagline: A strange lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.

Step Up 2: The Streets.tagline: Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.

National Treasure: Book of Secrets.tagline: Benjamin Gates must follow a clue left in John Wilkes Booth's diary to prove his ancestor's innocence in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.

A.I. Artificial Intelligence.tagline: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

Evita.tagline: The hit musical based on the life of Evita Duarte, a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Perón, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

Reindeer Games.tagline: After assuming his dead cellmate's identity to get with his girlfriend, an ex-con finds himself the reluctant participant in a casino heist.

Shakespeare in Love.tagline: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

Poolhall Junkies.tagline: A talented pool hustler who has stayed out of the game for years, must go back to his old ways when his little brother gets involved with his enemy, the very man who held him back from greatness.

Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story.tagline: A lionized account of the life of the martial arts superstar.

16 Blocks.tagline: An aging cop is assigned the ordinary task of escorting a fast-talking witness from police custody to a courthouse. There are however forces at work trying to stop prevent them from making it.

Dude, Where's My Car?.tagline: Two potheads wake up from a night of partying and can't remember where they parked their car.

Small Time Crooks.tagline: A loser of a crook and his wife strike it rich when a botched bank job's cover business becomes a spectacular success.

Charlie's Angels.tagline: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

Toy Story 2.tagline: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

Crazy/Beautiful.tagline: At Pacific Palisades High, a poor Latino falls hard for a troubled girl from the affluent neighborhood.

Big Night.tagline: A failing Italian restaurant run by two brothers gambles on one special night to try to save the business.

production.name: Global Entertainment Productions GmbH & Company Medien KG

Girl, Interrupted.tagline: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the 1960s.

Jack.tagline: Because of an unusual aging disorder that has aged him four times faster than a normal human being, a boy enters the fifth grade for the first time with the appearance of a 40 year old man.

Pet Sematary II.tagline: The ancient Indian cemetery with the power to raise the dead returns and influences the lives of new residents.

Cold Mountain.tagline: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

Girlfight.tagline: Diana, without her father knowing it, trains as a boxer and achieves impressive success, blazing new trails for female boxers.

The Horse Whisperer.tagline: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

The Last Boy Scout.tagline: A down and out cynical detective teams up with a down and out ex-quarterback to try and solve a murder case involving a pro football team and a politician.

A Dirty Shame.tagline: An uptight, middle-aged, repressed woman turns into a sex addict after getting hit on the head, and she then falls into an underground subculture of sex addicts in suburban Baltimore.

Bullets Over Broadway.tagline: In 1920s New York, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.

I Know What You Did Last Summer.tagline: Four teens are in great danger one year after their car hits a stranger whose body they dump in the sea.

Tombstone.tagline: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

The Thomas Crown Affair.tagline: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.

The Jacket.tagline: A Gulf war veteran is wrongly sent to a mental institution for insane criminals, where he becomes the object of a Doctor's experiments, and his life is completely affected by them.

Secrets & Lies.tagline: Successful black woman traces her birth mother to a lower-class white woman, who denies it; emotions run high as everyone's secrets are exposed.

Spaceballs.tagline: Planet Spaceball's President Skroob sends Lord Dark Helmet to steal Planet Druidia's abundant supply of air to replenish their own, and only Lone Starr can stop them.

Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon.tagline: Two warriors in pursuit of a stolen sword and a notorious fugitive are led to an impetuous, physically skilled, adolescent nobleman's daughter, who is at a crossroads in her life.

Thinner.tagline: A lawyer is cursed by a gypsy to lose weight...and lose weight...and lose weight...

Ali.tagline: A biography of sports legend, Muhammad Ali, from his early days to his days in the ring.

Super Troopers.tagline: Five Vermont state troopers, avid pranksters with a knack for screwing up, try to save their jobs and out-do the local police department by solving a crime.

Sphere.tagline: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

Clockstoppers.tagline: A teenager accidentally activates a machine that enables him to speed up his body so that other people seem to be standing still.

The Water Horse.tagline: A lonely boy discovers a mysterious egg that hatches a sea creature of Scottish legend.

All Dogs Go to Heaven.tagline: A dog returns from the dead looking for revenge on his killer using an orphan girl who can talk to animals.

Stargate.tagline: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

From Hell.tagline: In Victorian Era London, a troubled clairvoyant police detective investigates the murders by Jack The Ripper.

Iron Man.tagline: When wealthy industrialist Tony Stark is forced to build an armored suit after a life-threatening incident, he ultimately decides to use its technology to fight against evil.

The Brothers Bloom.tagline: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.

Devil in a Blue Dress.tagline: An Afro-American man is hired to find a woman and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.

Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood.tagline: Years after Tommy Jarvis chained him underwater at Camp Crystal Lake, the hulking killer Jason Voorhees returns to the camp grounds when he is released accidentally by a teenager with psychic powers.

My Favorite Martian.tagline: A martian lands on Earth and makes friends with a reporter.

production.name: Ce Qui Me Meut Motion Pictures

L'Auberge Espagnole.tagline: A strait-laced French student moves into an apartment in Barcelona with a cast of six other characters from all over Europe. Together, they speak the international language of love and friendship.

Saved!.tagline: When a girl attending a Christian high school becomes pregnant, she finds herself ostracized and demonized, as all of her former friends turn on her.

Jersey Girl.tagline: After his career is sidelined from an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup, a single man must take care of his precocious daughter.

The Brothers.tagline: Four friends begin to question women and relationships when one of them announces impending nuptials.

production.name: Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa

Hotel Rwanda.tagline: The true story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who housed over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda.

The Opposite of Sex.tagline: A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.

Outbreak.tagline: Extreme measures are necessary to contain an epidemic of a deadly airborne virus. But how extreme, exactly?

The Money Pit.tagline: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

Hero.tagline: A not-so-nice man rescues passengers from a crashed airliner, only to see someone else take credit.

A Nightmare on Elm Street.tagline: In the dreams of his victims, a spectral child murderer stalks the children of the members of the lynch mob that killed him.

Scream 3.tagline: Ghostface pays Sidney and her friends a third visit while they visit the set of "Stab 3", the third movie based upon the Woodsboro murders.

Scream 2.tagline: Two years after the events of the first film, a new psychopath dons the "Ghost face" costume and a new string of murders begin.

Miracle at St. Anna.tagline: Set in 1944 Italy, the story of four black American soldiers who get trapped in a Tuscan village during WWII.

Without a Paddle.tagline: After their friend dies, three men decide to fulfill their childhood promise by going on a camping expedition for the lost D.B. Cooper bounty, with calamitous results.

Dark Blue.tagline: A robbery homicide investigation triggers a series of events that will cause a corrupt LAPD officer to question his tactics.

The Forbidden Kingdom.tagline: A discovery made by a kung fu obsessed American teen sends him on an adventure to China, where he joins up with a band of martial arts warriors in order to free the imprisoned Monkey King.

Birth.tagline: A young boy attempts to convince a woman that he is her dead husband reborn.

The Rookie.tagline: A Texas baseball coach makes the major league after agreeing to try out if his high school team made the playoffs.

Mo' Better Blues.tagline: Jazz trumpeter Bleek Gilliam makes questionable decisions in his professional and romantic life.

Maximum Overdrive.tagline: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

Tuck Everlasting.tagline: A young woman meets and falls in love with a young man who is part of a family of immortals.

Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem.tagline: Warring alien and predator races descend on a small town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.

Light It Up.tagline: A group of teens is bent on improving the run-down conditions of their high-school.

Eye of the Beholder.tagline: A private eye shadows a female serial killer of men all over the U.S. without her knowing as he, strangely enough, occasionally acts as her guardian angel.

Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist.tagline: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the Queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes.

Wayne's World 2.tagline: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

Elizabeth: The Golden Age.tagline: A mature Queen Elizabeth endures multiple crises late in her reign including court intrigues, an assassination plot, the Spanish Armada, and romantic disappointments.

Black and White.tagline: A group of white high school teens become involved with Harlem's black hip-hop crowd.

The Straight Story.tagline: An old man makes a long journey by tractor to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

The Golden Bowl.tagline: A man marries an heiress for her money even though he is actually in love with her friend.

The Valet.tagline: A porter and a top-model have to pretend to be a couple in order to salvage a CEO's marriage.

Runaway Train.tagline: Two escaped convicts and a female railway worker find themselves trapped on a train with no brakes and nobody driving.

Highlander: Endgame.tagline: Immortals Connor and Duncan Macleod must join forces against Kell, an evil immortal who has become too strong for anyone to face alone.

Rosewood.tagline: A dramatization of a 1923 horrific racist lynch mob attack on an African American community.

The Lion King.tagline: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

Rock Star.tagline: Lead singer of a tribute band becomes lead singer of the real band he idolizes.

El mariachi.tagline: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

In the Company of Men.tagline: Two business executives--one an avowed misogynist, the other recently emotionally wounded by his love interest--set out to exact revenge on the female gender by seeking out the most innocent, uncorrupted girl they can find and ruining her life.

Woo.tagline: Gorgeous and extravert Woo meets insecure and straight-laced law clerk Tim at a blind date.

Born on the Fourth of July.tagline: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.

Mona Lisa Smile.tagline: A free-thinking art professor teaches conservative 50's Wellesley girls to question their traditional societal roles.

Running Scared.tagline: A low-ranking thug is entrusted by his crime boss to dispose of a gun that killed corrupt cops, but things get out of control when the gun ends up in wrong hands.

Cradle Will Rock.tagline: A true story of politics and art in the 1930s USA, centered around a leftist musical drama and attempts to stop its production.

The Naked Gun 2\u00bd: The Smell of Fear.tagline: Lieutenant Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

Bangkok Dangerous.tagline: A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy.

Chuck & Buck.tagline: An oddly naive man-child stalks his childhood best friend and tries to reconnect with their past.

Nothing But Trouble.tagline: A businessman finds he and his friends the prisoners of a sadistic judge and his equally odd family in the backwoods of a bizarre mansion.

What's the Worst That Could Happen?.tagline: A rich man catches a thief burglarizing his home and steals the thief's lucky ring, who then tries to get it back.

Reign of Fire.tagline: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting fire to everything, establishing dominance over the planet.

Wonder Boys.tagline: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.

Junior.tagline: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

The Beautician and the Beast.tagline: A New York cosmetologist mistakenly thought to be a science teacher is offered a job to teach the children of an Eastern European dictator.

Pulp Fiction.tagline: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

production.name: Carrasco & Domingo Films S.A. de C.V.
Consejo Nacional para la Cultura y las Artes (CONACULTA)

Riding in Cars with Boys.tagline: A single mother, with dreams of becoming a writer, has a son at the age of 15 in 1965, and goes through a failed marriage with the drug-addicted father.

Heavenly Creatures.tagline: Two girls have an intense fantasy life; their parents, concerned the fantasy is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

The Mother.tagline: A grandmother has a passionate affair with a man half her age, who is also sleeping with her daughter.

Transformers.tagline: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

Mission: Impossible.tagline: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

Nixon.tagline: A biographical story of former U.S. president Richard Milhous Nixon, from his days as a young boy to his eventual presidency which ended in shame.

Out Cold.tagline: A snowboarder's plans for his own snowboard park go awry when an ex-girlfriend returns to town.

School Daze.tagline: A not so popular young man wants to pledge to a popular fraternity at his historically black college.

September.tagline: At a summer house in Vermont, neighbor Howard falls in love with Lane, who's in a relationship with Peter, who's falling for Stephanie, who's married with children.

The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada.tagline: Ranch hand Pete Perkins looks to fulfill the promise to his recently deceased best friend by burying him in his hometown in Mexico.

A Mighty Heart.tagline: Mariane Pearl embarks on a frantic search to locate her journalist husband, Daniel, when he goes missing in Pakistan.

Mission to Mars.tagline: When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.

Bandits.tagline: Two bank robbers fall in love with the girl they've kidnapped.

DragonHeart.tagline: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying knight must cooperate to stop an evil king who was given partial immortality.

A Soldier's Story.tagline: An African American officer investigates a murder in a racially charged situation in World War II.

The Tuxedo.tagline: A hapless chauffer must take a comatosed secret agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

Not Another Teen Movie.tagline: A sendup of all the teen movies that have accumulated in the past two decades.

Free Willy.tagline: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

The Terminal.tagline: An eastern immigrant finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

Nicholas Nickleby.tagline: A young, compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his cold-heartedly grasping uncle.

Billy Madison.tagline: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

A View to a Kill.tagline: An investigation of a horse-racing scam leads 007 to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.

Penelope.tagline: A modern romantic tale about a young aristocratic heiress born under a curse that can only be broken when she finds true love with "one who will love her faithfully."

Highlander II: The Quickening.tagline: In the future, Highlander Connor MacLeod must prevent the destruction of Earth under an anti-ozone shield.

The Grudge 2.tagline: In Tokyo, a young woman (Tamblyn) is exposed to the same mysterious curse that afflicted her sister (Gellar). The supernatural force, which fills a person with rage before spreading to its next victim, brings together a group of previously unrelated people who attempt to unlock its secret to save their lives.

The Brady Bunch Movie.tagline: The original '70s TV family is now placed in the 1990s, where they're even more square and out of place than ever.

V for Vendetta.tagline: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

Blast from the Past.tagline: A romantic comedy about a naive man who comes out into the world after being in a nuclear fallout shelter for 35 years.

Eastern Promises.tagline: A Russian teenager living in London who dies during childbirth leaves clues to a midwife in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

Selena.tagline: The true story of Selena Quintanilla-Perez, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart topping albums on the Latin music charts.

The Sure Thing.tagline: A college student plans a cross-country trip to get laid, but ends up traveling with a young woman. They hate each other, so naturally...

Super Mario Bros..tagline: The Marios rush to save a princess from Koopa.

Rugrats in Paris: The Movie.tagline: The Rugrats travel to Paris, France, where Chuckie hopes to find a new mother and keep his father from marrying an evil business woman.

The Great Mouse Detective.tagline: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy-maker and uncovers its link to his arch-enemy, Professor Ratigan.

The Long Kiss Goodnight.tagline: A woman suffering from amnesia begins to recover her memories after trouble from her past finds her again.

A Few Good Men.tagline: Neo military lawyer Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder; they contend they were acting under orders.

Freedomland.tagline: A black police detective must solve a strange case of a kidnapped boy and deal with a big racial protest.

Picture Perfect.tagline: A young advertising executive's life becomes increasingly complicated when, in order to impress her boss, she pretends to be engaged to a man she has just met.

The Super.tagline: Karma comes into play when a wealthy wisecracking landlord is ordered by a court to live in the filthy building that he runs.

Home Alone 3.tagline: Alex Pruitt, a young boy of nine living in Chicago, fend off thieves who seek a top-secret chip in his toy car to support a North Korean terrorist organization's next deed.

Sunset.tagline: Tom Mix and Wyatt Earp team up to solve a murder at the Academy Awards in 1929 Hollywood.

Charlie Wilson's War.tagline: A drama based on a Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen and long-reaching effects.

Waitress.tagline: Jenna is a pregnant, unhappily married waitress in the deep south. She meets a newcomer to her town and falls into an unlikely relationship as a last attempt at happiness.

Beautiful.tagline: Mona sacrifices everything, including family, in pursuit of a beauty pageant victory. Her friend Ruby helps her to an amazing degree.

The Crow.tagline: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

Bridge to Terabithia.tagline: A preteen's life is changed after befriending the new girl at school.

Yours, Mine & Ours.tagline: A widowed Coast Guard Admiral and a widow handbag designer fall in love and marry, much to the dismay of her 10 and his 8 children.

April Fool's Day.tagline: A group of nine college students staying at a friend's remote island mansion begin to fall victim to an unseen murderer over the April Fool's day weekend.

Frequency.tagline: An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.

The Interpreter.tagline: Political intrigue and deception unfold inside the United Nations, where a U.S. Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate an interpreter who overhears an assassination plot.

The Ref.tagline: A cat burglar is forced to take a bickering, dysfunctional family hostage on Christmas Eve.

Bridget Jones's Diary.tagline: A British woman is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

Space Jam.tagline: Michael Jordan agrees to help the Looney Toons play a basketball game vs. alien slavers to determine their freedom.

Beetlejuice.tagline: A couple of recently deceased ghosts contract the services of a "bio-exorcist" in order to remove the obnoxious new owners of their house.

Boys and Girls.tagline: A friendship is put to the ultimate test when two best friends wind up in bed together.

The Golden Compass.tagline: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

Chicago.tagline: Murderesses Velma Kelly (a chanteuse and tease who killed her husband and sister after finding them in bed together) and Roxie Hart (who killed her boyfriend when she discovered he wasn't going to make her a star) find themselves on death row together and fight for the fame that will keep them from the gallows in 1920s Chicago.

F/X.tagline: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.

Cecil B. DeMented.tagline: An insane independent film director and his renegade group of teenage filmmakers kidnap an A-list Hollywood actress and force her to star in their underground film.

The Wackness.tagline: It's the summer of 1994, and the streets of New York are pulsing with hip-hop. Set against this backdrop, a lonely teenager named Luke Shapiro spends his last summer before university selling marijuana throughout New York City, trading it with his unorthodox psychotherapist for treatment, while having a crush on his stepdaughter.

The Stupids.tagline: An incredibly dull-witted family unknowingly stumble upon an illegal weapons deal while on the trail of their "stolen" garbage.

King of the Hill.tagline: A young boy struggles on his own in a run-down motel after his parents and younger brother are separated from him in 1930s Depression-era Midwest.

Clerks II.tagline: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons - but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire.

Nurse Betty.tagline: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

Mean Creek.tagline: When a teen is bullied, his brother and friends lure the bully into the woods to seek vengeance.

\u00a1Three Amigos!.tagline: Three unemployed actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to replay their bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

Lake Placid.tagline: Horror-Comedy about a man-eating crocodile loose in the lake.

United 93.tagline: A real time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on 9/11 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

Terminal Velocity.tagline: A maverick skydiver and a former KGB agent team up to stop the Russian mafia from stealing gold.

All the Real Girls.tagline: Small-town love story of a young man with a reputation for womanizing and his best friend's sister.

The Triumph of Love.tagline: A princess is determined to restore her homeland's throne to its rightful heir, a young prince with whom she falls in love.

American Ninja 2: The Confrontation.tagline: On a remote Caribbean island, Army Ranger Joe Armstrong investigates the disappearance of several marines, which leads him to The Lion, a super-criminal who has kidnapped a local scientist and mass-produced an army of mutant Ninja warriors.

Blood Simple..tagline: A rich but jealous man hires a private investigator to kill his cheating wife and her new man. But, when blood is involved, nothing is simple.

Fever Pitch.tagline: Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.

August Rush.tagline: A drama with fairy tale elements, where an orphaned musical prodigy uses his gift as a clue to finding his birth parents.

Shooter.tagline: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the president. Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, he goes on the run to track the real killer and find out who exactly set him up, and why.

Resident Evil: Apocalypse.tagline: Alice awakes in Raccoon City, only to find it has become infested with zombies and monsters. With the help of Jill Valentine and Carlos Olivera, Alice must find a way out of the city before it is destroyed by a nuclear missile.

Sense and Sensibility.tagline: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the titular opposites.

The Craft.tagline: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who even slightly anger them.

Roommates.tagline: An elderly yet young-at-heart man moves in with his grandson, and both their lives turn upside-down.

Dracula 2000.tagline: A group of thieves break into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

Zodiac.tagline: A San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer.

Sudden Death.tagline: A disgraced former fireman takes on a group of terrorists holding the Vice President and others hostage during the seventh game of the NHL Stanley Cup finals.

Next Friday.tagline: Uncle Elroy and Day Day owe money on taxes so Craig finds a way to steal from the next door neighbors to pay off the taxes so Uncle Elroy's house doesn't get put up for auction.

Sling Blade.tagline: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

Johnny Mnemonic.tagline: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

Child's Play.tagline: A single mother gives her son a beloved doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed with the soul of a serial killer.

The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian.tagline: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.

Bound.tagline: Corky, a tough female ex con and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caeser.

The Four Feathers.tagline: A British officer resigns his post just before battle and subsequently receives four white feathers from his friends and fiancee as symbols of what they believe to be his cowardice.

Garfield.tagline: Jon Arbuckle buys a second pet, a dog named Odie. However, Odie is then abducted and it is up to Jon's cat, Garfield, to find and rescue the canine.

Election.tagline: A high school teacher's personal life becomes complicated as he works with students during the school elections.

Anaconda.tagline: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who takes them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake.

Inkheart.tagline: A young girl discovers her father has an amazing talent to bring characters out of their books and must try to stop a freed villain from destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero.

Turistas.tagline: A group of young backpackers' vacation turns sour when a bus accident leaves them marooned in a remote Brazilian rural area that holds an ominous secret.

Kiss Kiss Bang Bang.tagline: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.

Cry Freedom.tagline: South African journalist Donald Woods is forced to flee the country after attempting to investigate the death in custody of his friend the black activist Steve Biko.

Galaxy Quest.tagline: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.

Cutthroat Island.tagline: A female pirate and her companion race against their rivals to find a hidden island that contains a fabulous treasure.

Tucker: The Man and His Dream.tagline: The story of Preston Tucker, the maverick car designer and his ill-fated challenge to the auto industry with his revolutionary car concept.

Twisted.tagline: Jessica, whose father was a serial killer, is a police officer. While investigating a murder, she finds herself in the centre of her own investigation, when her former lovers start dying around her at a furious pace.

The Way of the Gun.tagline: Two criminal drifters without sympathy get more than they bargained for after kidnapping and holding for ransom the surrogate mother of a powerful and shady man.

The Perfect Storm.tagline: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

An American Werewolf in Paris.tagline: An American man unwittingly gets involved with werewolves who have developed a serum allowing them to transform at will.

Twister.tagline: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

The Glass House.tagline: An orphaned teenager is taken in by a Malibu couple but discovers they aren't the caring friends they seemed to be.

In & Out.tagline: A midwestern teacher questions his sexuality after a former student makes a comment about him at the Academy Awards.

John Q.tagline: A down-on-his luck father, whose insurance won't cover his son's heart transplant, takes the hospital's emergency room hostage until the doctors agree to perform the operation.

Big.tagline: When a boy wishes to be big at a magic wish machine, he wakes up the next morning and finds himself in an adult body.

The Myth of Fingerprints.tagline: An ambitious debut for writer/director Bart Freundlich charting the unrest with a family who gather together for thanks giving.

Supercop.tagline: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

The Remains of the Day.tagline: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years post World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty has been.

Dead Poets Society.tagline: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to a love of poetry and to seize the day.

Unforgiven.tagline: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.

Horton Hears a Who!.tagline: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

The Manchurian Candidate.tagline: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.

Pinocchio and the Emperor of the Night.tagline: Pinocchio and his friends, a glow worm and a marionette, search for a magic music box. However, so is the evil Scalawag and the Emperor of the Night.

Surrender.tagline: A wealthy writer who has had terrible experiences with money-hungry girlfriends & ex-wives pretends to be a broke, washed-up novelist to see if the woman he loves wants him for himself or just for his money.

The Day the Earth Stood Still.tagline: A remake of the 1951 classic sci-fi film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

Darkman.tagline: A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.

Death Becomes Her.tagline: When a woman learns of an immortality treatment, she sees it as a way to outdo her long-time rival.

What Happens in Vegas.tagline: A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.

Exorcist: The Beginning.tagline: Years before Father Lancaster Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.

Where the Heart Is.tagline: A pregnant 17-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Wal-Mart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.

The Departed.tagline: An undercover state cop who has infiltrated an Irish gang and a mole in the police force working for the same mob race to track down and identify each other before being exposed to the enemy, after both sides realize their outfit has a rat.

Barbershop 2: Back in Business.tagline: Why not spend another day with the crew at Calvin's shop in the South Side of Chicago?

Million Dollar Baby.tagline: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

The Hand That Rocks the Cradle.tagline: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

Lovely & Amazing.tagline: Self-esteem and insecurity are at the heart of this comedy about the relationship between a mother and her three confused daughters.

production.name: Audiovisual Development Bureau, Ministerio da Cultura

Central Station.tagline: An emotive journey of a former school teacher, who write letters for illiterate people, and a young boy, whose mother has just died, in search for the father he never knew.

Because of Winn-Dixie.tagline: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

Control.tagline: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to commit suicide at the age of 23.

Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within.tagline: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

Matilda.tagline: Story of a wonderful little girl, who happens to be a genius, and her wonderful teacher vs. the worst parents ever and the worst school principal imaginable.

Snakes on a Plane.tagline: An FBI agent takes on a plane full of deadly and poisonous snakes, deliberately released to kill a witness being flown from Honolulu to Los Angeles to testify against a mob boss.

Miller's Crossing.tagline: Tom Regan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

Ronin.tagline: A freelancing former US intelligence agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by both the Irish and the Russians.

Home on the Range.tagline: To save their farm, the resident animals go bounty hunting for a notorious outlaw.

A History of Violence.tagline: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

A Beautiful Mind.tagline: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

Moonlight Mile.tagline: As he copes with the death of his fiancee along with her parents, a young man must figure out what he wants out of life.

Windtalkers.tagline: Two U.S. Marines in WWII are assigned to protect Navajo Marines who use their native language as an unbreakable radio cypher.

Bella.tagline: Sooner or later every one of us will face an irreversible moment that will change our lives forever. If it hasn't happened to you yet...it will. BELLA is a true love story about how one day in New York City changed three people forever.

The Muse.tagline: A comedy about a neurotic screenwriter and his modern-day muse.

Tadpole.tagline: Coming-of-age story about a 15-year-old boy, Oscar, who falls in love with his stepmother, Eve.

production.name: Global Entertainment Productions GmbH & Company Medien KG

Vertical Limit.tagline: A climber must rescue his sister on top of K2, one of the world's biggest mountains.

Analyze This.tagline: A comedy about a psychiatrist whose number one-patient is an insecure mob boss.

Belly.tagline: A pair of vicious black gangsters have spiritual awakenings.

Footloose.tagline: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

Snow Dogs.tagline: When a Miami dentist inherits a team of sled dogs, he's got to learn the trade or lose his pack to a crusty mountain man.

Run.tagline: When a law student accidentally kills the son of a mob boss in a fight, he finds himself relentlessly pursued by the mob and the police.

True Crime.tagline: Can an over-the-hill journalist uncover the evidence that can prove a death row inmate's innocence just hours before his execution?

I Am Legend.tagline: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

production.name: Fondo de Fomento a la Calidad Cinematográfica

Cronos.tagline: A mysterious device designed to provide its owner with eternal life resurfaces after four hundred years, leaving a trail of destruction in its path.

Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom.tagline: After arriving in India, Indiana Jones is asked by a desperate village to find a mystical stone. He agrees, and stumbles upon a secret cult plotting a terrible plan in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

The Game Plan.tagline: An NFL quarterback living the bachelor lifestyle discovers that he has a 8-year-old daughter from a previous relationship.

Dead Man.tagline: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange North American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers.tagline: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

The Crying Game.tagline: A British soldier is kidnapped by IRA terrorists. He befriends one of his captors, who is drawn into the soldier's world.

Mindhunters.tagline: Trainees in the FBI's psychological profiling program must put their training into practice when they discover a killer in their midst.

Soldier.tagline: A soldier is dumped on a waste disposal planet and lives among a community of crash survivors on the planet and takes it upon himself to defend his new home when genetic engineered soldiers are ordered to eliminate the crash survivors.

The Last Seduction.tagline: A devious sexpot steals her husband's drug money and hides out in a small town where she meets the perfect dupe for her next scheme.

20 Dates.tagline: A documentary type film about the dates Myles has gone on as he tries to find out how to find love in the future.

3:10 to Yuma.tagline: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

Seven Pounds.tagline: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

Demolition Man.tagline: A cop is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent enemy who is loose in a nonviolent future society.

What Just Happened.tagline: Two weeks in the life of a fading Hollywood producer who's having a rough time trying to get his new picture made.

Nine Queens.tagline: Two con artists try to swindle a stamp collector by selling him a sheet of counterfeit rare stamps (the "nine queens").

American Me.tagline: A Mexican-American Mafia kingpin is released from prison, falls in love for the first time, and grows introspective about his gangster lifestyle.

The Pianist.tagline: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

Kids in America.tagline: A diverse group of high school students band together to peacefully stick it to their overbearing principal.

The Prince of Egypt.tagline: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and, later his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

Vacancy.tagline: A young married couple becomes stranded at an isolated motel and finds hidden video cameras in their room. They realize that unless they escape, they'll be the next victims of a snuff film

What's Eating Gilbert Grape.tagline: Gilbert has to care for his brother Arnie and his obese mother, which gets in the way when love walks into his life.

Layer Cake.tagline: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

Bee Season.tagline: A wife and mother begins a downward emotional spiral, as her husband avoids their collapsing marriage by immersing himself in his 11 year-old daughter's quest to become a spelling bee champion.

Final Destination 2.tagline: When Kimberly has a violent premonition of a highway pileup she blocks the freeway, keeping a few others meant to die, safe...Or are they? The survivors mysteriously start dying and it's up to Kimberly to stop it before she's next.

Before Sunset.tagline: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

Closer.tagline: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

The Red Violin.tagline: A perfect red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

Underclassman.tagline: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring.

Spaced Invaders.tagline: Dimwitted Martians drop into a little Illinois town on the day that the local radio station happens to rebroadcast Orson Welles 1938 "War Of The Worlds".

Office Space.tagline: Comedic tale of company workers who hate their jobs and decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

Bee Movie.tagline: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them.

New York Stories.tagline: A middle-aged artist obsessed with his pretty young assistant, a precocious 12 year old living in a hotel, and a neurotic lawyer with a possessive mother make up three stories.

Margot at the Wedding.tagline: Margot and her son Claude decide to visit her sister Pauline after she announces that she is marrying less-than-impressive Malcolm. In short order, the storm the sisters create leaves behind a a mess of thrashed relationships and exposed family secrets.

The Whole Nine Yards.tagline: Nick is a struggling dentist in Canada. A new neighbor moves in, and he discovers that it is Jimmy "The Tulip" Teduski. His wife convinces him to go to Chicago and inform the mob boss who wants Jimmy dead.

The Bourne Supremacy.tagline: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

AVP: Alien vs. Predator.tagline: During an archaeological expedition on Bouvetøya Island in Antarctica, a team of archaeologists and other scientists find themselves caught up in a battle between the two legends. Soon, the team realize that only one species can win.

Steel Dawn.tagline: In a post-apocalyptic world, a warrior wandering through the desert comes upon a group of settlers who are being menaced by a murderous gang that is after the water they control.

Freddy Got Fingered.tagline: An unemployed cartoonist moves back in with his parents and younger brother Freddy. When his parents demand he leave, he begins to spread rumors that his father is sexually abusing Freddy.

Black Knight.tagline: Martin Lawrence plays Jamal, an employee in Medieval World amusement park. After sustaining a blow to the head, he awakens to find himself in 14th century England.

Match Point.tagline: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for a femme-fatal type who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

Dreamer: Inspired by a True Story.tagline: Cale Crane catalyzes the rescue and rehabilitation of Sonador, a race horse with a broken leg.

The Chorus.tagline: The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively effect the students' lives through music.

Christmas Vacation.tagline: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

Color of Night.tagline: A color-blind psychiatrist Bill Capa is stalked by an unknown killer after taking over his murdered friend's therapy group, all of whom have a connection to a mysterious young woman that Capa begins having intense sexual encounters with.

Desperado.tagline: A gunslinger is embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.

Impostor.tagline: In the future, an alien race uses androids as bombs to attack Earth. A government weapons specialist is accused of being one such android and sets out to prove his innocence.

Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story.tagline: Singer Dewey Cox overcomes adversity to become a musical legend.

Surviving the Game.tagline: A homeless man is hired as a survival guide for a group of wealthy businessmen on a hunting trip in the mountains, unaware that they are killers who hunt humans for sport, and that he is their new prey.

Misery.tagline: A famous novelist is "rescued" from a car crash by an obsessed fan.

CQ.tagline: A young filmmaker in 1960s Paris juggles directing a cheesy sci-fi debacle, directing his own personal art film, coping with his crumbling relationship with his girlfriend, and a new-found infatuation with the sci-fi film's starlet.

The Age of Innocence.tagline: Tale of 19th century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

Secretary.tagline: A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one.

Arachnophobia.tagline: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

Naked Gun 33 1/3: The Final Insult.tagline: Frank Drebin comes out of retirement to help Police Squad infiltrate a gang of terrorists planning to detonate a bomb at the Academy Awards.

Downfall.tagline: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

Edtv.tagline: Video store clerk Ed agrees to have his life filmed by a camera crew for a tv network.

Hoot.tagline: A young man (Lerman) moves from Montana to Florida with his family, where he's compelled to engage in a fight to protect a population of endangered owls.

Hook.tagline: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

Behind Enemy Lines.tagline: A Navy navigator is shot down over enemy territory and is ruthlessly pursued by a secret police enforcer and the opposing troops. Meanwhile his commanding officer goes against orders in an attempt to rescue him.

Two Lovers.tagline: A Brooklyn-set romantic drama about a bachelor torn between the family friend his parents wish he would marry and his beautiful but volatile new neighbor.

The Ballad of Jack and Rose.tagline: A father and daughter isolated on an island off the East Coast and living on a once thriving commune grapple with the limits of family and sexuality.

production.name: Mediastream Vierte Film GmbH & Co. Vermarktungs KG

Welcome to Mooseport.tagline: A US president who has retired after two terms in office returns to his hometown of Mooseport, Maine and decides to run for Mayor against another local candidate.

Spy Kids.tagline: The children of secret-agent parents must save them from danger.

Reno 911!: Miami.tagline: A rag-tag team of Reno cops are called in to save the day after a terrorist attack disrupts a national police convention in Miami Beach during spring break. Based on the Comedy Central series.

Madagascar.tagline: Spoiled by their upbringing with no idea what wild life is really like, four animals from New York Central Zoo escape, unwittingly assisted by four absconding penguins, and find themselves in Madagascar, among a bunch of merry lemurs

Drumline.tagline: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.

28 Days.tagline: A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.

Throw Momma from the Train.tagline: A bitter ex-husband. A put upon momma's boy. Both want their respective spouse and mother dead, but who will pull it off?

Who Framed Roger Rabbit.tagline: A toon hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

Eraser.tagline: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

Maria Full of Grace.tagline: A pregnant Colombian teenager becomes a drug mule to make some desperately needed money for her family.

production.name: Province of British Columbia Production Services Tax Credit

Good Luck Chuck.tagline: In order to keep the woman of his dreams from falling for another guy, Charlie Logan has to break the curse that has made him wildly popular with single women: Sleep with Charlie once, and the next man you meet will be your true love.

Kundun.tagline: From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.

Hellboy.tagline: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

The Devil Wears Prada.tagline: A naive young woman comes to New York and scores a job as the assistant to one of the city's biggest magazine editors, the ruthless and cynical Miranda Priestly.

Dracula.tagline: The vampire comes to England to seduce a visitor's fiancée and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

The Hunchback of Notre Dame.tagline: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

Captain Corelli's Mandolin.tagline: When a fisherman leaves to fight with the Greek army during WWII, his fiancee falls in love with the local Italian commander.

Surf's Up.tagline: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

production.name: Kumar Mobiliengesellschaft mbH & Co. Projekt Nr. 1 KG

Son of the Mask.tagline: Tim Avery, an aspiring cartoonist, finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son "born of the mask", he discovers just how looney child raising can be.

Stay.tagline: This movie focuses on the attempts of a psychiatrist to prevent one of his patients from committing suicide while trying to maintain his own grip on reality.

Joyeux Noel.tagline: On Christmas Eve during world War I, the Germans, French, and Scottish fraternize and get to know the men who live on the opposite side of a brutal war, in what became a true lesson of humanity.

Married Life.tagline: A 1940s-set drama where an adulterous man plots his wife's death instead of putting her through the humiliation of a divorce.

The Sweetest Thing.tagline: A girl finds she is forced to educate herself on the etiquette of wooing the opposite sex when she finally meets Mr. Right.

Bringing Out the Dead.tagline: A Manhattan ambulance paramedic, overworked and haunted by visions of his failures, fights to keep a tenuous grip on his clarity.

To Die For.tagline: Suzanne Stone is an aspiring TV personality who will do anything to be in the spotlight- including enlisting 3 teenagers to kill her husband.

Crossroads.tagline: Three childhood best friends, and a guy they just met, take a trip across the country, finding themselves and their friendship in the process.

Wonderland.tagline: In the police investigation of a brutal crime scene, one man was at the center of it all: legendary porn star John Holmes.

While You Were Sleeping.tagline: Ticket collecting romantic pretends to be engaged to an unconscious man but can't fool his brother

Four Christmases.tagline: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas Day.

Lost in Translation.tagline: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

Along Came Polly.tagline: A buttoned up newlywed finds his too organized life falling into chaos when he falls in love with an old classmate.

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 3. Produktions KG

The Aviator.tagline: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career, from the late 1920s to the mid-1940s.

Drop Dead Gorgeous.tagline: A small town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.

The Neverending Story II: The Next Chapt.tagline: A young boy with a distant father enters a world of make-believe and magic through a portal within an antique book.

Hocus Pocus.tagline: After three centuries, three witch sisters are resurrected in Salem Massachusetts on Halloween night, and it is up to two teen-agers, a young girl, and an immortal cat to put an end to the witches' reign of terror once and for all.

Red Eye.tagline: A woman is kidnapped by a stranger on a routine flight. Threatened by the potential murder of her father, she is pulled into a plot to assist her captor in offing a politician.

White Hunter Black Heart.tagline: A thinly fictionalized account of a legendary movie director, whose desire to hunt down an animal turns into a grim situation with his movie crew in Africa.

House on Haunted Hill.tagline: A millionaire offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

Bounce.tagline: A man switches plane tickets with another man who dies in that plane in a crash. The man falls in love with the deceased one's wife.

Cheaper by the Dozen 2.tagline: Steve Martin and Bonnie Hunt return as heads of the Baker family who, while on vacation, find themselves in competition with a rival family of eight children, headed by Eugene Levy

The House of Yes.tagline: A mentally unbalanced young woman (who thinks she's Jackie Kennedy) flips into a murderous rage when her brother returns home to reveal he's engaged.

The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2.tagline: A radio host is victimized by the cannibal family as a former Texas Marshall hunts them.

Phantasm II.tagline: Mike, now released from a psychiatric hospital, continues his journey to stop the evil Tall Man from his grim work.

Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer.tagline: Based on the true life serial killer, Henry Lee Lucas.

Night of the Living Dead.tagline: The unburied dead return to life and seek human victims.

Tales from the Darkside: The Movie.tagline: In anthology style, a child tells three stories of horror to keep from being eaten by a witch.

A Bug's Life.tagline: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

The Machinist.tagline: An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

Sliding Doors.tagline: A London woman's love life and career both hinge, unknown to her, on whether or not she catches a train. We see it both ways, in parallel.

Nuts.tagline: A high-class call girl accused of murder fights for the right to stand trial rather than be declared mentally incompetent.

Lakeview Terrace.tagline: A LAPD officer will stop at nothing to force out the interracial couple who just moved in next door.

What Women Want.tagline: After an accident, a chauvenistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.

Bulletproof Monk.tagline: Based on the very underground comic book, a Tibetan monk becomes a mentor to a young street kid whom he can teach to protect a scroll.

Hedwig and the Angry Inch.tagline: A transexual punk rock girl from East Berlin tours the US with her rock band as she tells her life story and follows the ex-boyfriend/bandmate who stole her songs.

How High.tagline: Two guys by the name of Silas and Jamal decided to one day smoke something magical, which eventually helps them to ace their college entrance exam.

The Incredible Hulk.tagline: Dr. Bruce Banner, thanks to a gamma ray experiment gone wrong, transforms into a giant green-skinned hulk whenever his pulse rate gets too high. Meanwhile, a soldier uses the same technology to become an evil version of the original.

In the Bedroom.tagline: A New England couple's college-aged son dates an older woman who has two small children and an unwelcome ex-husband.

RoboCop 3.tagline: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

RoboCop 2.tagline: A corrupt businesswoman seeks to disable Robocop in favor of her own model of cyborg.

License to Wed.tagline: A reverend puts an engaged couple through a grueling marriage preparation course to see if they are meant to be married in his church.

Mystery, Alaska.tagline: This comedy is about the residents of a small town who get over-excited when their hockey team gets chosen to host a televised event

Four Rooms.tagline: Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.
