Urban Legend.tagline: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

Ed Wood.tagline: The mostly true story of the legendary director of awful movies and his strange group of friends and actors.

Mars Attacks!.tagline: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

Star Trek: First Contact.tagline: Captain Picard and his crew pursue the Borg back in time to stop them from preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. They also make sure that Zefram Cochrane makes his famous maiden flight at warp speed.

Son of the Pink Panther.tagline: Charles Dreyfus encounters Jacques Gambrelli, who reminds him painfully of Inspector Clouseau, the man who drove him insane. With good reason: Gambrelli is Clouseau's son.

The Mothman Prophecies.tagline: A reporter is drawn to a small West Virginia town to investigate a series of strange events, including psychic visions and the appearance of bizarre entities.

See No Evil, Hear No Evil.tagline: Dave is deaf, and Wally is blind. They witness a murder, but it was Dave who was looking at her, and Wally who was listening.

Shanghai Noon.tagline: Jackie Chan plays a Chinese man who travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

Bait.tagline: An ex-con is used by police to lure a criminal out of hiding.

The Wizard.tagline: A boy and his brother run away from home and hitch cross country with the help of a girl they meet to compete in the ultimate video game championship.

54.tagline: Famous 70s NYC nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

Mortal Kombat.tagline: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.

Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!.tagline: A small-town girl wins a date with a male celebrity through a contest. When the date goes better than expected, a love triangle forms between the girl, the male celebrity, and the girl's best friend.

Species.tagline: A message from outer space contains instructions on how to modify human DNA.

I Still Know What You Did Last Summer.tagline: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

We Own the Night.tagline: A New York nightclub manager tries to save his brother and father from Russian mafia hit men.

Envy.tagline: A man becomes increasingly jealous of his friend's newfound success.

Gone Fishin'.tagline: Two fishing fanatics get in trouble when their fishing boat gets stolen while on a trip.

Basic.tagline: A DEA agent investigates the disappearance of a legendary Army ranger drill sergeant and several of his cadets during a training exercise gone severely awry.

Northfork.tagline: Set in 1955, the residents of a small Montana community are forced to move their homes to make way for a new dam.

Dead Man on Campus.tagline: Two college roommates go out and party, resulting in bad grades. They learn of the clause that says, "If your roommate dies, you get an A," and decide to find someone who is on the verge, so to speak, to move in with them.

Fargo.tagline: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

Good Burger.tagline: Two dim-witted teenage boys, are forced to save the fast-food restaurant they work at from going out of business, despite a new-and-improved burger joint opening across the street that want to be the "Top Dog" in the fast food industry.

Grindhouse.tagline: Two full length feature horror movies written by Quentin Tarantino & Robert Rodriguez put together as a two film feature. Including fake movie trailers in between both movies.

Life.tagline: The story of two criminals (Eddie Murphy and Martin Lawrence) who discover the value of life after being sentenced to life imprisonment.

Don't Say a Word.tagline: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he's horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a post traumatic stress disorder suffering young woman who knows a secret...

Space Cowboys.tagline: When a retired engineer is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

The Reaping.tagline: A former Christian missionary, who specializes in debunking religious phenomena, investigates a small town which seems to be suffering from the 10 biblical plagues.

Days of Thunder.tagline: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

Fat Albert.tagline: Fat Albert and the Cosby Kids come to life and step out of their animated, inner-city Philadelphia world.

The Shawshank Redemption.tagline: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Sunshine State.tagline: A woman and her new husband returns to her hometown roots in coastal northern Florida, and must deal with family, business, and encroaching real estate development.

Jurassic Park.tagline: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

Pocahontas.tagline: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

Bottle Rocket.tagline: Focusing on a trio of friends and their elaborate plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

Like Mike.tagline: A 14-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials "M.J." inside.

Dead Silence.tagline: A widower returns to his hometown to search for answers to his wife's murder, which may be linked to the ghost of a murdered ventriloquist.

Sex, Lies, and Videotape.tagline: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

Down to Earth.tagline: After dying before his time, an aspiring comic gets a second shot at life...by being reincarnated as a wealthy but un-likeable businessman.

The Cider House Rules.tagline: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

The Full Monty.tagline: Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.

Mallrats.tagline: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.

Ocean's Twelve.tagline: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's 11.

The Wood.tagline: While dealing with a friend's cold feet on his wedding day, a writer reminisces about his youth with his best friends.

The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of.tagline: A meek hobbit of the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.

The Phantom of the Opera.tagline: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.

Avenue Montaigne.tagline: A young woman arrives in Paris where she finds a job as a waitress in bar next on Avenue Montaigne that caters to the surrounding theaters and the wealthy inhabitants of the area. She will meet a pianist, a famous actress and a great art collector, and become acquainted with the "luxurious" world her grandmother has told her about since her childhood.

Man on Fire.tagline: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

Juno.tagline: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes an unusual decision regarding her unborn child.

102 Dalmatians.tagline: Cruella DeVil gets out of prison and goes after them darned puppies once more.

Cruel Intentions.tagline: Kathryn makes a bet that her step-brother, Sebastian, won't be able to bed Annette (a virgin, who wants to wait until love). If he loses, Kathryn gets his Jaguar, if he wins, he gets Kathryn.

Kafka.tagline: Writer Franz Kafka works during the day at an insurance company where events lead him to discover a mysterious underground society with strange suppressive goals.

Batman Returns.tagline: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them, while the Catwoman has her own agenda.

Witness.tagline: A young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder; policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

Arthur and the Invisibles.tagline: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, a tiny people living in harmony with nature.

Assault on Precinct 13.tagline: A police sergeant must rally the cops and prisoners together to protect themselves on New Year's Eve, just as corrupt policeman surround the station with the intent of killing all to keep their deception in the ranks.

Constantine.tagline: Constantine tells the story of irreverent supernatural detective John Constantine, who has literally been to hell and back.

Body of Lies.tagline: A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordon Intelligence.

The Replacements.tagline: During a pro football strike, the owners hire substitute players.

Tomorrow Never Dies.tagline: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

Unleashed.tagline: A man enslaved by the mob since childhood and raised into behaving like a human attack dog escapes his captors and attempts to start a new life.

Man of the Year.tagline: A comedian who hosts a news satire program decides to run for president, and a computerized voting machine malfunction gets him elected.

Summer of Sam.tagline: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American South Bronx neighborhood who live in fear and distrust of one another.

A Cinderella Story.tagline: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Sam Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.

Ferris Bueller's Day Off.tagline: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite of what the principal thinks of that.

Drillbit Taylor.tagline: Three kids hire a low-budget bodyguard to protect them from the playground bully.

I Love Trouble.tagline: Peter Brackett and Sabrina Peterson are two competing Chicago newspaper reporters who join forces to unravel the mystery behind a train derailment.

\u00c6on Flux.tagline: Aeon Flux is a mysterious assassin working for the Monicans, a group of rebels trying to overthrow the government. When she is a sent on a mission to kill the Chairman, a whole new mystery is found.

The Sheltering Sky.tagline: The American artist couple Port and Kit Moresby travel aimlessly through Africa, searching for new experiences that could give sense to their relationship. But the flight to distant regions only leads both deeper into despair.

Forgetting Sarah Marshall.tagline: Devastated Peter takes a Hawaii vacation in order to deal with recent break-up with his TV star girlfriend, Sarah. Little does he know Sarah's traveling to the same resort as her ex ... and she's bringing along her new boyfriend.

Big Momma's House.tagline: An FBI agent disguises himself as an old lady to protect a beautiful federal witness and her son.

Harriet the Spy.tagline: Harriet M. Welsch is a spy. But when Harriet's friends find her secret notebook the tables are turned on her. Can she win her friends back and still keep on going with the spy business?

The Thin Red Line.tagline: Terrence Malick's adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

Superbad.tagline: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

Ratatouille.tagline: A rat, who can also cook, makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.

Boogie Nights.tagline: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the late 1970s and early 1980s.

Losing Isaiah.tagline: The natural and adoptive mothers of a young boy are involved in a bitter, controversial custody battle.

Hearts in Atlantis.tagline: A widowed mother and her son change when a mysterious stranger enters their lives.

Carlito's Way.tagline: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

The Spiderwick Chronicles.tagline: Upon moving into the run-down Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

Phenomenon.tagline: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

Mirrors.tagline: An ex-cop and his family are the target of an evil force that is using mirrors as a gateway into their home.

Radio Days.tagline: A nostalgic look at radio's golden age focusing on one ordinary family and the various performers in the medium.

Dirty Pretty Things.tagline: An illegal Nigerian immigrant discovers the unpalatable side of London life.

Scooby-Doo.tagline: After an acrimonious break up, the Mystery Inc. gang are individually brought to an island resort to investigate strange goings on.

Gigli.tagline: The violent story about how a criminal lesbian, a tough-guy hit-man with a heart of gold, and a mentally challenged man came to be best friends through a hostage.

Who's Your Caddy?.tagline: When a rap mogul from Atlanta tries to join a conservative country club in the Carolinas he runs into fierce opposition from the board President- but it's nothing that he and his entourage can't handle.

Apocalypto.tagline: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, the rulers insist the key to prosperity is to build more temples and offer human sacrifices. Jaguar Paw, a young man captured for sacrifice, flees to avoid his fate.

Lolita.tagline: A man marries his landlady so he can take advantage of her daughter.

The Pagemaster.tagline: A cowardly boy who buries himself in accident statistics enters a library to escape a storm only to be transformed into an animated illustration by the Pagemaster. He has to work through obstacles from classic books to return to real life.

Beavis and Butt-Head Do America.tagline: The dimwitted teen duo of Beavis and Butt-Head travel across America in search of their stolen television set.

North Country.tagline: A fictionalized account of the first major successful sexual harassment case in the United States -- Jenson vs. Eveleth Mines, where a woman who endured a range of abuse while working as a miner filed and won the landmark 1984 lawsuit.

Amistad.tagline: About a 1839 mutiny aboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the northeastern coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the free man who led the revolt.

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. Produktions KG

Sleepy Hollow.tagline: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of 3 people with the culprit being the legendary apparition, the Headless Horseman.

Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Cry.tagline: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

What About Bob?.tagline: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, a highly manipulative obsessive-compulsive narcissist, tracks him down during his family vacation.

No Reservations.tagline: The life of a top chef changes when she becomes the guardian of her young niece.

The Pacifier.tagline: Disgraced Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.

Happy Gilmore.tagline: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

Monster.tagline: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

The Doors.tagline: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

The Painted Veil.tagline: A British medical doctor fights a cholera outbreak in a small Chinese village, while also being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.

Friday Night Lights.tagline: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

Halloween H20: 20 Years Later.tagline: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time and now the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

Twelve Monkeys.tagline: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

Timecode.tagline: Four frames of simultaneous action that alternately follow a smitten lesbian lover as she obsesses over her partner's dalliances and the tense goings-on of a Hollywood film production company.

Peaceful Warrior.tagline: A chance encounter with a stranger changes the life of a college gymnast.

Judge Dredd.tagline: In a dystopian future, Dredd, the most famous judge (a cop with instant field judiciary powers) is convicted for a crime he did not commit while his murderous counterpart escapes.

Army of Darkness.tagline: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

Shanghai Knights.tagline: When a Chinese rebel murders Chon's estranged father and escapes to England, Chon and Roy make their way to London with revenge on their minds.

Fool's Gold.tagline: A new clue to the whereabouts of a lost treasure rekindles a married couple's sense of adventure -- and their estranged romance.

Honey, I Shrunk the Kids.tagline: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

Broadcast News.tagline: Take two rival TV reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one producer, female. Mix well and watch the sparks fly.

The Powerpuff Girls.tagline: The movie shows the origin of the Powerpuff Girls before the cartoon series. It explains why they were born and why they dedicated their lives to fighting crime and the forces of evil.

Peter Pan.tagline: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

The Great Debaters.tagline: A drama based on the true story of Melvin B. Tolson, a professor at Wiley College Texas. In 1935, he inspired students to form the school's first debate team, which went on to challenge Harvard in the national championship.

The Cell.tagline: An FBI agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.

Barbershop.tagline: A day in the life of a South Side Chicago barbershop.

Empire.tagline: A successful South Bronx drug dealer turns his back on his roots and gives money to a Wall Street broker to invest for him.

Starman.tagline: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

Hard Target.tagline: A woman hires a drifter as her guide through New Orleans in search of her father, who has gone missing. They discover a deadly game of cat and mouse behind his disappearance in the process.

Alien: Resurrection.tagline: 200 years after her death, Ellen Ripley is revived as a powerful human/Alien hybrid clone who must continue her war against the Aliens.

All the Pretty Horses.tagline: Two Texas cowboys head to Mexico in search of work, but soon find themselves in trouble with the law after one of them falls in love with a wealthy rancher's daughter.

Cool Runnings.tagline: Based on the true story of the first Jamaican bobsled team trying to make it to the winter Olympics.

8 Seconds.tagline: This film chronicles the life of Lane Frost, 1987 PRCA Bull Riding World Champion, his marriage and his friendships with Tuff Hedeman (three-time World Champion) and Cody Lambert.

Dungeons & Dragons.tagline: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.

Smokin' Aces.tagline: When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named Buddy Israel decides to turn state's evidence and testify against the mob, it seems that a whole lot of people would like to make sure he's no longer breathing.

Half Past Dead.tagline: This movie tells the story of a man who goes undercover in a hi-tech prison to find out information to help prosecute those who killed his wife. While there he stumbles onto a plot involving a death-row inmate and his $200 million stash of gold.

Timecop.tagline: An officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who has a tie to his past.

Elephant.tagline: Several ordinary high school students go through their daily routine as two others prepare for something more malevolent.

Manhunter.tagline: An F.B.I. specialist tracks a serial killer who appears to select his victims at random.

Enemy at the Gates.tagline: A Russian sniper and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

Lilo & Stitch.tagline: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive from the law.

The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou.tagline: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, oceanographer Steve Zissou rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

The Fan.tagline: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

Stop-Loss.tagline: A veteran soldier returns from his completed tour of duty in Iraq, only to find his life turned upside down when he is arbitrarily ordered to return to field duty by the Army.

Dances with Wolves.tagline: Lt. John Dunbar, exiled to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

Erin Brockovich.tagline: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

Quincea\u00f1era.tagline: As Magdalena's 15th birthday approaches, her simple, blissful life is complicated by the discovery that she's pregnant. Kicked out of her house, she finds a new family with her great-granduncle and gay cousin.

Flawless.tagline: An ultraconservative police officer suffers a debilitating stroke and is assigned to a rehabilitative program that includes singing lessons - with the drag queen next door.

Black Christmas.tagline: An escaped maniac returns to his childhood home on Christmas Eve, which is now a sorority house, and begins to murder the sorority sisters one by one.

My Super Ex-Girlfriend.tagline: When a regular guy dumps a superhero of her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell.

Hannibal.tagline: Hannibal returns to America and attempts to make contact with disgraced Agent Starling and survive a vengeful victim's plan.

Nowhere to Run.tagline: Escaped convict Sam Gillen single handedly takes on ruthless developers determined to evict Clydie - a widow with two young children. Nobody knows who Sam is.

Glengarry Glen Ross.tagline: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

Accepted.tagline: A high school slacker who's rejected by every school he applies to opts to create his own institution of higher learning, the South Harmon Institute of Technology, on a rundown piece of property near his hometown.

The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift.tagline: Alabama teenager Sean Boswell becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie.tagline: A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.

Mr 3000.tagline: Aging baseball star who goes by the nickname, Mr. 3000, finds out many years after retirement that he didn't quite reach 3,000 hits. Now at age 47 he's back to try and reach that goal.

Toy Story.tagline: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

Suspect Zero.tagline: A mysterious serial killer is hunting other serial killers - and one FBI agent suspects there may be more to the vigilante than they imagine.

The Messengers.tagline: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.

production.name: Diary of a Woman Productions Inc.

Diary of a Mad Black Woman.tagline: A couple's seemingly solid marriage begins to crumble when the wife discovers that her husband intends to divorce her.

Mulholland Dr..tagline: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

Monster House.tagline: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.

Formula 51.tagline: An American master chemist plans to score big on a once in a lifetime drug deal. All does not go as planned and he is soon entangled in a web of deceit.

Scenes from a Mall.tagline: On their 16th anniversary a married couple's trip to a Beverly Hills mall becomes the stage for personal revelations and deceptions.

The Green Mile.tagline: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

Thir13en Ghosts.tagline: When Cyrus Kriticos, a very rich collector of unique things dies, he leaves it all to his nephew and his family. All including his house, his fortune, and his malicious collection of ghosts!

Matewan.tagline: A labor union organizer comes to an embattled mining community brutally and violently dominated and harassed by the mining company.

The Truman Show.tagline: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a T.V. show.

PCU.tagline: A high school senior visits college for the weekend, and stay at the wildest house on campus in this classic tale of anti-political-correctness.

Mighty Joe Young.tagline: After Mighty Joe Young is brought to America for safety reasons, he escapes and rampages through Hollywood, spurred by tormentors out for revenge.

Just Like Heaven.tagline: A lonely landscape architect falls for the spirit of the beautiful woman who used to live in his new apartment.

The Name of the Rose.tagline: An intellectually nonconformist monk investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

Alex & Emma.tagline: A writer must turn out a novel in thirty days or face the wrath of loan sharks.

Rambo III.tagline: Rambo's Vietnam commanding officer Colonel Trautman is held hostage in Afghanistan, and its up to Rambo to rescue him.

Critters 2.tagline: Eggs of the small, furry alien carnivores are left behind on Earth and, after hatching, set their appetites on the next neighboring town.

Wild at Heart.tagline: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.

City of God.tagline: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

Vantage Point.tagline: The attempted assassination of the American President is told and re-told from several different perspectives.

Never Die Alone.tagline: A drug kingpin's return home touches off a turf war.

Thr3e.tagline: Innocent lives hang on the whim of an elusive psychopathic murderer whose strange riddles and impossible timelines force three people into a mission to end the game before one or all of them die.

Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me.tagline: Dr. Evil is back...and has invented a new time machine that allows him to go back to the 60's and steal Austin Powers's mojo, inadvertently leaving him "shagless".

Red Dragon.tagline: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer; aiding him is imprisoned criminal genius Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

Heat.tagline: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

The House of Mirth.tagline: A woman risks losing her chance of happiness with the only man she has ever loved.

The Guardian.tagline: A high school swim champion with a troubled past enrolls in the U.S. Coast Guard's "A" School, where legendary rescue swimmer Ben Randall teaches him some hard lessons about loss, love, and self-sacrifice.

Martian Child.tagline: A science-fiction writer, recently widowed, considers whether to adopt a hyper-imaginative 6-year-old abandoned and socially rejected boy who says he's really from Mars.

Open Season.tagline: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.

Sydney White.tagline: A modern retelling of Snow White set against students in their freshman year of college in the greek system.

Emma.tagline: In rural 1800s England things go bad for a young matchmaker after she finds a man for another woman.

The Last Samurai.tagline: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

Boogeyman.tagline: A young man tries to deal with the childhood terror that has affected his life.

From Beyond.tagline: Scientists create a resonator to stimulate the pineal gland (sixth sense), and open up a door to a parallel (and hostile) universe. Based on a story by H. P. Lovecraft.

The Rundown.tagline: A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.

The Devil's Own.tagline: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.

Spider-Man 2.tagline: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

Spider-Man 3.tagline: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

UHF.tagline: A local public station gets a new owner. The station becomes a hit, with all sorts of hilarious sight gags and wacky humor.

The Celestine Prophecy.tagline: An adaptation of James Redfield's novel about the search for a sacred manuscript in the Peruvian rain forest.

production.name: MFP Munich Film Partners GmbH & Company I. Produktions KG

The General's Daughter.tagline: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

Apollo 13.tagline: Three astronauts must devise a strategy to return to Earth safely after their spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage.

Mamma Mia!.tagline: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular '70s group ABBA.

Eragon.tagline: In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragon's egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realized he's the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.

Waiting to Exhale.tagline: Based on Terry McMillan's novel, this film follows four very different African-American women and their relationships with the male gender.

Hellraiser.tagline: An unfaithful wife encounters the zombie of her dead lover, who's being chased by demons after he escaped from their sado-masochistic Hell.

Return of the Living Dead 2.tagline: Curious kids unearth the barrels that helped revive the dead of the first film, which proves the second time's an undead charm.

The First Wives Club.tagline: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

Dirty Dancing.tagline: Spending the summer in a holiday camp with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor Johnny Castle.

Thelma & Louise.tagline: An Arkansas waitress and a housewife shoot a rapist and take off in a '66 Thunderbird.

Eight Below.tagline: Brutal cold forces two Antarctic explorers to leave their team of sled dogs behind as they fend for their survival.

White Fang.tagline: Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.

Kissing Jessica Stein.tagline: A woman searching for the perfect man instead discovers the perfect woman.

The Next Best Thing.tagline: Abbie, tired of failed relationships, has a one-night-stand with her gay friend; they agree to raise the resulting baby together.

The King and I.tagline: Traveling to the exotic kingdom of Siam, English Schoolteacher Anna Leonowens soon discovers that her most difficult challenge is the stubborn, imperious King himself.

Enough.tagline: On the run from an abusive husband, a young mother begins to train herself to fight back.

The Fifth Element.tagline: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr Zorg at bay.

Leatherheads.tagline: In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under.

Atonement.tagline: Fledgling writer Briony Tallis, as a 13-year-old, irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit. Based on the British romance novel by Ian McEwan.

Let It Ride.tagline: A nosy cab driver gets a hot tip on a race horse and wins big, but he can't seem to stop gambling. Will he go broke or walk home with a pretty penny?

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. Produktions KG

Ghosts of Mars.tagline: A story of human colonists on Mars who must be rescued after becoming possessed by vengeful Martian ghosts.

Harsh Times.tagline: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End.tagline: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

production.name: Mediastream Film GmbH & Co. Productions KG

The Fast and the Furious.tagline: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

Hoffa.tagline: A film based on the story of legendary union figure Jimmy Hoffa.

No Country for Old Men.tagline: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

The Curse of the Were-Rabbit.tagline: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

Ultraviolet.tagline: A beautiful hemophage infected with a virus that gives her superhuman powers has to protect a boy in a futuristic world, who is thought to be carrying antigens that would destroy all hemophages.

Face/Off.tagline: To foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a face-transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a ruthless terrorist, but the plan backfires when the same criminal impersonates the cop with the same method.

Blue Streak.tagline: A thief turned ex-con poses as a cop to retrieve a diamond he stole years ago.

Return to Never Land.tagline: In London during World War II, this is the story of Wendy's daughter, Jane, who is kidnapped by Captain Hook and Peter Pan must come to the rescue.

America's Sweethearts.tagline: A movie publicist deals with the messy public split of his movie's co-stars while keeping reporters at bay while a reclusive director holds the film's print hostage.

Thumbelina.tagline: The tiny girl meets a fairy prince who saves her from the creatures of the woods.

The Legend of Drunken Master.tagline: A young martial artist is caught between respecting his pacifist father's wishes or stopping a group of disrespectful foreigners from stealing precious artifacts.

The Specialist.tagline: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

George of the Jungle.tagline: George grows up in the jungle raised by apes. Based on the Cartoon series.

Fatal Attraction.tagline: A married man's one night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

Forces of Nature.tagline: A soon-to-be-married man encounters an exciting stranger after his plane suffers an accident on takeoff.

production.name: Munich Film Partners & Company (MFP) MI2 Productions

Mission: Impossible II.tagline: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera"

The Musketeer.tagline: Alexander Dumas' novel is updated with an eastern influence as D'Artagnan attempts to join the king's elite guards, the Royal Musketeers, and find the man who killed his parents.

Stuart Little 2.tagline: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

production.name: MMDP Munich Movie Development & Production GmbH & Co. Project KG

Coach Carter.tagline: Controversy surrounds high school basketball coach Ken Carter after he benches his entire team for breaking their academic contract with him.

Hudson Hawk.tagline: A cat burglar is forced to steal Da Vinci works of art for a world domination plot.

Out of Africa.tagline: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

Notes on a Scandal.tagline: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her 15-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond platonic friendship.

Pumpkinhead.tagline: A man conjures up a gigantic vengeance demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy the teenagers who accidentally killed his son.

Shoot 'Em Up.tagline: A man named Mr. Smith delivers a woman's baby during a shootout, and is then called upon to protect the newborn from the army of gunmen.

Jackie Brown.tagline: A flight attendant becomes a key figure in a plot between the police and an arms dealer.

Death to Smoochy.tagline: Kids show host Rainbow Randolph is fired in disgrace while his replacement, Sheldon Mopes, aka Smoochy the Rhino, finds himself a rising star. Unfortunately for Sheldon, the kid's TV business isn't all child's play.

Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius.tagline: An 8-year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.

The Dead Pool.tagline: Dirty Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.

The Whole Ten Yards.tagline: Jimmy the Tulip's (Willis) quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz (Perry), whose wife (Henstridge) has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill (Peet) spring into action.

Home Alone 2: Lost in New York.tagline: One year after Kevin was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself in New York City, and the same criminals are not far behind.

Troll.tagline: A wicked troll king in search of a mystical ring that will return him to his human form invades a San Francisco apartment complex where a powerful witch lives.

Top Gun.tagline: As students at the Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young flyer learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

P.S. I Love You.tagline: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

The Piano.tagline: A mute woman along with her young daughter, and her prized piano, are sent to 1850s New Zealand for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, and she's soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

Dirty Work.tagline: A loser finds success in the revenge-for-hire business.

Dutch.tagline: To get to know his girlfriend's son, a man volunteers to pick him up from a prep school....only to learn that her son's not the nicest kid.

Valentine.tagline: Five women are stalked by an unknown assailant while preparing for Valentine's Day

Crooklyn.tagline: From Spike Lee comes this vibrant semi-autobiographical portrait of a school-teacher, her stubborn jazz-musician husband and their five kids living in '70s Brooklyn.

Very Bad Things.tagline: A prostitute is killed during a bachelor party and the attendees turn on each other as the wedding approaches.

Once Bitten.tagline: A vampire Countess needs to drink the blood of a virgin in order to keep her eternal beauty. It seems that all is hopeless, until she bumps into Mark Kendall.

Rocky IV.tagline: After iron man Drago, a highly intimidating 6-foot-5, 261-pound Soviet athlete, literally destroys Apollo Creed in an exhibition match, Rocky comes to the heart of Russia for 15 pile-driving boxing rounds of revenge.

The Amityville Horror.tagline: A family is terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a home that was the site of a grisly mass-murder.

House of Wax.tagline: A group of unwitting teens are stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.

The Perfect Holiday.tagline: A young girl turns to a department store Santa in the hopes that he will help find a new husband for her divorced mother.

Left Behind.tagline: The Biblical prophecy of Armegeddon begins when the Rapture instantly takes all believers in Christ from the Earth. A reporter left behind learns that the Anti-Christ will soon take power.

TMNT.tagline: The continued adventures of the four adolescent mutated turtles gifted in the art of the ninja, as they attempt to stop a mysterious evil that threatens to end the world.

2 Fast 2 Furious.tagline: Brian O'Conner and childhood friend Roman Pearce are re-united by the FBI to bring down a Miami drug exporter in exchange for clear records.

Road to Perdition.tagline: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.

Disturbing Behavior.tagline: The new kid in town stumbles across something sinister about the town's method of transforming its unruly teens into upstanding citizens.

The Cooler.tagline: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.

Always.tagline: A romantic adventure about a legendary pilot's passion for dare-devil firefighting and his girl.

Dr. Dolittle 2.tagline: Dolittle must save a forest and a bear's life.

Ladr\u00f3n que roba a ladr\u00f3n.tagline: Two former thieves reunite to rob the biggest thief they know -- Moctesuma Valdez, a TV infomercial guru who's made millions selling worthless health products to poor Latino immigrants. When none of their affiliates want to go undercover as day laborers to pull off the heist, the two men turn to the real thing for help.

Dinosaur.tagline: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sancturary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

Journey to the Center of the Earth.tagline: On a quest to find out what happened to his missing brother, a scientist, his nephew and their mountain guide discover a fantastic and dangerous lost world in the center of the earth.

The Limey.tagline: An extremely volatile and dangerous Englishman goes to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his daughter's death.

Why Did I Get Married?.tagline: The big screen adaptation of Perry's stage play about the trials of marriage, and what happens to one family when a sexy young temptress arrives on the scene.

The Proposition.tagline: A lawman apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother, or else they'll execute his younger brother.

Fantastic Four.tagline: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom

Metropolitan.tagline: A group of young upper-class Manhattanites are blithely passing through the gala debutante season, when an unusual outsider joins them and stirs them up.

Hard Candy.tagline: A teenage girl raids a man's home, suspecting he is a pedophile, in order to expose him.

The Clan of the Cave Bear.tagline: A young Cro-Magnons woman is raised by Neanderthals.

Night at the Museum.tagline: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

Radio.tagline: The story of a high school coach and the developmentally challenged man whom he took under his wing.

The Mask of Zorro.tagline: A young thief, seeking revenge over the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who is also seeking a vengeance of his own.

The Royal Tenenbaums.tagline: An estranged family of former child prodigies reunites when one of their member announces he has a terminal illness.

The Brothers McMullen.tagline: Three Irish Catholic brothers from Long Island struggle to deal with love, marriage, and infidelity.

Black Book.tagline: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

The Majestic.tagline: Set in 1951, a blacklisted Hollywood writer gets into a car accident, loses his memory and settles down in a small town where he is mistaken for a long-lost son.

The Hoax.tagline: In what would cause a fantastic media frenzy, Clifford Irving sells his bogus biography of Howard Hughes to a premiere publishing house in the early 1970s.

The Nightmare Before Christmas.tagline: Jack Skellington, king of Halloweentown, discovers Christmas Town, but doesn't quite understand the concept.

Charlie and the Chocolate Factory.tagline: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

An Unfinished Life.tagline: A down on her luck woman, desperate to provide care for her daughter, moves in with her father in-law from whom she is estranged. Through time, they learn to forgive each other and heal old wounds.

Dante's Peak.tagline: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside named Dante's Peak after a long dormant volcano, which has recently been named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

Herbie Fully Loaded.tagline: Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Number 53 - the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own - puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.

The Ladykillers.tagline: An eccentric, if not charming Southern professor and his crew pose as a band in order to rob a casino, all under the nose of his unsuspecting landlord: a sharp old woman.

The Offspring.tagline: In a small Tennessee town, an historian relates four horror stories to a reporter.

Brigham City.tagline: The sheriff of a small Utah community searches for a serial killer.

RV.tagline: Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.

Anna and the King.tagline: The story of the romance between the King of Siam and the widowed British schoolteacher Anna Leonowens during the 1860's.

The Da Vinci Code.tagline: A murder inside the Louvre and clues in Da Vinci paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years -- which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

The Missing.tagline: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

Bulletproof.tagline: A group of dangerous terrorists succeeds to get hold of a tank of the army and all its crew.

The Relic.tagline: A homicide detective and an anthropologist try to destroy a South American lizard-like god, who's on a people eating rampage in a Chicago museum.

The Kite Runner.tagline: After spending years in California, Amir returns to his homeland in Afghanistan to help his old friend Hassan, whose son is in trouble.

Hancock.tagline: A hard-living superhero who has fallen out of favor with the public enters into a questionable relationship with the wife of the public relations professional who's trying to repair his image.

Jeepers Creepers.tagline: A brother and sister driving home for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature in the isolated countryside that is on the last day of its ritualistic eating spree.

Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the.tagline: After three years of fighting in the Clone Wars, Anakin Skywalker falls prey to the Sith Lord's lies and makes an enemy of the Jedi and those he loves, concluding his journey to the Dark Side.

One True Thing.tagline: A career woman reassesses her parents' lives after she is forced to care for her cancer-stricken mother.

Dark City.tagline: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun and run by beings with telekinetic powers who seek the souls of humans.

Bon voyage.tagline: An actress, a writer, a student, and a government worker band together in an effort to escape Paris as the Nazis move into the city.

Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde.tagline: Elle Woods heads to Washington D.C. to join the staff of a congresswoman in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.

The Fountain.tagline: Spanning three parallel stories over a millennium, 'The Fountain' is a story of love, death, spirituality, and the fragility of our existence in this world.

3 Men and a Baby.tagline: Three bachelors find themselves forced to take care of a baby left by one of the guys' girlfriends.

The Silence of the Lambs.tagline: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

Mannequin: On the Move.tagline: A young department store intern falls in love with a female store mannequin who is really a peasant girl fallen under a thousand year spell. She comes to life whenever he removes the cursed necklace from her.

De-Lovely.tagline: Inspecting a magical biographical stage musical, composer Cole Porter reviews his life and career with his wife, Linda.

Rounders.tagline: A young man is a reformed gambler who must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks.

Step Brothers.tagline: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents get married.

Lucky You.tagline: A hotshot poker player tries to win a tournament in Vegas, but is fighting a losing battle with his personal problems.

Ghosts of Mississippi.tagline: The widow of murdered civil rights leader Medger Evers and a district attorney struggle to finally bring the murderer to justice.

Jacob's Ladder.tagline: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam vet attempts to discover his past while suffering from a severe case of disassociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusion, and perception of death.

Enchanted.tagline: A classic Disney fairytale collides with modern-day New York City in a story about a fairytale princess who is sent to our world by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world?

Open Range.tagline: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

Affliction.tagline: A deeply troubled small town cop investigates a suspicious hunting death while events occur that cause him to mentally disintergrate.

Lost & Found.tagline: In order to impress his beautiful French neighbor, Dylan Ramsey dognaps her pet pooch so he can return him and become a hero. Unfortunately, things do not work out as planned.

Milk.tagline: The story of Harvey Milk, and his struggles as an American gay activist who fought for gay rights and became California's first openly gay elected official.

G.I. Jane.tagline: A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

The Negotiator.tagline: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

Rat Race.tagline: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

Catch That Kid.tagline: A girl and her two friends raid a bank, looking for the money needed for financing the cure of her dying father.

Earth Girls Are Easy.tagline: A spaceship with three furry aliens lands in a California girl's swimming pool, so she makes friends with them.

The Lost World: Jurassic Park.tagline: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

Lust, Caution.tagline: An espionage thriller set in WWII-era Shanghai, in which a young woman, Wang Jiazhi, gets swept up in a dangerous game of emotional intrigue with a powerful political figure, Mr. Yee.

Alvin and the Chipmunks.tagline: A struggling songwriter named Dave Seville finds success when he comes across a trio of singing chipmunks: mischievous leader Alvin, brainy Simon, and chubby, impressionable Theodore.

Trust the Man.tagline: After all the drama, cheating, and trial separations, two men (Crudup, Duchovny) fight to save their respective relationships.

Broadway Danny Rose.tagline: In his attempts to reconcile a lounge singer with his mistress, a hapless talent agent is mistaken as her lover by a jealous gangster.

American Pie.tagline: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

production.name: Munich Film Partners New Century & Company (MFP) HAM Productions

Marci X.tagline: A Jewish-American Princess is forced to take control of a hard-core hip-hop record label and tries to rein the one of the label's most controversial rappers.

The Brave One.tagline: A woman struggles to recover from a brutal attack by setting out on a mission for revenge.

Elizabeth.tagline: A film of the early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

xXx: State of the Union.tagline: Darius Stone, a new agent in the XXX program, is sent to Washington, DC to defuse a power struggle amongst national leaders.

Nine Lives.tagline: Captives of the very relationships that define and sustain them, nine women resiliently meet the travails and disappointments of life.

Sunshine Cleaning.tagline: In order to raise the tuition to send her young son to private school, a mom starts an unusual business -- a biohazard removal/crime scene clean-up service -- with her unreliable sister.

Wishmaster.tagline: A demonic djinn attempts to grant its owner three wishes, which will allow him to summon his brethren to earth.

Raise Your Voice.tagline: A girl from a small town heads to the big city of Los Angeles to spend the summer at a performing arts high school.

Raw Deal.tagline: A former FBI agent turned small town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by the Chicago Mafia.

Eyes Wide Shut.tagline: A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.

Darkness Falls.tagline: A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.

The Jackal.tagline: An imprisoned IRA sniper is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.

production.name: Munich Film Partners & Company (MFP) ROE Production

Rules of Engagement.tagline: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a third world country.

Hairspray.tagline: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

Quigley Down Under.tagline: Sharpshooter Matt Quigley is hired from Montana by an Australian rancher paying a very high price. But when Quigley arrives Down Under, all is not as it seems.

The Secrets of Jonathan Sperry.tagline: An wise old Christian man imparts Biblical truths to three boys during the summer of 1970.

Into the Wild.tagline: After graduating from Emory University, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

Scary Movie 2.tagline: Four teens are tricked by their professor into visiting a haunted house for a school project.

Brazil.tagline: A bureaucrat in a retro-future world tries to correct an administrative error and himself becomes an enemy of the state.

Anger Management.tagline: Sandler plays a businessman who is wrongly sentenced to an anger-management program, where he meets an aggressive instructor.

Flicka.tagline: Young Katy claims a wild horse as her own -- an effort to prove to her father that she is capable of one day taking over the family ranch.

Love Stinks.tagline: Seth Winnick has it all: a successful career in television, good friends, and a passionate relationship with beautiful Chelsea. However, when he fails to make a timely marriage proposal, Chelsea tries to make his life hell.

Whatever It Takes.tagline: Two Los Angeles cops go undercover to investigate the distribution of steroids to wrestlers and body builders.

The Gospel.tagline: This is a story about a successful young R&B; singer that has an unlikely homecoming when his father, the bishop, becomes ill.

Josie and the Pussycats.tagline: A girl group find themselves in the middle of a conspiracy to deliver subliminal messages through popular music in this send up of the music industry and pop culture.

The Perfect Score.tagline: Six high school seniors decide to break into the Princeton Testing Center so they can steal the answers to their upcoming SAT tests and all get perfect scores.

Firestarter.tagline: A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telekinetic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.

Blood and Wine.tagline: A man who has failed as a father and husband commits a heist to make money for his fledging business, but things become complicated when his wife interferes.

Man's Best Friend.tagline: A dog turns from man's best friend into man's worst nightmare as he attacks everything that moves.

Thirteen Days.tagline: A dramatization of President Kennedy's administration's struggle to contain the Cuban Missile Crisis in October of 1962.

Into the Blue.tagline: A group of divers find themselves in deep trouble with a drug lord after they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.

Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa.tagline: The animals try to fly back to New York City, but crash-land on an African wildlife refuge, where Alex is reunited with his parents.

Fantastic 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer.tagline: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.

Candyman.tagline: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

Rebound.tagline: An acclaimed college hoops coach is demoted to a junior varsity team after a public meltdown.

What a Girl Wants.tagline: An American teenager learns that her father is a wealthy British politician running for office. Although she is eager to find him, she realizes it could cause a scandal and cost him the election.

Swordfish.tagline: A secretive renegade counter-terrorist co-opts the world's greatest hacker (who is trying to stay clean) to steal billions in US Government dirty money.

The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the.tagline: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

The Lives of Others.tagline: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey.tagline: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

The Jungle Book 2.tagline: Mowgli, missing the jungle and his old friends, runs away from the man village unaware of the danger he's in by going back to the wild.

Blues Brothers 2000.tagline: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."

Happily N'Ever After.tagline: An alliance of evil-doers, led by Frieda, looks to take over Fairy Tale Land. But when Ella realizes her stepmother is out to ruin her storybook existence, she takes a dramatic turn and blossoms into the leader of the resistance effort.

Tales from the Hood.tagline: A strange funeral director tells four strange tales of horror with an African American focus to three drug dealers he traps in his place of business.

Beverly Hills Chihuahua.tagline: While on vacation in Mexico, Chloe, a ritzy Beverly Hills chihuahua, finds herself lost and in need of assistance in order to get back home.

Bend It Like Beckham.tagline: The daughter of orthodox Sikh rebels against her parents' traditionalism by running off to Germany with a football team (soccer in America).

The Happening.tagline: A strange, horrible and unprecedented crisis begins in Central Park. A high school science teacher, his wife and a young girl do what they can to survive it.

Spawn.tagline: A mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

The Animal.tagline: After receiving organ transplants from various animal donors, a man finds himself taking on the traits of those animals.

The Nativity Story.tagline: A drama that focuses on the period in Mary and Joseph's life where they journeyed to Bethlehem for the birth of Jesus.

Starsky & Hutch.tagline: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red-and-white Ford Torino with the help of police snitch called Huggy Bear.

Batman Begins.tagline: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

Shrek the Third.tagline: When his new father-in-law, King Harold falls ill, Shrek is looked at as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away. Not one to give up his beloved swamp, Shrek recruits his friends Donkey and Puss in Boots to install the rebellious Artie as the new king. Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.

The Adventures of Pluto Nash.tagline: In the future, a man struggles to keep his lunar nightclub out of the hands of the mafia.

Pearl Harbor.tagline: Pearl Harbor follows the story of two best friends, Rafe and Danny, and their love lives as they go off to join the war.

Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers.tagline: Ten years after his original massacre, the invalid Michael Myers awakens and returns to Haddonfield to kill his seven-year-old niece on Halloween. Can Dr. Loomis stop him?

Six Days Seven Nights.tagline: Robin Monroe, a New York magazine editor, and the gruff pilot Quinn Harris must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island.

Boiling Point.tagline: A pair of sociopath killers take on the police and the mob in order to make one last big score.

License to Drive.tagline: A teen decides to go for a night on the town with his friends despite flunking his driver's test.

I Am Sam.tagline: A mentally retarded man fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter, and in the process teaches his cold-hearted lawyer the value of love and family.

Philadelphia.tagline: When a man with AIDS is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

The Contender.tagline: Sexy secrets from a womans past come to light as she runs for Vice President.

Miracle Mile.tagline: A young man hears a chance phone call telling him that a nuclear war has started and missiles will hit his city in 70 minutes.

In the Line of Fire.tagline: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

Die Another Day.tagline: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul who is funding the development of an international space weapon.

Strange Days.tagline: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a police conspiracy in 1999 Los Angeles.

Pi.tagline: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

Surviving Picasso.tagline: The passionate Merchant-Ivory drama tells the story of Francoise Gilot, the only lover of Pablo Picasso who was strong enough to withstand his ferocious cruelty and move on with her life.

Home Alone.tagline: An 8-year-old boy who is accidentally left behind while his family flies to France for Christmas must defend his home against idiotic burglars.

S.W.A.T..tagline: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody and only the LAPD's Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

Mystic Pizza.tagline: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

Absolute Power.tagline: A career thief witnesses a horrific crime involving the U.S. President.

The Grey Zone.tagline: A Nazi doctor, along with the Sonderkomando, Jews who are forced to work in the crematoria of Auschwitz against their fellow Jews, find themselves in a moral grey zone.

The Story of Us.tagline: Ben and Katie Jordan are a married couple who go through hard times in fifteen years of marriage.

Turbulence.tagline: After a shootout on a flight transporting prisoners, a stewardess must outwit a smooth-talking serial killer and land the plane herself.

Bedazzled.tagline: Hopeless dweeb Elliot Richards is granted 7 wishes by the devil to snare Allison, the girl of his dreams, in exchange for his soul.

Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron.tagline: As a wild stallion travels across the frontiers of the Old West, he befriends a young human and finds true love with a mare.

Next of Kin.tagline: Truman, a Chicago cop, sets out to find the killer of his brother. Meanwhile, another of his brothers, Briar (a hillbilly) decides to find the killer himself.

Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow.tagline: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.

Noises Off....tagline: A travelling theater group find so much action going on behind-the-scenes, they almost ruin the performances.

Lions for Lambs.tagline: Injuries sustained by two Army rangers behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.

The Women.tagline: A wealthy New Yorker leaves her cheating husband and bonds with other society women at a resort.

Under Siege 2: Dark Territory.tagline: Casey Ryback hops on a Colorado to LA train to start a vacation with his niece. Early into the trip, terrorists board the train and use it as a mobile HQ to hijack a top secret destructive US satellite.

Mimic.tagline: Three years ago entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease, now the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind!

Tropic Thunder.tagline: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

The Talented Mr. Ripley.tagline: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy, named Dickie Greenleaf. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

Mystic River.tagline: With a childhood tragedy that overshadowed their lives, three men are reunited by circumstance when one loses a daughter.

Mickey Blue Eyes.tagline: An English auctioneer proposes to the daughter of a mafia kingpin, only to realize that certain "favors" would be asked of him.

The Other Side of Heaven.tagline: John Groberg, a farm kid from Idaho Falls, crosses an ocean to become a missionary in the remote and exotic Tongan islands during the 1950's.

Street Fighter.tagline: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.

Brokedown Palace.tagline: Two women are arrested for smuggling while vacationing in Thailand.

Critters.tagline: A race of small, furry aliens make lunch out of the locals in a farming town.

A Night at the Roxbury.tagline: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

The Flintstones.tagline: In this live-action feature of the cartoon show, Fred Flintstone finally gets the job he's always wanted, but it may just come at a price.

Independence Day.tagline: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy. Fighting superior technology, Man's best weapon is the will to survive.

Untraceable.tagline: FBI agent Jennifer Marsh is tasked with hunting down a seemingly untraceable serial killer who posts live videos of his victims on the Internet. As time runs out, the cat and mouse chase becomes more personal.

The Siege.tagline: The secret US abduction of a suspected terrorist leads to a wave of terrorist attacks in New York that lead to the declaration of martial law.

Calendar Girl.tagline: Three young men go on an end of the summer trip to Hollywood, CA. Their quest: to fulfill the fantasy of meeting Marilyn Monroe.

Cousins.tagline: Two couples go to a mutual friends wedding, and end up swapping partners.

Lucky Numbers.tagline: A television weatherman scams a local lottery.

Character.tagline: Jacob Katadreuffe lives mute with his mother, has no contact with his father who only works against him and wants to become a lawyer, at all costs.

The Life of David Gale.tagline: A man against capital punishment is accused of murdering a fellow activist and is sent to death row.

The X Files: I Want to Believe.tagline: Mulder and Scully are called back to duty by the FBI when a former priest claims to be receiving psychic visions pertaining to a kidnapped agent.

The Crow: City of Angels.tagline: Many years after the first film, the spirit of the Crow resurrects another man seeking revenge for the murder of his son.

Hot Shots!.tagline: Parody of "Top Gun" in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.

The Peacemaker.tagline: A US Army colonel and a civilian woman supervising him must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.

Adaptation..tagline: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt The Orchid Thief by Susan Orlean for the screen.

101 Dalmatians.tagline: A woman kidnaps puppies to kill them for their fur, but various animals then gang up against her and get their revenge in slapstick fashion.

Driving Miss Daisy.tagline: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

Michael Clayton.tagline: A law firm brings in its "fixer" to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multi-billion dollar class action suit.

Hulk.tagline: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

Awake.tagline: The story focuses on a man who suffers "anesthetic awareness" and finds himself awake and aware, but paralyzed, during heart surgery. His mother must wrestle with her own demons as a drama unfolds around them, while trying to unfold the story hidden behind her son's young wife.

Virtuosity.tagline: A virtual-reality serial killer manages to escape into the real world.

Luther.tagline: During the early 16th Century idealistic German monk Martin Luther, disgusted by the materialism in the church, begins the dialogue that will lead to the Protestant Reformation.

Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Cl.tagline: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padmé, while Obi-Wan investigates an assassination attempt on the Senator and discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.

The Last Legion.tagline: As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.

Heist.tagline: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

Eagle Eye.tagline: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.

Underworld: Evolution.tagline: Picking up directly from the previous film, vampire warrior Selena and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

Trick.tagline: The misadventures of two young gay men, trying to find a place to be alone, one night in Manhattan.

Wise Guys.tagline: Harry Valentini and Moe Dickstein are both errand boys for the Mob. When they lose $250,000, they are set up to kill each other. But they run off to Atlantic City and comedy follows.

The Good Son.tagline: A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle, and befriends his cousin who's the same age. But his cousin begins showing increasing signs of violent behavior.

Deja Vu.tagline: An A.T.F. agent travels back in time to save a woman from being murdered, falling in love with her in the process.

The Color Purple.tagline: The life and trials of a young African American woman.

Little Nicky.tagline: A movie about the independent minded son of Beelzebub and the mischief he creates.

She's the One.tagline: The love lives of two brothers, Mickey and Francis, interconnect as Francis cheats on his wife with Mickey's ex-girlfriend, while Mickey impulsively marries a stranger.

The Scorpion King.tagline: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.

Catwoman.tagline: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

Pan's Labyrinth.tagline: In the fascist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

Made in America.tagline: A young black woman discovers that her father was a sperm donor, and if that weren't bad enough, he's white.

Young Guns.tagline: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

Sweet Land.tagline: In 1920, Inge, a German national, travels from Norway to rural Minnesota for her arranged marriage to Olaf, a Norwegian farmer; bureaucracy and prejudice cause major complications.

Man Trouble.tagline: A sleazy but affable guard dog trainer is blackmailed to steal a manuscript for a tell-all book from one of his clients.

When a Stranger Calls.tagline: During an otherwise routine babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.
