Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Li.tagline: Adventuress Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box before an evil scientist and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her.

production.name: Shallow Hal Filmproduktion GmbH & Co. KG

Shallow Hal.tagline: A shallow man falls in love with a 300 pound woman because of her "inner beauty".

Revolutionary Road.tagline: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children. Based on a novel by Richard Yates.

Infamous.tagline: While researching his book In Cold Blood, writer Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.

Clueless.tagline: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

The Importance of Being Earnest.tagline: In 1890s London, two friends use the same pseudonym ("Ernest") for their on-the-sly activities. Hilarity ensues.

Epic Movie.tagline: A comedic satire of films that are large in scope, reputation and popularity

The Blair Witch Project.tagline: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

The Bank Job.tagline: Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry. But Terry and his crew don't realize the boxes also contain a treasure trove of dirty secrets - secrets that will thrust them into a deadly web of corruption and illicit scandal.

Poetic Justice.tagline: In this film, we see the world through the eyes of main character Justice, a young African-American poet. A mail carrier invites a few friends along for a long overnight delivery run.

Screwed.tagline: A chauffeur kidnaps his rich boss's dog to hold it for ransom, but when she accidentally gets the dog back, she thinks that it's the chauffeur who's been kidnapped.

End of Days.tagline: At the end of the century, Satan visits New York in search of a bride. It's up to an ex-cop who now runs an elite security outfit to stop him.

Freddy vs. Jason.tagline: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenage population. Except this time, they're out to get each other, too.

Legally Blonde.tagline: When a blonde sorority queen is dumped by her boyfriend, she decides to follow him to law school to get him back and, once there, learns she has more legal savvy than she ever imagined.

MirrorMask.tagline: In a fantasy world of opposing kingdoms, a 15-year old girl must find the fabled MirrorMask in order to save the kingdom and get home.

Flight of the Phoenix.tagline: Survivors of a plane crash in the Mongolian desert work together to build a new plane.

Tarzan.tagline: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

The Banger Sisters.tagline: Lavinia and Suzette, former rock groupies and best friends, reconnect after 20 years; one is still as wild as ever, while the other has adopted a more conservative lifestyle.

Letters from Iwo Jima.tagline: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

Saving Private Ryan.tagline: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Waking Ned Devine.tagline: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

A Civil Action.tagline: The families of children who died sue two companies for dumping toxic waste: a tort so expensive to prove, the case could bankrupt their lawyer.

The Believer.tagline: A young Jewish man develops a fiercely anti-Semitic worldview. Based on the true story of a KKK member in the 1960s who was revealed to be Jewish by a New York Times reporter.

Sleepless in Seattle.tagline: A recently-widowed man's son calls a radio talk show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

Undercover Brother.tagline: When "The Man" tries to derail a black candidate's presidential campaign, Undercover Brother and his fellow secret agents come to the rescue.

Poltergeist III.tagline: Carol Anne is staying with her aunt in a highrise building, and the supernatural forces that have haunted her previously follow her there.

21.tagline: "21" is the fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings.

Midnight Run.tagline: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the FBI, and the Mafia after jumping bail.

American Dreamz.tagline: The new season of "American Dreamz," the wildly popular television singing contest, has captured the country's attention, as the competition looks to be between a young Midwestern gal (Moore) and a showtunes-loving young man from Orange County (Golzari). Recently awakened President Staton (Quaid) even wants in on the craze, as he signs up for the potential explosive season finale.

Ernest Saves Christmas.tagline: Ernest helps Santa Claus as he searches for his successor.

Spider.tagline: A mentally disturbed man takes residence in a halfway house. His mind gradually slips back into the realm created by his illness, where he replays a key part of his childhood.

Blades of Glory.tagline: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

Gothika.tagline: Ghost story in which a repressed female psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the very asylum where she worked with no memory of why she is there and what she has done.

The Duchess.tagline: A chronicle of the life of 18th century aristocrat Georgiana, Duchess of Devonshire, who was reviled for her extravagant political and personal life.

Goodfellas.tagline: Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.

A Passage to India.tagline: Cultural mistrust and false accusations doom a friendship in British colonial India between an Indian doctor, an Englishwoman engaged to marry a city magistrate, and an English educator.

The Mexican.tagline: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams.tagline: The Cortez siblings set out for a mysterious island, where they encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.

Snow Day.tagline: When a school in upstate New York is snowed in, a group of students hi-jack a plow to keep the school closed.

Fantasia/2000.tagline: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

District B13.tagline: Set in the ghettos of Paris in 2010, an undercover cop and ex-thug try to infiltrate a gang in order to defuse a neutron bomb.

Saving Silverman.tagline: A pair of buddies conspire to save their best friend from marrying the wrong woman.

Brown Sugar.tagline: Friends since childhood, a magazine editor and a hip-hop record executive stumble into romantic territory.

Priceless.tagline: Through a set of wacky circumstances, a young gold digger mistakenly woos a mild-mannered bartender thinking he's a wealthy suitor.

production.name: Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

Owning Mahowny.tagline: A bank manager with: (a) a gambling problem and (b) access to a multimillion dollar account gets into a messy situation. Based on the story of the largest one-man bank fraud in Canadian history.

Four Weddings and a Funeral.tagline: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

Burn After Reading.tagline: A disk containing the memoirs of a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous gym employees who attempt to sell it.

Message in a Bottle.tagline: A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.

Once Upon a Time in America.tagline: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

A Chorus Line.tagline: Hopefuls try out before a demanding director for a part in a new musical.

Kit Kittredge: An American Girl.tagline: Set in Cincinnati at the height of the Great Depression, Kit Kittredge, a resourceful young girl, helps her mother run a boardinghouse after her father loses his job.

Rumble in the Bronx.tagline: A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.

The Forgotten.tagline: Told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover that there's a much bigger enemy at work.

Babel.tagline: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.

The Devil's Backbone.tagline: After Carlos, a 12-year-old whose father has died in the Spanish Civil War, arrives at an ominous boy's orphanage he discovers the school is haunted and has many dark secrets that he must uncover.

Bug.tagline: An unhinged war veteran holes up with a lonely woman in a spooky Oklahoma motel room. The line between reality and delusion is blurred as they discover a bug infestation.

Identity.tagline: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain-storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

Billy Bathgate.tagline: In the year 1935, a teen named Billy Bathgate finds first love while becoming the protégé of fledgling gangster Dutch Schultz.

The Producers.tagline: After putting together another Broadway flop, down-on-his-luck producer Max Bialystock teams up with timid accountant Leo Bloom in a get-rich-quick scheme to put on the world's worst show.

Quills.tagline: In a Napoleonic era insane asylum, an inmate, the irrepressible Marquis De Sade, fights a battle of wills against a tyrannically prudish doctor.

Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure.tagline: Two seemingly dumb teens struggle to prepare a historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

Autumn in New York.tagline: Romantic drama about an aging playboy who falls for a sweet, but terminally ill, young woman.

Doctor Dolittle.tagline: A Doctor finds out that he can understand what animals are saying. And the animals find out that he understands.

Superman Returns.tagline: After a long visit to the lost remains of the planet Krypton, the Man of Steel returns to Earth to become the people's savior once again and reclaim the love of Lois Lane.

Ghoulies.tagline: A young man and his girlfriend move into an man's old mansion home, where he becomes possessed by a need to control ancient demons.

Curse of the Golden Flower.tagline: During China's Tang dynasty the emperor has taken the princess of a neighboring province as wife. She has borne him two sons and raised his eldest. Now his control over his dominion is complete, including the royal family itself.

My Best Friend's Girl.tagline: Tank faces the ultimate test of friendship when his best friend hires him to take his ex-girlfriend out on a lousy date in order to make her realize how great her former boyfriend is.

Alien Nation.tagline: A few years from now, Earth will have the first contact with an alien civilization. These aliens, known as Newcomers, slowly begin to be integrated into human society after years of quarantine.

The Medallion.tagline: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.

Striking Distance.tagline: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop, and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

Little Miss Sunshine.tagline: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas.tagline: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace, and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.

Being Human.tagline: One man must learn the meaning of courage across four lifetimes centuries apart.

Dick.tagline: Story of two girls who wander away from a White House tour and meet President Nixon.

My Cousin Vinny.tagline: Two New Yorkers are accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college, and one of their cousins--an inexperienced, loudmouth lawyer not accustomed to Southern rules and manners--comes in to defend them.

Failure to Launch.tagline: A thirtysomething slacker suspects his parents of setting him up with his dream girl so he'll finally vacate their home.

The 13th Warrior.tagline: In A.D. 922, an Arab ambassador is exiled from his homeland and ends up meeting a group of warrior Norseman, who he soon discovers he is destined join.

Cape Fear.tagline: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a 14 year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

Full Metal Jacket.tagline: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the U.S.-Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

Aquamarine.tagline: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

Corky Romano.tagline: The loser son of a Mafia honcho must go undercover for the FBI.

Down to You.tagline: A young man wins and loses the first serious love of his life.

Ernest Rides Again.tagline: Buffoonish Ernest and his dimwitted pal Abner unearth a huge cannon reputed to contain the crown jewels of England.

Mortal Kombat: Annihilation.tagline: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

Jumper.tagline: A teenager with teleportation abilities must suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

WALL\u00b7E.tagline: In the distant future, a small waste collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Life as a House.tagline: When a man is diagnosed with terminal cancer, he takes custody of his misanthropic teenage son, for whom quality time means getting high, engaging in small-time prostitution, and avoiding his father.

Hamlet (new).tagline: Modern day adaptation of Shakespeare's immortal story about Hamlet's plight to avenge his father's murder in New York City.

Eight Men Out.tagline: A dramatization of the Black Sox scandal when the underpaid Chicago White Sox accepted bribes to deliberately lose the 1919 World Series.

Ella Enchanted.tagline: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new step-family in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling.

1408.tagline: A man who specializes in debunking paranormal occurrences checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel. Soon after settling in, he confronts genuine terror.

Synecdoche, New York.tagline: A theatre director struggles with his work, and the women in his life, as he creates a life-size replica of New York City inside a warehouse as part of his new play.

Body Parts.tagline: After losing his arm in a car accident, a criminal psychologist has it replaced with a limb that belonged to a serial killer.

Henry V.tagline: The gritty adaption of William Shakespeare's play about the English King's bloody conquest of France.

U.S. Marshals.tagline: US Marshal Samuel Gerard (Jones) and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan (Snipes), a murderer and robber.

What Lies Beneath.tagline: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she's losing her mind.

The Purple Rose of Cairo.tagline: In 1930s New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

Houseguest.tagline: In hot water with the mob over an unpaid debt, a con man poses as a family friend in an affluent Pennsylvania suburb.

Married to the Mob.tagline: An undercover FBI agent falls in love with a recently widowed mafia wife seeking to start her life over after her husband's murder and who is also pursued by a libidinous mafia kingpin seeking to claim her for himself.

Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo.tagline: Deuce is tricked again into man-whoring by T.J., only in Amsterdam while other man-whores are being murdered in his midst.

Road House.tagline: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

Down by Law.tagline: The story of three different men in a Louisiana prison and their eventual journey.

Phone Booth.tagline: Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle.

Manny & Lo.tagline: A pregnant teen and her younger sister run away from foster homes and kidnap a woman whom they believe can help with the pregnancy.

Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare.tagline: Freddy Krueger returns once again to haunt both the dreams of his daughter and Springwood's last surviving teenager.

Rent.tagline: This is the film version of the Pulitzer and Tony Award winning musical about Bohemians in the East Village of New York City struggling with life, love and AIDS, and the impacts they have on America.

Goya's Ghosts.tagline: Painter Francisco Goya faces a scandal involving his muse, who is labeled a heretic by a monk.

The Love Guru.tagline: Pitka an American raised outside of his country by gurus, returns to the States in order to break into the self-help business. His first challenge: To settle the romantic troubles and subsequent professional skid of a star hockey player whose wife left him for a rival athlete.

Ransom.tagline: When a rich man's son is kidnapped, he cooperates with the police at first but then tries a unique tactic against the criminals.

Amores Perros.tagline: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

Poseidon.tagline: On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner, Poseidon, capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for survival as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.

Barton Fink.tagline: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

Runaway Bride.tagline: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiances at the altar.

Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.tagline: Harry finds himself mysteriously selected as an under-aged competitor in a dangerous tournament between three schools of magic.

Hide and Seek.tagline: As a widower tries to piece together his life in the wake of his wife's suicide, his daughter finds solace -- at first -- in her imaginary friend.

Kickboxer.tagline: Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.

Hot Fuzz.tagline: Exceptional London cop Nicholas Angel is involuntarily transferred to a quaint English village and paired with a witless new partner. While on the beat, Nicholas suspects a sinister conspiracy is afoot with the residents.

Day Watch.tagline: A man who serves in the war between the forces of Light and Dark comes into possession of a device that can restore life to Moscow, which was nearly destroyed by an apocalyptic event.

Legends of the Fall.tagline: Epic tale of three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of 1900s USA and how their lives are affected by nature, history, war, and love.

I Know Who Killed Me.tagline: A young girl who was missing reappears, but she claims to be someone else entirely.

Sweet Home Alabama.tagline: A young woman with a Southern background runs away from her husband in Alabama and reinvents herself as a New York socialite.

Dumb & Dumber.tagline: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

Slow Burn.tagline: A district attorney is involved in a 24-hour showdown with a gang leader and is, at the same time, being manipulated by an attractive assistant district attorney and a cryptic stranger.

The Hudsucker Proxy.tagline: A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.

Frost/Nixon.tagline: A dramatic retelling of the post-Watergate television interviews between British talk-show host David Frost and former president Richard Nixon.

The Quick and the Dead.tagline: Lady avenger returns to western town owned by a ruthless gunslinger hosting an elimination tournament.

I Heart Huckabees.tagline: A husband-and-wife team play detective, but not in the traditional sense. Instead, the happy duo helps others solve their existential issues, the kind that keep you up at night, wondering what it all means.

Crank.tagline: Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.

This Christmas.tagline: A Christmastime drama centered around the Whitfield family's first holiday together in four years.

Weeds.tagline: A San Quentin inmate, sentenced to life without paroll, writes a play that catches the interest of a reporter.

Instinct.tagline: When a noted anthropologist who left society to live in the jungle is imprisoned for murder, it's up to young psychiatrist to get through to him.

Greenfingers.tagline: A prison inmate with a green thumb goes on to compete in a national gardening competition. Based on a true story.

The Adventures of Baron Munchausen.tagline: An account of Baron Munchausen's supposed travels and fantastical experiences with his band of misfits.

Rampage.tagline: Liberal district attorney decides to seek the death penalty for a man who slaughtered a family at Christmastime, then drank their blood. He escapes, though, and starts killing again.

Battlefield Earth.tagline: After enslavement & near extermination by an alien race in the year 3000, humanity begins to fight back.

production.name: Global Entertainment Productions GmbH & Company Medien KG

Saw II.tagline: Jigsaw locks a few unlucky people in a booby trapped shelter and they must find a way out before they inhale too much of a lethal nerve gas and die. But they must watch out, for the traps Jigsaw has set in the shelter lead to death also.

High Fidelity.tagline: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

Rambo.tagline: In Thailand, John Rambo joins a group of mercenaries to venture into war-torn Burma, and rescue a group of Christian aid workers who were kidnapped by the ruthless local infantry unit.

You Kill Me.tagline: While drying out on the West Coast, an alcoholic hit man befriends a tart-tongued woman who might just come in handy when it's time for him to return to Buffalo and settle some old scores.

Spice World.tagline: World famous pop group The Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.

Gangs of New York.tagline: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

The Land Before Time.tagline: Five orphan dinosaurs travel the ruins of their world, while grieving the loss of their families and banding together to face the odds of survival.

The Meteor Man.tagline: A high school teacher from a troubled inner city Washington D.C. neighborhood becomes a super-powered hero and takes on the gang that has been terrorizing his streets.

Physical Evidence.tagline: A police officer suspended and now accused of murder is forced to join forces with his court-appointed attorney to assemble the pieces of a deadly puzzle to find the missing link before time runs out.

Troy.tagline: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

The Accused.tagline: After a young woman suffers a brutal rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

Wild Bill.tagline: The early career of legendary lawman Wild Bill Hickock is telescoped and culminates in his relocation in Deadwood and a reunion with Calamity Jane.

Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home.tagline: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to 20th century Earth to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it, humpback whales.

The Chamber.tagline: A young man fresh out of law school tries to win a reprieve for his racist grandfather who is on death row.

This Is Spinal Tap.tagline: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DeBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

Death Race.tagline: Ex-con Jensen Ames is forced by the warden of a notorious prison to compete in our post-industrial world's most popular sport: a car race in which inmates must brutalize and kill one another on the road to victory.

Bicentennial Man.tagline: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

Most Wanted.tagline: A Marine on death row is recruited by a shadowy U.S. military officer as part of a top-secret ops team, then gets framed for murder when the team and it's officer set him up as the fall guy for the assassination of the First Lady.

The Bridges of Madison County.tagline: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson, for four days in the 1960s.

Ulee's Gold.tagline: A reclusive beekeeper slowly pulls his dysfunctional family back together, but not without having to fight his son's previous dastardly cohorts.

Capote.tagline: In 1959, Truman Capote learns of the murder of a Kansas family and decides to write a book about the case. While researching for his novel In Cold Blood, Capote forms a relationship with one of the killers, Perry Smith, who is on death row.

The Cat's Meow.tagline: Semi-true story of the Hollywood murder that occurred at a star-studded gathering aboard William Randolph Hearst's yacht in 1924.

Kiss the Girls.tagline: Police hunting for a serial killer are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

Breakdown.tagline: A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.

Flight of the Intruder.tagline: In the Vietnam War, a bereaved US Navy A-6 Intruder tactical bomber pilot schemes with a hardened veteran to make an unauthorized air strike on Hanoi itself.

Minority Report.tagline: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

Daylight.tagline: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

The Terminator.tagline: A human-looking indestructible cyborg is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.

My Summer of Love.tagline: In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.

Ghost Town.tagline: Bertram Pincus is a man whose people skills leave much to be desired. When Pincus dies unexpectedly, but is miraculously revived after seven minutes, he wakes up to discover that he now has the annoying ability to see ghosts.

Bad Education.tagline: An examination on the effect of Franco-era religious schooling and sexual abuse on the lives of two longtime friends.

For Your Consideration.tagline: Three actors learn that their respective performances in the film "Home for Purim," a drama set in the mid-1940s American South, are generating award-season buzz.

The Haunting.tagline: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

Chasing Amy.tagline: Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's gay.

Rocket Science.tagline: Looking for answers to life's big questions, a stuttering boy joins his high school debate team.

Play It to the Bone.tagline: Two best friends and former middleweight contenders travel to Las Vegas to fight each other for the first time.

My Own Private Idaho.tagline: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

There Will Be Blood.tagline: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

White Squall.tagline: Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.

A Scanner Darkly.tagline: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

She's the Man.tagline: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks in London, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguises herself as him, and proceeds to fall for one of her soccer teammates. Little does she realize she's not the only one with romantic troubles, as she, as he, gets in the middle of a series of intermingled love affairs.

Back to the Future Part II.tagline: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985... without interfering with his first trip.

Alfie.tagline: A cockney womanizer learns the hard way about the dangers of his actions.

Johnny English.tagline: After a sudden attack on the MI5, Johnny English, Britain's most confident yet unintelligent spy, becomes Britain's only spy.

Be Cool.tagline: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.

South Park: Bigger Longer & Uncut.tagline: When the four boys see an R-rated movie featuring Canadians Terrance & Phillip, they are pronounced "corrupted", and their parents pressure the United States to wage war against Canada.

Moli\u00e8re.tagline: Imprisoned for debt, playwright Molière is rescued by an aristocrat who needs his help in order to seduce a young marquise.

Vicky Cristina Barcelona.tagline: Two girlfriends on a summer holiday in Spain become enamored with the same painter, unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.

The Pebble and the Penguin.tagline: A lovable but introverted penguin named Hubie plans to present his betrothal pebble to the bird of his dreams.

Hostel.tagline: Three backpackers head to a Slovak city that promises to meet their hedonistic expectations, with no idea of the hell that awaits them.

Out of the Dark.tagline: Beautiful young women who work at the offices of a phone-sex company are being stalked by a psychotic killer.

The Triplets of Belleville.tagline: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

Mr. Bean's Holiday.tagline: Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two come back together. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love, among other things.

Jawbreaker.tagline: Three of the most popular girls at Reagan High accidentally kill the prom queen with a jaw-breaker when a kidnapping goes horribly wrong.

Marley & Me.tagline: A family learns important life lessons from their adorable, but naughty and neurotic dog.

Sleepover.tagline: Four best friends, desperate to improve their social status, enter into an all-night scavenger hunt against the popular clique in their school.

The Good Shepherd.tagline: The tumultuous early history of the Central Intelligence Agency is viewed through the prism of one man's life.

Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Che.tagline: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones' service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

Disturbia.tagline: A teen living under house arrest becomes convinced his neighbor is a serial killer.

One Missed Call.tagline: Several people start receiving voice-mails from their future selves - messages which include the date, time, and some of the details of their deaths.

Equilibrium.tagline: In a Fascist future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system.

The Prestige.tagline: The rivalry between two magicians becomes more exacerbated by their attempt to perform the ultimate illusion.

Naked Lunch.tagline: After developing an addiction to the substance he uses to kill bugs, an exterminator accidentally murders his wife and becomes involved in a secret government plot being orchestrated by giant bugs in a port town in North Africa.

Resident Evil.tagline: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

Silverado.tagline: A misfit bunch of friends come together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

Welcome Home, Roscoe Jenkins.tagline: A successful talk show host leaves Los Angeles to reunite with his family in the Deep South.

The Great Outdoors.tagline: A Chicago man's hope for a peaceful family vacation in the woods is shattered when the annoying in-laws drop in.

Someone Like You....tagline: After being jilted by her boyfriend, a talkshow talent scout writes a sexist column accusing all men of being cheaters, which gains her national fame.

True Lies.tagline: Harry Tasker is a secret agent for the United States Government. For years, he has kept his job from his wife, but is forced to reveal his identity and try to stop nuclear terrorists when he and his wife are kidnapped by the terrorists.

Get Smart.tagline: Maxwell Smart, analyst for the secret spy agency CONTROL, alongside the experienced Agent 99, must prevent KAOS, an enemy agency from Russia, from bringing disaster to America.

The Underneath.tagline: A recovering gambling addict attempts to reconcile with his family and friends but finds trouble and temptation when caught between feelings for his ex-wife and her dangerous hoodlum boyfriend.

A Good Year.tagline: A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.

Sabrina.tagline: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

The Quiet Earth.tagline: A man named Zac Hobson awakens to find himself alone in the world, and In a desperate attempt to search for other's he finds only two who have their own agenda .

Oldboy.tagline: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

Carnosaur.tagline: A genetically manipulated and very hungry dinosaur escapes from a bioengineering company and reeks havoc on the local desert town.

Max Payne.tagline: Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective whose family was slain as part of a conspiracy and an assassin out to avenge her sister's death. The duo will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

Death at a Funeral.tagline: Chaos ensues when a man tries to expose a dark secret regarding a recently deceased patriarch of a dysfunctional British family.

production.name: Le Tax Shelter du Gouvernement Fédéral de Belgique

Fly Me to the Moon 3D.tagline: Three young houseflies stow away aboard the Apollo 11 flight to the moon.

Bowfinger.tagline: When a desperate movie producer fails to get a major star for his bargain basement film, he decides to shoot the film secretly around him.

The Road to Wellville.tagline: A story about the ins and outs of one unusual health facility in the early 20th century, run by the eccentric Dr. Kellogg.

Godzilla 1985: The Legend Is Reborn.tagline: Thirty years after the original monster's rampage, a new Godzilla emerges and attacks Japan.

The Postman.tagline: A drifter with no name finds a Jeep with the skeleton of a postman and a bag of mail and dons the postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in the post apocalyptic America.

Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over.tagline: Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker (Stallone). It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.

Ironweed.tagline: A schizophrenic drifter spends Halloween in his home town after returning there for the first time in decades.

The Matrix.tagline: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Superman IV: The Quest for Peace.tagline: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

When Harry Met Sally....tagline: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

Blow.tagline: The story of George Jung, the man who established the American cocaine market in the 1970s.

Secondhand Lions.tagline: A coming-of-age story about a shy, young boy sent by his irresponsible mother to spend the summer with his wealthy, eccentric uncles in Texas.

Poison Ivy.tagline: A seductive teen befriends an introverted high school student and schemes her way into the lives of her wealthy family.

Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves.tagline: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous.tagline: After Cheryl Frasier and Stan Fields are kidnapped, Gracie goes undercover in Las Vegas to find them.

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.tagline: A quartet of mutated humanoid turtles clash with an uprising criminal gang of ninjas.

Madea's Family Reunion.tagline: While planning her family reunion, a pistol-packing grandma (Perry) must contend with the other dramas on her plate, including the runaway who has been placed under her care, and her love-troubled nieces.

Sex Drive.tagline: A high school senior drives cross-country with his best friends to hook up with a babe he met online.

Honey I Blew Up the Kid.tagline: The Szalinski family is back, this time hilarious disaster strikes when an experiment causes their new toddler son to grow many stories tall.

Mad City.tagline: A disgruntled security guard holds a school trip group hostage, while a news reporter forms a bond with him.

The Cave.tagline: Bloodthirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.

The Pledge.tagline: A retiring police chief pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

Treasure Planet.tagline: A Disney animated version of "Treasure Island". The only difference is that the film is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.

The Score.tagline: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.

Transporter 2.tagline: Mercenary Frank Martin, who specializes moving goods of all kinds, surfaces again this time in Miami, Florida when he's implicated in the kidnapping of the young son of a powerful USA official.

Cry-Baby.tagline: In 1950s Baltimore, a bad-boy with a heart of gold wins the love of a good-girl, whose boyfriend sets out for revenge.

Factotum.tagline: This drama centers on Hank Chinaski, the fictional alter-ego of "Factotum" author Charles Bukowski, who wanders around Los Angeles, CA trying to live off jobs which don't interfere with his primary interest, which is writing. Along the way, he fends off the distractions offered by women, drinking and gambling.

Simply Irresistible.tagline: A magical crab works wonders for a terrible chef's culinary skills, leading her towards the man of her dreams.

At First Sight.tagline: A blind man has an operation to regain his sight at the urging of his girlfriend and must deal with the changes to his life.

Knock Off.tagline: Action star Jean Claude Van Damme plays a fashion designer who must join forces with a C.I.A. agent to combat terrorism.

Lost in Space.tagline: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

Wayne's World.tagline: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

Casualties of War.tagline: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager.

Bride of Chucky.tagline: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

Exit Wounds.tagline: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

Small Soldiers.tagline: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

The Darjeeling Limited.tagline: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other.

Dream with the Fishes.tagline: Terry is a suicidal voyeur who treats a dying addict to a final binge, but Terry will only do this if he promises to kill him.

Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector.tagline: A slovenly cable repairman becomes a big-city health inspector and is tasked with uncovering the source of a food poisoning epidemic.

Kicking & Screaming.tagline: Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon finds that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating...

Casino Royale.tagline: Armed with a license to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007 and must defeat a weapons dealer in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, but things are not what they seem.

The Phantom.tagline: The Phantom, descendent of a line of African heroes, travels to New York to thwart a criminal genius.

Little Children.tagline: The lives of two lovelorn spouses from separate marriages, a registered sex offender, and a disgraced ex-police officer intersect as they struggle to resist their vulnerabilities and temptations in suburban Connecticut.

Hardware.tagline: The head of a cyborg reactivates and rebuilds itself and goes on a violent rampage in a space marine's girlfriend's apartment.

Serial Mom.tagline: A sweet mother takes a little too much at heart for the defence of her family.

27 Dresses.tagline: After serving as a bridesmaid 27 times, a young woman wrestles with the idea of standing by her sister's side as her sibling marries the man she's secretly in love with.

Before and After.tagline: Two parents deal with the effects when their son is accused of murdering his girlfriend.

The Hurricane.tagline: The story of Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

The Deep End of the Ocean.tagline: The Deep End of The Ocean is a film about a family's reaction when Ben, the youngest son is kidnapped and then found nine years later, living in the same town, where his family had just moved.

Beverly Hills Cop III.tagline: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who shot his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

Newsies.tagline: A musical based on the New York City newsboy strike of 1899. When young newspaper sellers are exploited beyond reason by their bosses they set out to enact change and are met by the ruthlessness of big business.

The Faculty.tagline: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurances.

Hitman.tagline: A gun-for-hire known only as Agent 47 hired by a group known only as 'The Organization' is ensnared in a political conspiracy, which finds him pursued by both Interpol and the Russian military as he treks across Russia and Eastern Europe.

Parents.tagline: A young boy living in 1950s suburbia begins to wonder where his parents get their meat from...

Red Planet.tagline: Astronauts search for solutions to save a dying Earth by searching on Mars, only to have the mission go terribly awry.

Transamerica.tagline: A pre-operative male-to-female transsexual takes an unexpected journey when she learns that she fathered a son, now a teenage runaway hustling on the streets of New York.

The Taking of Beverly Hills.tagline: A group of embittered ex-cops use a chemical spill to raid the banks and homes of Beverly Hills.

Robin Hood: Men in Tights.tagline: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and 'Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves' in particular.

Trapped.tagline: When their daughter is kidnapped by experienced nappers, the Jennings' turn the tables on this seemingly foolproof plan.

Idle Hands.tagline: Lazy Anton's right hand becomes possessed with murderous intent.

Jesus' Son.tagline: A young man turns from drug addiction and petty crime to a life redeemed by a discovery of compassion.

The Bachelor.tagline: A committment-phobic man goes in search of a bride including his fed up girlfriend, to inherit his grandfather's $100 million inheritance.

Shrek 2.tagline: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.

Here on Earth.tagline: A rich college kid is taught a lesson after a joy ride ends up destroying a country restaurant.

The Wedding Singer.tagline: Robbie, the singer and Julia, the waitress are both engaged to be married but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

Rush Hour 2.tagline: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

Leaving Las Vegas.tagline: Ben Sanderson, an alcoholic Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his drinking, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

Good Morning, Vietnam.tagline: An unorthodox and irreverent DJ begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the US Armed Services Radio station in Vietnam.

Broken Flowers.tagline: As the extremely withdrawn Don Johnston is dumped by his latest woman, he receives an anonymous letter from a former lover informing him that he has a son who may be looking for him. A freelance sleuth neighbor moves Don to embark on a cross-country search for his old flames in search of answers.

Ghost Ship.tagline: A salvage crew that discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea soon notices, as they prepare to tow it back to land, that "strange things" happen...

From Dusk Till Dawn.tagline: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in an establishment populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

Sister, Sister.tagline: Two sisters turn their family mansion in Louisiana into a guest house. One of their guests is an aide to a congressman, and turns their lives inside out.

Back to the Future.tagline: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.

The World Is Not Enough.tagline: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

Wolf.tagline: Publisher Will Randall becomes a werewolf and has to fight to keep his job.

Hollywood Ending.tagline: A director is forced to work with his ex-wife, who left him for the boss of the studio bankrolling his new film. But the night before the first day of shooting, he develops a case of psychosomatic blindness.

City by the Sea.tagline: Vincent Lamarca, whose father was executed for a 1950s kidnapping of a child, grew up to become a police officer, only to see his own son become a murderer.

Geronimo: An American Legend.tagline: The story of the Apache chief and his armed resistance to the US Government's subjugation of his people.

Little Giants.tagline: Misfits form their own opposing team to an elite peewee football team, coached by the elite team coach's brother.

Australia.tagline: Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscape, they experience the bombing of Darwin, Australia, by Japanese forces firsthand.

Critical Condition.tagline: Con man Kevin Lennihan framed in a jewel smuggling tries for an insanity plea and is sent to a hospital for review where he is confused for another doctor and takes over the hospital when a major storm hits.

Juice.tagline: "Juice" is about 4 inner-city teens who get caught up in the pursuit of power and happiness, which they refer to as 'the juice'.

Frantic.tagline: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

Broken Arrow.tagline: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

Psycho.tagline: A young female embezzeler arrives at the Bates Motel which has terrible secrets of its own.

The Hurt Locker.tagline: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

Last Man Standing.tagline: A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town.

Switching Channels.tagline: A television news chief courts his anchorwoman ex-wife with an eleventh-hour story.

Willow.tagline: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

Wag the Dog.tagline: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a presidential sex scandal.

Gun Shy.tagline: An undercover DEA agent brings down the Mafia.

The Covenant.tagline: Four young men who belong to a supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Another great force they must contend with is the jealousy and suspicion that threatens to tear them apart.

Sylvia.tagline: Story of the relationship between the poets Ted Hughes and Sylvia Plath.

The Crocodile Hunter: Collision Course.tagline: The Crocodile Hunter mistakes some CIA agents for poachers and sets out to stop them from capturing a wily croc which, unbeknownst to him, has swallowed a tracking drone.

Auto Focus.tagline: A story about "Hogan's Heroes" star Bob Crane and his friendship with John Carpenter.

production.name: Boll Kino Beteiligungs GmbH & Co. KG

Radio Flyer.tagline: A father recounts a dark period of his childhood when he and his little brother lived in the suburbs.

Antitrust.tagline: A computer programmer's dream job at a hot Portland-based firm turns nightmarish when he discovers his boss has a secret and ruthless means of dispatching anti-trust problems.

Little Ashes.tagline: About the young life and loves of artist Salvador Dalí, filmmaker Luis Buñuel and writer Federico García Lorca.

A Smile Like Yours.tagline: Greg Kinnear plays a carriage-shy husband in a romantic comedy about a couple trying to conceive a child.

Mousehunt.tagline: Two stumblebum inheritors are determined to rid their antique house of a mouse who is equally determined to stay where he is.

Godsend.tagline: A couple agree to have their deceased son cloned, under the supervision of an enigmatic doctor but bizarre things start to happen years after his rebirth.

I Spy.tagline: A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.

The Devil's Advocate.tagline: A hotshot lawyer gets more than he bargained for when he learns his new boss is Lucifer himself.

Stuart Little.tagline: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.

production.name: What Planet Are You From? Productions

Defiance.tagline: Jewish brothers in Nazi-occupied Eastern Europe escape into the Belarussian forests, where they join Russian resistance fighters and endeavor to build a village in order to protect themselves and about 1,000 Jewish non-combatants.

Down and Out in Beverly Hills.tagline: A rich but troubled family find their lives altered by the arrival of a vagrant who tries to drown himself in their swimming pool.

Zoom.tagline: Former superhero Jack is called back to work to transform an unlikely group of ragtag kids into superheroes at a private Academy.

September Dawn.tagline: A love story set during a tense encounter between a wagon train of settlers and a renegade Mormon group.

25th Hour.tagline: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

Contact.tagline: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of intelligent aliens, who send plans for a mysterious machine.

The Crew.tagline: Four retired mobsters plan one last crime to save their retirement home.

production.name: The Noel Gay Motion Picture Company

Trainspotting.tagline: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

Paranormal Activity.tagline: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.

Jaws: The Revenge.tagline: Chief Brody's widow believes that her family is deliberately being targeted by another shark in search of revenge.

The Matrix Reloaded.tagline: Neo and the rebel leaders estimate that they have 72 hours until 250,000 probes discover Zion and destroy it and its inhabitants. During this, Neo must decide how he can save Trinity from a dark fate in his dreams.

Marvin's Room.tagline: A leukemia patient attempts to end a 20-year feud with her sister to get her bone marrow.

The Crucible.tagline: A Salem woman accuses her ex-lover's wife of witchcraft.

Mr. Deeds.tagline: A sweet-natured, small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way.

How to Lose Friends & Alienate People.tagline: A British writer struggles to fit in at a high-profile magazine in New York. Based on Toby Young's memoir "How to Lose Friends & Alienate People".

Hollywood Shuffle.tagline: An actor limited to stereotypical roles because of his ethnicity, dreams of making it big as a highly respected performer. As he makes his rounds, the film takes a satiric look at African American actors in Hollywood.

Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menac.tagline: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to reclaim their old glory.

Bird on a Wire.tagline: An old flame discovers her ex-boyfriend from the past is a relocated FBI informant out to stop the bad guys.

Silver City.tagline: The discovery of a corpse threatens to unravel a bumbling local politician's campaign for governor of Colorado.

A Day Without a Mexican.tagline: When a mysterious fog surrounds the boundaries of California, there is a communication breakdown and all the Mexicans disappear, affecting the economy and the state stops working missing the Mexican workers and dwellers.

Time Changer.tagline: A Bible professor from 1890 comes forward in time to the present via a time machine and cannot believe the things that he sees!

Delgo.tagline: Delgo, an adventurous but naive teenager, must rally his group of friends to protect their world from conflict between the Lockni and Nohrin people.

The Golden Child.tagline: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child that dark forces want to eliminate.

Hope Floats.tagline: Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her and a charming young man, who her daughter disapproves of, comes back into her life.

Warlock.tagline: A warlock flees from the 17th to the 20th century, with a witch-hunter in hot pursuit.

Big Daddy.tagline: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.

Crash.tagline: After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car accidents and the raw sexual energy they produce to try to rejuvenate his sex life with his wife.

Pride and Glory.tagline: A family's moral codes are tested when Ray Tierney investigates a case that reveals an incendiary police corruption scandal involving his own brother-in-law. For Ray, the truth is revelatory, a Pandora's Box that threatens to upend not only the Tierney legacy but the entire NYPD.

The Longshots.tagline: The true story of Jasmine Plummer who, at the age of eleven, became the first female to play in Pop Warner football tournament in its 56-year history.

Labyrinth.tagline: Fifteen-year-old Sarah accidentally wishes her baby half-brother, Toby, away to the Goblin King Jareth who will keep Toby if Sarah does not complete his Labyrinth in thirteen hours.

Ever After: A Cinderella Story.tagline: The "real" story of Cinderella. A refreshing new take on the classic fairy tale.

You, Me and Dupree.tagline: A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance.

Mannequin.tagline: A young artist, searching for his vocation, makes a mannequin so perfect he falls in love with it. Finding the mannequin in a store window, he gets a job there and his creation comes to life.

Be Kind Rewind.tagline: Two bumbling store clerks inadvertently erase the footage from all of the tapes in their video rental store. In order to keep the business running, they re-shoot every film in the store with their own camera, with a budget of zero dollars.

Jingle All the Way.tagline: A father decides to dream the impossible; to get a Turbo Man action figure for his son just before Christmas.

Little Black Book.tagline: A woman snoops through her boyfriend's palm pilot and reveals his former girlfriends, which causes her to question why they're still listed in his little black book.

The Black Dahlia.tagline: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" murder investigation.

No Escape.tagline: A soldier convicted for murdering his commanding officer is dumped and left to die on a prison island inhabited by two camps of convicts.

Zack and Miri Make a Porno.tagline: Lifelong platonic friends Zack and Miri look to solve their respective cash-flow problems by making an adult film together. As the cameras roll, however, the duo begin to sense that they may have more feelings for each other than they previously thought.

production.name: Boll Kino Beteiligungs GmbH & Co. KG

Alone in the Dark.tagline: Based on the video game, Alone in the Dark focuses on Edward Carnby, a detective of the paranormal, who slowly unravels a mysterious events with deadly results.

Sidewalks of New York.tagline: The interlocking lives and loves of six New Yorkers.

Serving Sara.tagline: A process server tries to serve an elusive female target.

Calendar Girls.tagline: A Women's Institute chapter's fundraising effort for a local hospital by posing nude for a calendar becomes a media sensation.

Freaky Friday.tagline: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the others life for one freaky Friday.

Unbreakable.tagline: A suspense thriller with supernatural overtones that revolves around a man who learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

Disclosure.tagline: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

The American President.tagline: Comedy-drama about a widowed US president and a lobbyist who fall in love. It's all aboveboard, but "politics is perception" and sparks fly anyway.

Cast Away.tagline: A FedEx executive must transform himself physically and emotionally to survive a crash landing on a deserted island.

Armed and Dangerous.tagline: A fired cop and useless lawyer sign up as security guards and find they've joined a corrupt union.

Thunderbirds.tagline: When The Hood finds and invades International Rescue's secret base and traps most of the Tracy family, only young Alan Tracy and his friends can save the day.

Hamlet.tagline: Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.

Working Girl.tagline: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss's job.

Fireproof.tagline: In an attempt to save his marriage, A firefighter uses a 40-day experiment known as "The Love Dare".

Once Upon a Time in Mexico.tagline: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

Serendipity.tagline: A couple reunite years after the night they first met, fell in love, and separated, convinced that one day they'd end up together.

Bad Company.tagline: When a Harvard-educated CIA agent is killed during an operation, the secret agency recruits his twin brother.

My Dog Skip.tagline: A shy boy grows up in 1940s Mississippi with the help of his beloved dog, Skip.

Love in the Time of Cholera.tagline: Florentino, rejected by the beautiful Fermina at a young age, devotes much of his adult life to carnal affairs as a desperate attempt to heal his broken heart.

The Kid.tagline: An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when an eight year old version of himself mysteriously appears.

Big Bully.tagline: A writer returns to his hometown where he faces the childhood nemesis whose life he ultimately ruined, only the bully wants to relive their painful past by torturing him once again.

Moulin Rouge!.tagline: A poet falls for a beautiful courtesan whom a jealous duke covets in this stylish musical, with music drawn from familiar 20th century sources.

The Brothers Grimm.tagline: Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

Bruce Almighty.tagline: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

Die Hard: With a Vengeance.tagline: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

Joe's Apartment.tagline: A nice guy has just moved to New York and discovers that he must share his run-down apartment with a couple thousand singing, dancing cockroaches.

Silent Hill.tagline: A woman goes in search for her daughter, within the confines of a strange, desolate town called Silent Hill. Based on the video game.

Falling Down.tagline: An unemployed defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society, begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

Across the Universe.tagline: The music of the Beatles and the Vietnam War form the backdrop for the romance between an upper-class American girl and a poor Liverpudlian artist.

Beauty and the Beast.tagline: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead and discovers her captor to be an enchanted prince.

King Kong.tagline: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow.

production.name: The Institute for the Intellectual Development of Children & Young Adults

Children of Heaven.tagline: When Ali loses his sister's shoes, the two decide to share his to avoid getting in trouble.

Desperately Seeking Susan.tagline: A bored suburban housewife, seeking adventure to her life, accidentally gets hit on the head, wakes up with amnesia, and is mistaken for a free-spirited New York City drifter named Susan.

The Princess Bride.tagline: A classic fairy tale, with swordplay, giants, an evil prince, a beautiful princess, and yes, some kissing (as read by a kindly grandfather).

They Live.tagline: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that allow him to wake up to the fact that aliens have taken over the Earth.

Beer League.tagline: An unemployed slacker (Lange) inspires his softball teammates to improve their game so they won't get kicked out of the local league.

Any Given Sunday.tagline: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

Dreams.tagline: A collection of tales based upon the actual dreams of director Akira Kurosawa.

Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd.tagline: Set back in the 80s when Harry met Lloyd in high school where they cross paths with a mean principal and a bunch of other outcasts much like themselves.

Walking Tall.tagline: A former U.S. soldier returns to his hometown to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which prompts him to clean house.

Out of Sight.tagline: A career bank robber breaks out of jail and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a US Marshall he has kidnapped.

Multiplicity.tagline: A man who never has enough time for the things he wants to do is offered the opportunity to have himself duplicated.

Sleepers.tagline: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized; over 10 years later, they get their chance for revenge.

You've Got Mail.tagline: Two business rivals hate each other at the office but fall in love over the internet.

Perfume: The Story of a Murderer.tagline: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

The Gift.tagline: A woman with extrasensory perception is asked to help find a young woman who has disappeared.

See No Evil.tagline: A group of delinquents are sent to clean the Blackwell Hotel. Little do they know reclusive psychopath Jacob Goodnight (Jacobs) has holed away in the rotting hotel. When one of the teens is captured, those who remain -- a group that includes the cop who put a bullet in Goodnight's head four years ago -- band together to survive against the brutal killer.

Pay It Forward.tagline: A young boy attempts to make the world a better place after his teacher gives him that chance.

Solaris.tagline: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

Nanny McPhee.tagline: Emma Thompson stars as a governess who uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.

Two Can Play That Game.tagline: An arrogant career woman plays a series of heartless mind-games with her boyfriend to "put him in line," only to discover that he has a few tricks up his own sleeve.

The Bodyguard.tagline: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to a pop singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

Signs.tagline: A family living on a farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields which suggests something more frightening to come.

Last Action Hero.tagline: A young movie fan gets thrown into the movie world of his favourite action film character.

Persepolis.tagline: Poignant coming-of-age story of a precocious and outspoken young Iranian girl that begins during the Islamic Revolution.

JFK.tagline: A New Orleans DA discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

Return to the Blue Lagoon.tagline: In this sequel to the 1980 classic, two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become tanned teenagers in love.

Copycat.tagline: An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.

Music of the Heart.tagline: Story of a schoolteacher's struggle to teach violin to inner-city Harlem kids.

The Hitcher.tagline: A young man who escaped the clutches of a murderous hitch-hiker is subsequently stalked, framed for the hitcher's crimes, and has his life made into hell by the same man he escaped.

Titan A.E..tagline: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

Bride & Prejudice.tagline: Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice gets a Bollywood treatment.

King Kong Lives.tagline: Kong falls from the twin towers and he appears to be alive!

Collateral.tagline: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.

Cheaper by the Dozen.tagline: With his wife doing a book tour, a father of twelve must handle a new job and his unstable brood.

Half Nelson.tagline: An inner-city junior high school teacher with a drug habit forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students after she discovers his secret.

I Capture the Castle.tagline: A love story set in 1930s England that follows 17-year-old Cassandra Mortmain, and the fortunes of her eccentric family, struggling to survive in a decaying English castle.

Star Trek V: The Final Frontier.tagline: Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Mr. Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy.

The Master of Disguise.tagline: An Italian waiter fights off a criminal mastermind with his inherited powers of disguise.

Best in Show.tagline: A colorful array of characters competes at a national dog show.

A Bronx Tale.tagline: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

Double Dragon.tagline: Two brothers have half of a powerful ancient Chinese talisman. An evil gang leader has the other half, and determines to get the brothers' half and have a complete medallion so he can gain absolute power.

The Wicker Man.tagline: A sheriff investigating the disappearance of a young girl from a small island discovers there's a larger mystery to solve among the island's secretive, neo-pagan community.

Men in Black.tagline: A streetwise NYPD detective joins a secret organization that polices extraterrestrial affairs on Earth.

Evolution.tagline: A firefighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky-but-sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving ever since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.

For Love of the Game.tagline: A washed up pitcher flashes through his career.

From Justin to Kelly.tagline: A waitress from Texas and a college student from Pennsylvania meet during spring break in Fort Lauderdale, Florida and come together through their shared love of singing.

Star Trek: Nemesis.tagline: After the Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty, the Federation soon find out the Romulans are planning an attack on Earth.

Jumanji.tagline: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

production.name: Mediastream Zweite Film GmbH & Co. Productions KG

Big Fat Liar.tagline: After a young boy's school essay erroneously finds its way into the hands of a Hollywood producer who turns the idea into a hit film, the boy travels to Los Angeles to claim his credit.

Little Women.tagline: The March sisters live and grow in post-Civil War America.

21 Grams.tagline: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

The Rocketeer.tagline: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

The 6th Day.tagline: Futuristic action about a man who meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.

Chicken Little.tagline: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

The Alamo.tagline: Based on the 1836 standoff between a group of Texan and Tejano men, led by Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie, and Mexican dictator Santa Anna's forces at the Alamo in San Antonio, Texas.

Thirteen Conversations About One Thing.tagline: In New York City, the lives of a lawyer, an actuary, a house-cleaner, a professor, and the people around them intersect as they ponder order and happiness in the face. of life's cold unpredictability.

Punisher: War Zone.tagline: After hunting down and killing hundreds of violent criminals, Frank Castle, aka The Punisher, faces his most deadly foe yet: Jigsaw.

Bring It On.tagline: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.

Liam.tagline: A family falls into poverty during the Depression.

Ray.tagline: The story of the life and career of the legendary rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles, from his humble beginnings in the South, where he went blind at age seven, to his meteoric rise to stardom during the 1950s and 1960s.

Wall Street.tagline: A young and impatient stockbroker is willing to do anything to get to the top, including trading on illegal inside information taken through a ruthless and greedy corporate raider who takes the youth under his wing.

Along Came a Spider.tagline: A congressman's daughter under Secret Service protection is kidnapped from a private school by an insider who calls Det. Alex Cross, sucking him into the case even though he's recovering from the loss of his partner.

The Thief.tagline: A woman meets a man who isn't the right man for her - but she hasn't realised it yet...

Paparazzi.tagline: A rising Hollywood actor decides to take personal revenge against a group of four persistent photographers to make them pay for almost causing a personal tragedy involving his wife and son.

Changing Lanes.tagline: The story of what happens one day in New York when a young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident on F.D.R. Drive and their mutual road rage escalates into a feud.

New York, I Love You.tagline: Several love stories set in one of the most loved cities of the world, New York.

Rendition.tagline: A CIA analyst questions his assignment after witnessing an unorthodox interrogation at a secret detention facility outside the US.

The Prince of Tides.tagline: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

Jane Austen's Mafia!.tagline: Takeoff on the Godfather with the son of a mafia king taking over for his dying father

A Midsummer Night's Dream.tagline: Lovers lives are complicated by city law, feuding faerie royalty, and... love.

Seed of Chucky.tagline: Chuck (Brad Dourif) and Tiff (Jennifer Tilly) return, resurrected by their son (Billy Boyd), and hit Hollywood in the fifth film of the CHILD'S PLAY series.

Tears of the Sun.tagline: A Special-Ops commander leads his team into the Nigerian jungle in order to rescue a doctor who will only join them if they agree to save 70 refugees too.

The Insider.tagline: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco.

Alien\u00b3.tagline: Ripley continues to be stalked by a savage alien, after her escape pod crashes on a prison planet.

Mercury Rising.tagline: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

Arlington Road.tagline: A college professor begins to suspect that his neighbour is a terrorist.

production.name: Global Entertainment Productions GmbH & Company Medien KG

Hanging Up.tagline: A trio of sisters bond over their ambivalence toward the approaching death of their curmudgeonly father, to whom none of them was particularly close.

The Muppet Christmas Carol.tagline: The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.

Frankenstein.tagline: When Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man he just created, the monster escapes and later swears revenge.

The X Files.tagline: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.

Before the Devil Knows You're Dead.tagline: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that sends them, their father and one brother's wife hurtling towards a shattering climax.

Beowulf.tagline: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel who is terrorizing towns, and later, Grendel's mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

Village of the Damned.tagline: A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.

Unaccompanied Minors.tagline: A group of unaccompanied minors bond while snowed in at the midwestern Hoover International Airport during the holiday season and ultimately create a makeshift holiday themselves.
