Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film.tagline: An action epic that explores the origins of the Aqua Teen Hunger Force (better known as Master Shake, Frylock, and Meatwad,) who somehow become pitted in a battle over an immortal piece of exercise equipment.

Jo Jo Dancer, Your Life Is Calling.tagline: After severely burning himself in a drug incident, a comedian has a near death experience in which he reviews his life.

Queen of the Damned.tagline: The vampire Lestat becomes a rock star whose music wakes up the queen of all vampires.

Two Weeks Notice.tagline: A lawyer decides that she's used too much like a nanny by her boss, so she walks out on him.

Mission: Impossible III.tagline: Ethan Hunt comes face to face with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer while trying to keep his identity secret in order to protect his girlfriend.

Strangers with Candy.tagline: A prequel to the critically acclaimed series featuring Jerri Blank, a 46 year-old ex-junkie, ex-con who returns to high school in a bid to start her life over.

A Cry in the Dark.tagline: A mother, whose child was killed in a Dingo attack in outback Northern Territory, Australia, fights to prove her innocence.

production.name: Argentum Film Produktion und Betriebes KG

Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen.tagline: A teenage girl is convinced that her home city revolves around her until her family packs up and moves to the suburbs, where she finds herself competing for attention.

15 Minutes.tagline: A homicide detective and a fire marshall must stop a pair of murderers who commit videotaped crimes to become media darlings.

Hannibal Rising.tagline: After the death of his parents during World War II, young Hannibal Lecter moves in with his beautiful aunt and begins plotting revenge on the barbarians responsible for his sister's death.

Big Trouble.tagline: The lives of several Miami denizens, from ad agents to gunrunners to street thugs to law enforcement to school-children, intersect with humorous and dangerous results.

No Way Out.tagline: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

The Dream Team.tagline: On the way to a baseball game, sanitarium patients get stranded in New York City after their chaperone is hospitalized and they're being pursued by criminals.

Get on the Bus.tagline: A disparate group of African-American men travel by bus to Washington, DC for the Million Man March.

Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker.tagline: After the death of his uncle, the 14-year-old schoolboy Alex Rider is forced by the Special OperationsDivision of Britain's secret intelligence service, MI6, for a mission which will save millions of lives.

Ravenous.tagline: Captain John Boyd's promotion stations him at a fort where a rescued man tells a disturbing tale of cannibalism.

Hidalgo.tagline: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.

Jarhead.tagline: Based on former Marine Anthony Swofford's best-selling 2003 book about his pre-Desert Storm experiences in Saudi Arabia and about his experiences fighting in Kuwait.

The Emperor's Club.tagline: An idealistic prep school teacher attempts to redeem an incorrigible student.

Shark Tale.tagline: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidently killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother both decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

The Ladies Man.tagline: The Saturday Night Live character gets a big screen treatment.

Cookie's Fortune.tagline: Conflict arises in the small town of Holly Springs when an old woman's death causes a variety of reactions among family and friends.

Romeo + Juliet.tagline: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

The Illusionist.tagline: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

The Big Lebowski.tagline: "Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

Righteous Kill.tagline: Two veteran New York City detectives work on a case of serial executions of criminals who escaped justice.

Chill Factor.tagline: A new biological chemical weapon that explodes up to temperatures over fifty degrees Fahrenheit, falls into the hands of two men who try to make sure that it doesn't get stolen by a terrorist.

Anything Else.tagline: A contemporary romantic comedy set in New York city about the relationship between an older guy and his younger protege. The older guy guides the younger through a messy and hilarious love story.

Heathers.tagline: A girl who half-heartedly tries to be part of the "in crowd" of her school meets a rebel who teaches her a more devious way to play social politics; killing the popular kids.

28 Days Later....tagline: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

The Skeleton Key.tagline: A hospice nurse working at a spooky New Orleans plantation home finds herself entangled in a mystery involving the house's dark past.

X2.tagline: The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.

The Wild Thornberrys Movie.tagline: Eliza and Debbie are two sisters who don't always get along. But their relationship is put to the test when Debbie's life is in danger, and Eliza might have to give up her power to talk to animals....

Howard the Duck.tagline: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invader.

Juwanna Mann.tagline: A basketball star is booted out of the NBA when his on-court antics go too far, so he poses as a woman and joins the WUBA.

The Shadow.tagline: In 30's New York City, the Shadow battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan, who is building an atomic bomb.

30 Days of Night.tagline: After an Alaskan town is plunged into darkness for a month, it is attacked by a bloodthirsty gang of vampires.

production.name: Mediastream Dritte Film GmbH & Co. Beteiligungs KG

Just Married.tagline: A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage.

Serenity.tagline: The crew of the ship Serenity tries to evade an assassin sent to recapture one of their number who is telepathic.

Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for.tagline: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.

Taxi.tagline: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

Doomsday.tagline: A futuristic action thriller where a team of people work to prevent a disaster threatening the future of the human race.

The Road to El Dorado.tagline: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

Ready to Rumble.tagline: Two slacker wrestling fans are devastated by the ousting of their favorite character by an unscrupulous promoter.

Master and Commander: The Far Side of th.tagline: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

Snow Falling on Cedars.tagline: A Japanese-American fisherman may have killed his neighbor Carl at sea. In the 1950's, race figures in the trial. So does reporter Ishmael.

Waterworld.tagline: In a future where the polar ice caps have melted and most of Earth is underwater, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

The Others.tagline: A woman who lives in a darkened old house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that her family home is haunted.

Sister Act.tagline: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

A Nightmare on Elm Street 4: The Dream M.tagline: Freddy Krueger returns once again to terrorize the dreams of the remaining Dream Warriors, as well as those of a young woman who may know the way to defeat him for good.

Detroit Rock City.tagline: A comedy about four teenagers in 1978 who try to scam their way into a KISS concert.

Click.tagline: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices.

Gladiator.tagline: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

Sex and the City.tagline: A New York writer on sex and love is finally getting married to her Mr. Big. But her three best girlfriends must console her after one of them inadvertently leads Mr. Big to jilt her.

Curly Sue.tagline: A homeless man and his young companion who survive by conning people meet a woman who may need them even more than they need her.

The Bourne Ultimatum.tagline: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

Se7en.tagline: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

Center Stage.tagline: A group of 12 teenagers from various backgrounds enroll at the American Ballet Academy in New York to make it as ballet dancers and each one deals with the problems and stress of training and getting ahead in the world of dance.

The People Under the Stairs.tagline: Two adults and a juvenile burglar break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children and can't escape.

The Holiday.tagline: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

Swingers.tagline: Wannabe actors become regulars in the stylish neo-lounge scene; Trent teaches his friend Mike the unwritten rules of the scene.

Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me.tagline: A young FBI agent disappears while investigating a murder miles from Twin Peaks that may be related to the future murder of Laura Palmer; the last week of the life of Laura Palmer is chronicled.

production.name: Global Entertainment Productions GmbH & Company Medien KG

8MM.tagline: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

Prince of Darkness.tagline: A research team finds a mysterious cylinder in a deserted church. If opened, it could mean the end of the world.

Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo.tagline: A man becomes a male gigolo after being mistaken for one while housesitting a male gigolo's house.

Must Love Dogs.tagline: A forty-something preschool teacher looks to the personals for a change of pace and a relationship, with hilarious results.

Predator.tagline: A team of commandos, on a mission in a Central American jungle, find themselves hunted by an extra-terrestrial warrior.

Stranger Than Fiction.tagline: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

Clue.tagline: Six guests are invited to a strange house and must cooperate with the staff to solve a murder mystery.

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 2. Produktions KG

K-19: The Widowmaker.tagline: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

Othello.tagline: The evil Iago pretends to be friend of Othello in order to manipulate him to serve his own end in the film version of this Shakespeare classic.

Malibu's Most Wanted.tagline: A senator arranges for his son, a rich white kid who fancies himself black, to be kidnapped by a couple of black actors pretending to be murderers to try and shock him out of his plans to become a rapper.

Anywhere But Here.tagline: A mother and daughter search for success in Beverly Hills.

Prefontaine.tagline: Based on the life of Olympic hopeful Steve Prefontaine, a long distance runner who lived in Oregon and died young

Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoeni.tagline: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

The Black Cauldron.tagline: A young boy and a bunch of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

Valkyrie.tagline: A dramatization of the 20 July assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Hitler during World War II.

Fight Club.tagline: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...

Holes.tagline: A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.

The Other Boleyn Girl.tagline: Two sisters contend for the affection of King Henry VIII.

Cop Land.tagline: The sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community populated by New York City policemen slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

Peggy Sue Got Married.tagline: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

The Fly.tagline: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

Groove.tagline: An inside look into one night in the San Francisco underground rave scene.

Lord of War.tagline: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an Interpol agent.

Flags of Our Fathers.tagline: The life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

Bamboozled.tagline: A frustrated African American TV writer proposes a blackface minstrel show in protest, but to his chagrin it becomes a hit.

Deep Rising.tagline: A group of heavily armed hijackers board a luxury ocean liner in the South Pacific Ocean to loot it, only to do battle with a series of large-sized, tentacled, man-eating sea creatures who have taken over the ship first.

8 Mile.tagline: A young rapper, struggling with every aspect of his life, wants to make the most of what could be his final opportunity but his problems around gives him doubts.

Star Trek III: The Search for Spock.tagline: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

Grosse Pointe Blank.tagline: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.

Hollywood Homicide.tagline: Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.

Speed.tagline: A young cop must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

Never Back Down.tagline: At his new high school, a rebellious teen is lured into an underground fight club, where he finds a mentor in a mixed martial arts veteran.

Gracie.tagline: A teenager faces an uphill battle when she fights to give women the opportunity to play competitive soccer.

Joe Dirt.tagline: David Spade stars as Joe Dirt, an idiot who works as an oil weller who is on the search for his parents who abandoned him when he was a baby at the grand canyon.

The Lookout.tagline: Chris is a once promising high school athlete whose life is turned upside down following a tragic accident. As he tries to maintain a normal life, he takes a job as a janitor at a bank, where he ultimately finds himself caught up in a planned heist.

Holy Man.tagline: Eddie Murphy stars as an over-the-top television evangelist who finds a way to turn television home shopping into a religious experience, and takes America by storm.

Life or Something Like It.tagline: A reporter interviews a psychic, who tells her that she's going to die and her life is meaningless.

Wrong Turn.tagline: Six people find themselves trapped in the woods of West Virginia, hunted down by "cannibalistic mountain men grossly disfigured through generations of in-breeding."

The Family Stone.tagline: An uptight, conservative, businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.

Gremlins 2: The New Batch.tagline: The Gremlins are back, and this time, they've taken total control over the building of a media mogul.

8 Women.tagline: One murdered man, eight women, each seeming to be more eager than the others to know the truth. Gimme, gimme, gimme some clues to make up my mind. And eventually enter the truth. Oh, thou cruel woman!

Around the World in 80 Days.tagline: A bet pits a British inventor, a Chinese thief, and a French artist on a worldwide adventure that they can circle the globe in 80 days.

The Man Who Knew Too Little.tagline: Murray is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assasinate international leaders at a banquet.

The Celebration.tagline: At Helge's 60th birthday party, some unpleasant family truths are revealed.

The Merchant of Venice.tagline: In 16th century Venice, when a merchant must default on a large loan from an abused Jewish moneylender for a friend with romantic ambitions, the bitterly vengeful creditor demands a gruesome payment instead.

Hairspray (new).tagline: Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

Traffic.tagline: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is an addict.

Twelfth Night or What You Will.tagline: Shakespeare's comedy of gender confusion, in which a girl disguises herself as a man to be near the count she adores, only to be pursued by the woman he loves.

3000 Miles to Graceland.tagline: A gang of ex-cons rob a casino during Elvis convention week.

The Mummy Returns.tagline: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

Paycheck.tagline: What seemed like a breezy idea for an engineer to net him millions of dollars, leaves him on the run for his life and piecing together why he's being chased.

The Glimmer Man.tagline: Two cops, played by Seagal and Wayans, are forced to work together to solve a chain of mysterious killings by a killer nicknamed "The Family Man"

The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie.tagline: SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.

Baby Mama.tagline: A successful, single businesswoman who dreams of having a baby discovers she is infertile and hires a working class woman to be her unlikely surrogate.

U-571.tagline: A German submarine is boarded by disguised American submariners trying to capture their Enigma cipher machine.

Catch Me If You Can.tagline: A true story about Frank Abagnale Jr., who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars' worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor.

World Trade Center.tagline: Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.

New Nightmare.tagline: A demonic force has chosen Freddy Krueger as its portal to the real world. Can Heather play the part of Nancy one last time and trap the evil trying to enter our world?

The Bone Collector.tagline: Denzel Washington plays a quadriplegic homicide detective. He and his female partner track down a serial killer.

Made of Honor.tagline: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

Apt Pupil.tagline: A boy blackmails his neighbour after suspecting him to be a Nazi war criminal.

Frailty.tagline: A man confesses to an FBI agent his family's story of how his religious fanatic father's visions lead to a series of murders to destroy supposed "demons."

Lost Highway.tagline: After a bizarre encounter at a party, a jazz saxophonist is framed for the murder of his wife and sent to prison, where he inexplicably morphs into a young mechanic and begins leading a new life.

Simon Birch.tagline: A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.

The Waterboy.tagline: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

Deep Impact.tagline: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

Home Fries.tagline: Pregnant Sally unknowingly falls for the stepson of the deceased father of her baby and has to deal with his homicidal family.

See Spot Run.tagline: A mailman takes care of a dog that, unbeknownst to him, is an FBI drug-sniffing superdog that has escaped from the witness protection program after becoming the target of an assassination.

School for Scoundrels.tagline: A young guy short on luck, enrolls in a class to build confidence to help win over the girl of his dreams, which becomes complicated when his teacher has the same agenda.

Rush Hour.tagline: Two cops team up to get back a kidnapped daughter.

Open Water.tagline: Based on the true story of two scuba divers accidentally stranded in shark infested waters after their tour boat has left.

Revenge of the Nerds.tagline: At a big campus, a group of bullied outcasts and misfits resolve to fight back for their peace and self respect.

Rollerball.tagline: The big thing in 2005 is a violent sport which can have some pretty serious consequences... like dying.

production.name: Morra, Brezner, Steinberg and Tenenbaum Entertainment (MBST)

Sorority Boys.tagline: Three rowdy college students are kicked out of their dorm and dress up in drag to live in the DOG house, where the girls deemed unattractive live.

Speed 2: Cruise Control.tagline: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

Cats & Dogs.tagline: A look at the top-secret, high-tech espionage war going on between cats and dogs, which their human owners are blissfully unaware of.

The Haunted Mansion.tagline: Workaholic realtor Jim Evers, his wife/business partner Sara and their two children are summoned to a mansion. When they discover that the place is haunted, Jim discovers an important lesson about the family he's neglected as they attempt to escape.

Star Trek: Insurrection.tagline: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

The Nutty Professor.tagline: Grossly overweight Prof. Sherman Klump, desperate to lose weight takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

Swept Away.tagline: A snooty socialite is stranded on a Mediterranean island with a communist sailor.

The Borrowers.tagline: A secret family of four-inch people living inside the walls of a house must save their home from an evil real estate developer.

Memoirs of an Invisible Man.tagline: After a freak accident, an invisible yuppie runs for his life from a treacherous CIA official while trying to cope with his new life.

End of the Spear.tagline: Two people come to the end of a spear in order to realize that the divisions between them are not real.

Blood Work.tagline: Still recovering from a heart transplant, a retired FBI profiler returns to service when his own blood analysis offers clues to the identity of a serial killer.

Dear God.tagline: When letters written to God start getting results, and replies, people everywhere are amazed. The Post Office however is annoyed.

Garden State.tagline: A quietly troubled young man returns home for his mother's funeral after being estranged from his family for a decade.

production.name: Kumar Mobiliengesellschaft mbH & Co. Projekt Nr. 2 KG

The Weather Man.tagline: A Chicago weather man, separated from his wife and children, debates whether professional and personal success are mutually exclusive.

John Tucker Must Die.tagline: Three ex-girlfriends of a serial cheater set up their former lover to fall for the new girl in town so they can watch him get his heart broken.

Nim's Island.tagline: A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she's reading.

Larger Than Life.tagline: A motivational speaker discovers that the inheritance his father left for him is in the form of an elephant.

Role Models.tagline: Wild behavior forces a pair of energy drink reps to enroll in a Big Brother program.

A Guy Thing.tagline: A soon-to-be husband wakes up on the morning after his bachelor party in bed with another woman.

Nancy Drew.tagline: Teen detective Nancy Drew accompanies her father on a business trip to Los Angeles, where she happens upon clues to a murder mystery involving a movie star.

Dead Man Walking.tagline: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

Heartbreakers.tagline: A mother and daughter con team seduce and scam wealthy men.

Anna Karenina.tagline: Anna (Marceau) is a wife and mother who has an affair with the handsome Count Vronsky (Bean). Based on the novel by Tolstoy.

Angel Eyes.tagline: A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and a unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems.

The Man.tagline: Special Agent Derrick Vann is a man out to get the man who killed his partner but a case of mistaken identity leads him to Andy Fidler, a salesman with too many questions and a knack of getting in Vanns way.

Batman: Mask of the Phantasm.tagline: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry.tagline: Two straight, single Brooklyn firefighters pretend to be a gay couple in order to receive domestic partner benefits.

Shakedown.tagline: A legal attorney and renegade cop team up to stop a corrupt cop.

The Human Stain.tagline: When a disgraced former college professor has a romance with a mysterious younger woman haunted by her dark twisted past, he is forced to confront a shocking secret about his own life that he has kept secret for 50 years.

Stir of Echoes.tagline: After being hypnotized by his sister in law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around her.

production.name: Global Entertainment Productions GmbH & Company Medien KG

Crazy in Alabama.tagline: An abused wife heads to California to become a movie star while her nephew back in Alabama has to deal with a racially-motivated murder involving a corrupt sheriff.

Patriot Games.tagline: When CIA Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

Inside Man.tagline: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

Undisputed.tagline: When heavyweight champion George 'Iceman' Chambers lands in prison, the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champ.

American Beauty.tagline: Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation for his daughter's attractive friend.

Braveheart.tagline: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, a commoner begins a revolt and leads Scottish warriors against the cruel English tyrant who rules Scotland with an iron fist.

The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas.tagline: In this live-action prequel to the 1994 comedy hit, the Flintstones and the Rubbles go on a trip to Rock Vegas, where Wilma is pursued by playboy Chip Rockefeller.

Robots.tagline: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.

Stanley & Iris.tagline: A struggling widow falls in love with an illiterate short-order cook whom she teaches to read and write in her kitchen each night.

production.name: Boll Kino Beteiligungs GmbH & Co. KG

In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege.tagline: A man named Farmer sets out to rescue his kidnapped wife and avenge the death of his son -- two acts committed by the Krugs, a race of animal-warriors who are controlled by the evil Gallian.

The Shipping News.tagline: An emotionally-beaten man with his young daughter moves to his ancestral home in Newfoundland to reclaim his life.

Frida.tagline: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.

Proof.tagline: The daughter of a brilliant but mentally disturbed mathematician, recently deceased, tries to come to grips with her possible inheritance: his insanity. Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students who wants to search through his papers and her estranged sister who shows up to help settle his affairs.

Bringing Down the House.tagline: When a lonely guy meets a woman on the Internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to be with him, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.

Lady in the Water.tagline: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.

Street Kings.tagline: An undercover cop, disillusioned by the recent murder of his wife, is implicated in the murder of an officer and must struggle to clear himself.

Conan the Destroyer.tagline: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

Iris.tagline: True story of the lifelong romance between novelist Iris Murdoch and her husband John Bayley, from their student days through her battle with Alzheimer's disease.

Delirious.tagline: A soap opera writer gets hit on the head and wakes up as a character in his own show.

Cars.tagline: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

Big Fish.tagline: A son tries to learn more about his dying father by reliving stories and myths he told about his life.

Get Shorty.tagline: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

The Big Bounce.tagline: A small-time con artist and a Hawaiian real estate developer's mischevious, enterprising mistress team up for a potential $200,000 score.

The Spirit.tagline: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

Goodbye Lover.tagline: Ben and Sandra are hot and provocative lovers, but Sandra is unfortunately married to Ben's younger brother Jake, and soon Jake will find out about Ben.

Drowning Mona.tagline: When a woman drives a car into the river to her death, everyone in town becomes a suspect.

Captivity.tagline: A man and a woman awaken to find themselves captured in a cellar. As their kidnapper drives them psychologically mad, the truth about their horrific abduction is revealed.

Speed Racer.tagline: A young driver, Speed Racer, aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.

production.name: Munich Film Partners & Company (MFP) BTC Productions

The Lake House.tagline: A lonely doctor who once occupied an unusual lakeside home begins exchanging love letters with its former resident, a frustrated architect. They must try to unravel the mystery behind their extraordinary romance before it's too late.

Christmas with the Kranks.tagline: With their daughter away, her parents decide to skip Christmas altogether until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate the holidays at the last minute.

Good Bye Lenin!.tagline: In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.

Romancing the Stone.tagline: A romance writer sets off to Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.

Jason Lives: Friday the 13th Part VI.tagline: Tommy Jarvis goes to the graveyard to get rid of Jason Voorhees' body, but he accidentally brings him back to life. Jason wants revenge and Tommy must defeat him once and for all!

The Fighting Temptations.tagline: A New York advertising executive travels to a small Southern town to collect an inheritance but finds he must create a gospel choir and lead it to success before he can collect.

The Legend of Bagger Vance.tagline: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddy.

High School Musical 3: Senior Year.tagline: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

production.name: Province of British Columbia Production Services Tax Credit

Things We Lost in the Fire.tagline: A recent widow invites her husband's troubled best friend to live with her and her two children. As he gradually turns his life around, he helps the family cope and confront their loss.

Bewitched.tagline: Thinking he can overshadow an unknown actress in the part, an egocentric actor unknowingly gets a witch cast in an upcoming television remake of the classic show "Bewitched".

Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil.tagline: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

Supergirl.tagline: After losing a powerful orb, Kara, Superman's cousin, comes to Earth to retrieve it and instead finds herself up against a wicked witch.

Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of t.tagline: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

Spanglish.tagline: A woman and her daughter emigrate from Mexico for a better life in America, where they start working for a family where the patriarch is a newly celebrated chef with an insecure wife.

L.A. Confidential.tagline: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

A Time to Kill.tagline: A young lawyer defends a black man accused of murdering two men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, sparking a rebirth of the KKK.

All the King's Men.tagline: Based on the Robert Penn Warren novel. The life of populist Southerner Willie Stark, a political creature loosely based on Governor Huey Long of Louisiana.

Charly.tagline: Sam Roberts thinks he has all the answers: the purpose of life, the meaning of love, the plan for a perfect future. Until Charly walks into his life.

Clifford's Really Big Movie.tagline: Worried that he costs too much to feed, Clifford runs away to join a carnival act and help win a lifetime supply of Tummy Yummies.

College.tagline: A wild weekend is in store for three high school seniors who visit a local college campus as prospective freshmen.

Me, Myself & Irene.tagline: A nice-guy cop with dissociative identity disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

LiTTLEMAN.tagline: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

Illegal Tender.tagline: When the thugs who killed his father come looking for him, a young Latino man and his mother flee from their home.

Head Over Heels.tagline: A young woman is attracted to a man despite her thinking she's seen him kill someone.

The Boy in the Striped Pajamas.tagline: Set during World War II, a story seen through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a concentration camp, whose forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.

The Unbearable Lightness of Being.tagline: In 1968, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion further disrupts their lives.

War of the Worlds.tagline: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

The Forsaken.tagline: A young man gets embroiled in a war against vampires.

The Fugitive.tagline: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt.

Much Ado About Nothing.tagline: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.

Running with Scissors.tagline: Young Augusten Burroughs absorbs experiences that could make for a shocking memoir: the son of an alcoholic father and an unstable mother, he's handed off to his mother's therapist, Dr. Finch, and spends his adolescent years as a member of Finch's bizarre extended family.

Bogus.tagline: Recently orphaned, a young boy is taken in by his godmother who is shocked to realize that she can see the boy's imaginary friend: a flamboyant, French magician named Bogus.

Ice Age: The Meltdown.tagline: Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the Ice Age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the wooly mammoths.

Premonition.tagline: Depressed housewife learns her husband was killed in a car accident the day previously, awakens the next morning to find him alive and well at home, and then awakens the next day after to a world in which he is still dead.

Beethoven's 2nd.tagline: Beethoven the St. Bernard dog becomes a father, but his girlfriend Missy is dog-napped, and his puppies are in danger of the same fate.

Poltergeist II: The Other Side.tagline: The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.

Kung Fu Panda.tagline: In the Valley of Peace, Po the Panda finds himself chosen as the Dragon Warrior despite the fact that he is obese and a complete novice at martial arts.

Panic Room.tagline: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.

The People vs. Larry Flynt.tagline: A partially idealized film of the controversial pornography publisher and how he became a defender of free speech for all people.

My Best Friend's Wedding.tagline: When a woman's long-time friend says he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself... and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

Squanto: A Warrior's Tale.tagline: Historically inaccurate chronicle of Squanto's life prior to and including the arrival of the "Mayflower" in 1620.

An American Carol.tagline: An anti-American filmmaker who's out to abolish the July Fourth holiday is visited by three ghosts who try to change his perception of the country.

Children of the Corn.tagline: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed.

Me and Orson Welles.tagline: A teenager is cast in the Mercury Theatre production of "Julius Caesar" directed by a young Orson Welles in 1937.

The Curse of the Jade Scorpion.tagline: An insurance investigator and an efficency expert who hate each other are both hypnotized by a crooked hypnotist with a jade scorpion into stealing jewels.

Soul Survivors.tagline: A co-ed is caught between the world of the living and the dead.

Silk.tagline: The story of a married silkworm merchant-turned-smuggler in 19th century France traveling to Japan for his town's supply of silkworms after a disease wipes out their African supply. During his stay in Japan, he becomes obsessed with the concubine of a local baron.

Two Brothers.tagline: Two tigers are separated as cubs and taken into captivity, only to be reunited years later as enemies by an explorer (Pearce) who inadvertently forces them to fight each other.

Shine.tagline: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

Cop.tagline: An obsessive, insubordinate homicide cop is convinced a serial killer is loose in the Hollywood area and disobeys orders in order to catch him.

Ace Ventura: Pet Detective.tagline: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of a missing dolphin mascot of a football team.

Thumbsucker.tagline: Justin throws himself and everyone around him into chaos when he attempts to break free from his addiction to his thumb.

Mary Reilly.tagline: A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Hyde.

The Addams Family.tagline: Con artists plan to fleece the eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long lost Uncle Fester.

Rushmore.tagline: The king of Rushmore prep school is put on academic probation.

The Sea Inside.tagline: The real-life story of Spaniard Ramon Sampedro, who fought a 30 year campaign in favor of euthanasia and his own right to die.

The Tigger Movie.tagline: Tigger goes looking through the hundred-acre-wood to find his family.

Indecent Proposal.tagline: A married woman agrees to have sex with another man for $1,000,000.

The Longest Yard.tagline: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

Stay Alive.tagline: For a group of teens, the answer to the mysterious death of their old friend lies within the world of an online video game based on the true story of an ancient noblewoman known as the Blood Countess.

The Rage: Carrie 2.tagline: A massacre strikes up after an outcast girl is taunted by a group of high school jocks, all of them unaware of her violent, cutthroat psychic power.

The Astronaut Farmer.tagline: A NASA astronaut (Thornton), forced to retire years earlier so he could save his family farm, has never given up his dream of space travel and looks to build his own rocket, despite the government's threats to stop him.

Twilight (new).tagline: A teenage girl risks everything when she falls in love with a vampire.

Billy Elliot.tagline: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

The Natural.tagline: An unknown comes out of seemingly nowhere to become a legendary player with almost divine talent.

The Number 23.tagline: Walter Sparrow becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him. As his obsession increases, more and more similarities seem to arise.

Don Juan DeMarco.tagline: A psychiatrist must cure a young patient that presents himself as Don Juan, the greatest lover in the world.

Congo.tagline: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

Stardust.tagline: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

Meet the Deedles.tagline: Two surfers end up as Yellowstone park rangers and have to stop a former ranger who is out for revenge.

Babe: Pig in the City.tagline: Babe, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest, returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, but after Farmer Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe has to go to the big city to save the farm.

Keeping the Faith.tagline: A story about two friends, a priest and a rabbi, who fall in love with the same beauty (Jenna Elfman).

The Godfather: Part III.tagline: In the midst of trying to legitimize his business dealings in 1979 New York and Italy, aging mafia don Michael Corleone seeks to vow for his sins while taking a young protégé under his wing.

50 First Dates.tagline: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment up until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams, until he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the very next day.

A Nightmare on Elm Street 2: Freddy's Re.tagline: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by Freddy Krueger who is out to possess him to continue his murdering in the real world.

I Got the Hook Up.tagline: Two small time scam artists, Black and Blue, sell boom boxes and broken TVs from their van at the parking lot. When, by mistake, a shipment of cellular phones gets to them, it doesn't take long before FBI and gangsters are after them.

Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome.tagline: A former Australian policeman is rescued by a tribe of children when he is banished from a desert town and sent into the desert to die by the desert town's evil queen.

Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason.tagline: After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything she's dreamed of having.

Seven Years in Tibet.tagline: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

Under the Tuscan Sun.tagline: A writer impulsively buys a villa in Tuscany in order to change her life.

The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause.tagline: Santa, aka Scott Calvin, is faced with double-duty: how to keep his new family happy, and how to stop Jack Frost from taking over Christmas.

Raising Victor Vargas.tagline: A Lower East Side teen-ager struggles to find some sanity while surrounded by an eccentric grandmother, a crazy new girlfriend, and a longing younger brother.

On the Line.tagline: A shy advertising employee meets his dream girl on the El train, but doesn't remember to get her phone number, resulting in an all-out search for the mystery girl

production.name: Kumar Mobiliengesellschaft mbH & Co. Projekt Nr. 1 KG

Final Destination 3.tagline: In this third installment of the Final Destination series, a student's premonition of a deadly rollercoaster ride saves her life and a lucky few, but not from death itself which seeks out those who escaped their fate.

Men in Black II.tagline: Agent J needs help so he is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory.

Cinderella Man.tagline: The story of James Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to become a champion and an inspiration in the 1930s.

The Family Man.tagline: A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife.

City of Angels.tagline: Inspired by the modern classic, Wings of Desire, City involves an angel (Cage) who is spotted by a doctor in an operating room. Franz plays Cage's buddy who somehow knows a lot about angels.

Meet Dave.tagline: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.

Magnolia.tagline: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

We're No Angels.tagline: Two escaped cons only prayer to escape is to pass themselves off as priests and pass by the police blockade at the border into the safety of Canada.

Hilary and Jackie.tagline: The tragic story of world renowned classic cellist Jacqueline du Pré, as told from the point of view of her sister, flautist Hilary du Pré-Finzi.

Glory.tagline: Robert Gould Shaw leads the US Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices of both his own Union army and the Confederates.

Phat Girlz.tagline: Two plus-sized ladies meet the men of their dreams in the most unexpected of ways.

Deep Blue Sea.tagline: Searching for a cure to Alzheimer's disease a group of scientists on an isolated research facility become the bait as a trio of intelligent sharks fight back.

Clear and Present Danger.tagline: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

Pet Sematary.tagline: Behind a young family's home in Maine is a terrible secret that holds the power of life after death. When tragedy strikes, the threat of that power soon becomes undeniable.

Mystery Men.tagline: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

Unfaithful.tagline: A New York suburban couple's marriage goes dangerously awry when the wife indulges in an adulterous fling.

Big Momma's House 2.tagline: On his latest assignment, FBI agent Malcolm Turner goes undercover as Big Momma, and works as a nanny for an unhappy woman who is under investigation for murder.

Goal! The Dream Begins.tagline: Santiago Munez is a footballer in a regional club. He gets scouted and transferred to Newcastle United.

Stealth.tagline: Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.

Cat's Eye.tagline: A stray cat is the linking element of three tales of suspense and horror.

Boys Don't Cry.tagline: Female born, Teena Brandon adopts his male identity of Brandon Teena and attempts to find himself and love in Nebraska.

Bones.tagline: Over 20 years after his death by a gunshot, Jimmy Bones comes back as a ghost to wreak revenge on those who killed him and to clean up his neighborhood.

New Jack City.tagline: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

The Mighty Ducks.tagline: A self-centered lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

Warlock: The Armageddon.tagline: The Son of Satan attempts to bring his father to Earth with the aid of some mystic stones.

Primary Colors.tagline: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for president of the USA.

Mixed Nuts.tagline: The events focus around a crisis hotline business on one crazy night during the Christmas holidays.

Duets.tagline: A professional karaoke hustler reconnects with his daughter and a bored suburban businessman turns outlaw karaoke singer, among other plotlines.

Universal Soldier: The Return.tagline: The "universal soldiers" must fight the whole army. When the military's supercomputer S.E.T.H gets out of control

The Adventures of Rocky & Bullwinkle.tagline: When enemies Boris, Natasha and Fearless leader escape into the real world with a nefarious scheme, Rocky & Bullwinkle do the same and team up with a young F.B.I. agent to stop the trio.

Mr. Brooks.tagline: A psychological thriller about a man who is sometimes controlled by his murder-and-mayhem-loving alter ego.

Quest for Camelot.tagline: An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit and a goofy two headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.

Possession.tagline: A pair of literary sleuths unearth the amorous secret of two Victorian poets only to find themselves falling under a passionate spell.

The Game.tagline: Wealthy San Francisco financier Nicholas Van Orton gets a strange birthday present from wayward brother Conrad: a live-action game that consumes his life.

The Santa Clause 2.tagline: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for nearly ten years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

A Very Long Engagement.tagline: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

The Virgin Suicides.tagline: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents.

Virus.tagline: When the crew of an American tugboat boards an abandoned Russian research vessel, the alien life form aboard regards them as a virus which must be destroyed.

Limbo.tagline: Unconventional narrative about the interactions amongst a group of people in a small town in Alaska, each of whom has guards a secret.

But I'm a Cheerleader.tagline: A naive teenager is sent to rehab camp when her straitlaced parents and friends suspect her of being a lesbian.

Intersection.tagline: Vincent Eastman has to choose between his wife of 16 years, Sally, or his new love, Olivia. Frequent flashbacks explain the background to the marriage and the affair.

Nacho Libre.tagline: Berated all his life by those around him, a monk follows his dream and dons a mask to moonlight as a Luchador (Mexican wrestler).

Paris, je t'aime.tagline: Through the neighborhoods of Paris, love is veiled, revealed, imitated, sucked dry, reinvented and awakened.

The Player.tagline: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected - but which one?

300.tagline: King Leonidas and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

Finding Forrester.tagline: A young writing prodigy finds a mentor in a reclusive author.

The Players Club.tagline: A woman must contend with rival strippers and her boss in an attempt to make a legitimate living.

O.tagline: An update of Shakespeare's 'Othello' with a young cast, set in a high school and centered around basketball player Odin.

The Strangers.tagline: A young couple staying in an isolated vacation home are terrorized by three unknown assailants.

Bulworth.tagline: A suicidally disillusioned liberal politician puts a contract out on himself and takes the opportunity to be bluntly honest with his voters by affecting the rhythms and speech of hip-hop music and culture.

Hard Ball.tagline: An aimless young man who is scalping tickets, gambling and drinking, agrees to coach a Little League team from the Cabrini Green housing project in Chicago as a condition of getting a loan from a friend.

Michael Collins.tagline: Michael Collins plays a crucial role in the establishment of the Irish Free State in the 1920s, but becomes vilified by those hoping to create a completely independent Irish republic.

Memoirs of a Geisha.tagline: Nitta Sayuri reveals how she transcended her fishing-village roots and became one of Japan's most celebrated geisha.

Shadow of the Vampire.tagline: The filming of Nosferatu is hampered by the fact that the star is taking his role far more seriously than what seems humanly possible.

Welcome to the Dollhouse.tagline: Insightful look at an unattractive 7th grader as she struggles to cope with un-attentive parents, snobbish classmates, a smart older brother, an attractive younger sister, and her own insecurities.

Highlander: The Final Dimension.tagline: Deceived that he had won the Prize, Connor MacLeod awakens from a peaceful life when an entombed immortal magician comes seeking the Highlander.

Hostage.tagline: A failed police negotiator turned small town cop, must save the lives of a family held hostage, which draws him into a much more dangerous situation.

Shallow Grave.tagline: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

The Man Who Wasn't There.tagline: A laconic, chain-smoking barber blackmails his wife's boss and lover for money to invest in dry cleaning, but his plan goes terribly wrong.

Duma.tagline: An orphaned cheetah becomes the best friend and pet of a young boy living in South Africa.

10 Things I Hate About You.tagline: A new kid must find a guy to date the meanest girl in school, the older sister of the girl he has a crush on, who cannot date until her older sister does.

Blue Crush.tagline: As a hard-core surfer girl prepares for a big competition, she finds herself falling for a football player.

Elizabethtown.tagline: During an outrageous memorial for a Southern patriarch, an unexpected romance blooms between a young woman and man.

Dangerous Liaisons.tagline: Rich and bored aristocrats in Rococo France play high-stakes games of passion and betrayal.

Hamlet 2.tagline: In this irreverent comedy, a failed actor-turned-worse-high-school-drama-teacher rallies his Tucson, AZ students as he conceives and stages politically incorrect musical sequel to Shakespeare's Hamlet.

City Slickers.tagline: A mid-life crisis plagued man and his friends find renewal and purpose on a cattle driving vacation.

Resurrecting the Champ.tagline: Up-and-coming sports reporter rescues a homeless man ("Champ") only to discover that he is, in fact, a boxing legend believed to have passed away. What begins as an opportunity to resurrect Champ's story and escape the shadow of his father's success becomes a personal journey as the ambitious reporter reexamines his own life and his relationship with his family.

Money Train.tagline: A vengeful New York transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares; his foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

Stealing Harvard.tagline: A middle-class man turns to a life of crime in order to finance his niece's first year at Harvard University.

production.name: Guy Walks into a Bar Productions

Elf.tagline: After inadvertently wreaking havoc on the elf community due to his ungainly size, a man raised as an elf at the North Pole is sent to the U.S. in search of his true identity.

Pollock.tagline: A film about the life and career of the American painter, Jackson Pollock.

The Out-of-Towners.tagline: The remake of the 1970 Neil Simon comedy follows the adventures of a couple, Henry and Nancy Clark, vexed by misfortune while in New York City for a job interview.

Shag.tagline: Summer of 1963. Carson is getting married to her boyfriend so her friends Melaina, Pudge and Luanne take her to Myrtle Beach for one last irresponsible weekend.

Urban Legends: Final Cut.tagline: Urban legend-style killings begin to occur on a movie set, in this non-sequel sequel to "Urban Legend".

Veronica Guerin.tagline: An Irish journalist is assassinated by drug dealers she wrote about in a series of stories.

Deception.tagline: An accountant is introduced to a mysterious sex club known as The List by his lawyer friend. But in this new world, he soon becomes the prime suspect in a woman's disappearance and a multi-million dollar heist.

Cach\u00e9 (Hidden).tagline: A married couple is terrorized by a series of surveillance videotapes left on their front porch.

Van Wilder.tagline: The most popular kid on campus meets a beautiful journalist who makes him realize that maybe he's afraid to graduate.

Sleepwalkers.tagline: A mother-and-son team of strange supernatural creatures come to town to seek out a virgin to feed on.

Nadine.tagline: In 1950s Texas, a woman trying to recover sexy photos of herself and divorce her husband witnesses a murder and uncovers corrupt land dealings.

Payback.tagline: Porter is shot by his wife and best friend and is left to die. When he survives he plots revenge.

White Noise.tagline: An architect's desire to speak with his wife from beyond the grave, becomes an obsession with supernatural repercussions.

Wanted.tagline: A frustrated office worker learns that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

Hart's War.tagline: A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.

Three Kings.tagline: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, 4 soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

Licence to Kill.tagline: A vengeful British spy goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a CIA agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.

Schindler's List.tagline: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Cats Don't Dance.tagline: Danny, an ambitious singing/dancing cat, goes to Hollywood and overcomes several obstacles to fulfill his dream of becoming a movie star.

The Fisher King.tagline: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

Native Son.tagline: In 1940s Chicago, a young black man takes a job as a chauffeur to a white family, which takes a turn for the worse when he accidentally kills the teenage daughter of the couple and then tries to cover it up.

Shall We Dance.tagline: A romantic comedy where a bored, overworked Estate Lawyer, upon first sight of a beautiful instructor, signs up for ballroom dancing lessons.

Bottle Shock.tagline: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris".

Final Destination.tagline: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.
