Richard III.tagline: The classic Shakespearean play about a murderously scheming king staged in an alternative fascist England setting.

Flushed Away.tagline: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.

Tremors.tagline: Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.

Love Actually.tagline: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

Stand by Me.tagline: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

Lars and the Real Girl.tagline: A delusional young guy strikes up an unconventional relationship with a doll he finds on the Internet.

Munich.tagline: Based on the true story of the Black September aftermath, about the five men chosen to eliminate the ones responsible for that fateful day.

Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes M.tagline: A passing boat bound for New York pulls Jason Voorhees along for the ride. Look out New York, here comes hell in a hockey mask.

Bird.tagline: The troubled life and career of the jazz musician, Charlie "Bird" Parker.

Club Dread.tagline: When a serial killer interrupts the fun at the swanky Coconut Pete's Coconut Beach Resort -- a hedonistic island paradise for swingers --- it's up to the club's staff to stop the violence ... or at least hide it!

Woman on Top.tagline: Brazilian chef Isabella Oliveira moves to San Francisco when her husband, frustrated by her motion sickness, cheats on her.

production.name: Jack Rollins & Charles H. Joffe Productions

Hannah and Her Sisters.tagline: Between two Thanksgivings, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

Sky Bandits.tagline: Through a series of circumstances, a pair of Old West gunfighters end up as fighter pilots in World War I.

Laws of Attraction.tagline: Amidst a sea of litigation, two New York City divorce lawyers find love.

The Ring.tagline: A young journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone in a week of viewing it.

Betrayed.tagline: An FBI agent posing as a combine driver becomes romantically involved with a Midwest farmer who lives a double life as a white supremacist.

Blood Diamond.tagline: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

Suicide Kings.tagline: A group of youngsters kidnap a respected Mafia figure.

Monster-in-Law.tagline: The love life of Charlotte is reduced to an endless string of disastrous blind dates, until she meets the perfect man, Kevin. Unfortunately, his merciless mother will do anything to destroy their relationship.

Brother.tagline: A Japanese gangster is exiled to Los Angeles where his brother lives with a small but respectable multi-racial gang, who he inspires to expand their influence.

Loser.tagline: A college student, branded a loser by his roommates and booted from the dorm, falls in love with a coed who has eyes for their condescending professor.

13 Going on 30.tagline: A 13 year old girl plays a game on her 13th birthday and wakes up the next day as a 30 year old woman.

Conspiracy Theory.tagline: A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bo.tagline: #1 NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.

Venus.tagline: Life for a pair of veteran actors gets turned upside down after they meet a brash teenager.

Another 48 Hrs..tagline: Jack Cates once again enlists the aid of ex-con Reggie Hammond--this time, to take down The Iceman, a ruthless drug lord operating in the San Francisco bay area.

Reign Over Me.tagline: A man who lost his family in the September 11 attack on New York City runs into his old college roommate. Rekindling the friendship is the one thing that appears able to help the man recover from his grief.

The Scarlet Letter.tagline: An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.

The River Wild.tagline: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

The World's Fastest Indian.tagline: The life story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years building a 1920 Indian motorcycle -- a bike which helped him set the land-speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind.tagline: A couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories when their relationship turns sour, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

The Time Machine.tagline: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

Memento.tagline: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

The Good Girl.tagline: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.

Connie and Carla.tagline: A mob mix-up in Chicago sends two chanteuses screaming for L.A., where they score a perfect gig: posing as drag queens on the dinner theater/cabaret circuit. Things get extra-weird when a guy falls for one of the girls.

The Nanny Diaries.tagline: A college graduate goes to work as a nanny for a rich New York family. Ensconced in their home, she has to juggle their dysfunction, a new romance, and the spoiled brat in her charge.

Hellraiser: Bloodline.tagline: In the 22nd century, a scientist attempts to right the wrong his ancestor created: the puzzle box that opens the gates of Hell and unleashes Pinhead and his Cenobite legions.

Slumdog Millionaire.tagline: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums, becomes a contestant on the Indian version of "Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?" He is arrested under suspicion of cheating, and while being interrogated, events from his life history are shown which explain why he knows the answers.

Pee-wee's Big Adventure.tagline: When eccentric man-child Pee-Wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.

Willard.tagline: A young man with an unusual connection with rats, uses them at his own sociopathic will.

The Frighteners.tagline: After a tragic car accident that killed his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead to con people but when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.

The Station Agent.tagline: When his only friend dies, a man born with dwarfism moves to rural New Jersey to live a life of solitude, only to meet a chatty hot dog vendor and a woman dealing with her own personal loss.

Donnie Brasco.tagline: An FBI undercover agent infilitrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life to the expense of his regular one.

Proof of Life.tagline: Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.

Monkey Shines.tagline: A quadriplegic man has a trained monkey help him with his paralysis, until the little monkey begins to develop feelings, and rage, against its new master.

Brokeback Mountain.tagline: The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys and their lives over the years.

Babe.tagline: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

Cyborg.tagline: A martial artist hunts a killer in a plague-infested urban dump of the future.

The Net.tagline: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

Last Holiday.tagline: After she's diagnosed with a terminal illness, a shy woman decides to take a European vacation.

Rush Hour 3.tagline: After an attempted assassination on Ambassador Han, Lee and Carter head to Paris to protect a French woman with knowledge of the Triads' secret leaders.

Talk Radio.tagline: A rude, contemptuous talk show host becomes overwhelmed by the hatred that surrounds his program just before it goes national.

The Science of Sleep.tagline: A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is lovestruck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.

Joe Somebody.tagline: When Joe is beat up by a co-worker in front of his daughter on "Bring Your Child To Work Day", he decides to fight back.

A Prairie Home Companion.tagline: A look at what goes on backstage during the last broadcast of America's most celebrated radio show, where singing cowboys Dusty and Lefty, a country music siren, and a host of others hold court.

The Living Daylights.tagline: James Bond is living on the edge to stop an evil arms dealer from starting another world war. Bond crosses all seven continents in order to stop the evil Whitaker and General Koskov.

Redline.tagline: A gorgeous young automobile fanatic--and front to the hottest unsigned band on the West coast--finds herself caught up in illegal drag-racing competitions organized by exotic car fanatics.

Rambo: First Blood Part II.tagline: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

Find Me Guilty.tagline: Based on the true story of Jack DiNorscio, a mobster who defended himself in court for what would be the longest mafia trial in U.S. history.

Sugar & Spice.tagline: A popular high school cheerleader becomes pregnant with the star quarterback's child, only to find herself turning to crime to support the lifestyle she wants to live.

Playing by Heart.tagline: Eleven articulate people work through affairs of the heart in L.A.

Charlie Bartlett.tagline: A rich kid becomes the self-appointed psychiatrist to the student body of his new high school.

Star Trek: Generations.tagline: Captain Picard, with the help of supposedly dead Captain Kirk, must stop a madman willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

Muppets from Space.tagline: Gonzo is contacted by his alien family through his breakfast cereal. He is kidnapped and it's up to Kermit and the gang to rescue Gonzo and help reunite him with his long-lost family.

The Mist.tagline: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

Pleasantville.tagline: Two 1990s teenagers find themselves in a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

Police Academy.tagline: A group of good-hearted but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.

Up Close & Personal.tagline: An ambitious young woman, determined to build a career in TV journalism, gets good advice from her first boss, and they fall in love.

Wild Wild West.tagline: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a 19th century inventor-villain.

Jack Frost.tagline: A father, who can't keep his promises, dies in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman, who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever.

Reservoir Dogs.tagline: After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

The Last Temptation of Christ.tagline: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

The Bucket List.tagline: Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.

A League of Their Own.tagline: Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amidst their own growing rivalry.

Journey from the Fall.tagline: Thirteen years after the end of the Vietnam War, a family who was tragically affected by the war are forced to emigrate to America.

production.name: MMDP Munich Movie Development & Production GmbH & Co. Project KG

The Honeymooners.tagline: Working class New York bus driver Ralph Kramden is always coming up with get-rich-quick schemes for him and his best friend, Ed Norton, who's always around to help him get in (and out of) trouble.

Gorillas in the Mist.tagline: The story of Dian Fossey, a scientist who came to Africa to study the vanishing mountain gorillas, and later fought to protect them.

Narc.tagline: When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.

production.name: Equity Pictures Medienfonds GmbH & Co. KG III

88 Minutes.tagline: On the day that a serial killer that he helped put away is supposed to be executed, a noted forensic psychologist and college professor receives a call informing him that he has 88 minutes left to live.

Femme Fatale.tagline: A woman tries to straighten out her life, even as her past as a con-woman comes back to haunt her.

Timeline.tagline: A group of archaeological students become trapped in the past when they go there to retrieve their professor. The group must survive in 14th century France long enough to be rescued.

The Razor's Edge.tagline: He had everything and wanted nothing. He learned that he had nothing and wanted everything. He saved the world and then it shattered. The path to enlightenment is as sharp and narrow as a razor's edge.

The Transporter.tagline: This film is about a man whose job is to deliver packages without asking any questions. Complications arise when he breaks those rules.

The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor.tagline: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.

You Got Served.tagline: In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends (Omarion, Houston) must first win their city's dance contest -- a fierce competition that pits them against a group of tough street dancers.

Quick Change.tagline: Three thieves successfully rob a New York City bank, but making the escape from the city proves to be almost impossible.

Collateral Damage.tagline: After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.

The 40-Year-Old Virgin.tagline: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never "done the deed" only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

Step Up.tagline: Tyler Gage receives the opportunity of a lifetime after vandalizing a performing arts school, gaining him the chance to earn a scholarship and dance with an up and coming dancer, Nora.

Boomerang.tagline: A successful executive and womanizer finds his lifestyle choices have turned back on him when his new female boss turns out to be an even bigger deviant then he is.

200 Cigarettes.tagline: A collection of twentysomethings try to cope with relationships, loneliness, desire and their individual neuroses.

Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban.tagline: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new "Defense Against the Dark Arts" teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.

Dickie Roberts: Former Child Star.tagline: A thirty-something former child star hires a foster family to re-create the childhood he never had.

Pushing Tin.tagline: A feud develops between two air traffic controllers: one cocky and determined while the other is restrained and laidback, which inevitably affects their lives.

Antz.tagline: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London.tagline: With all-new gadgets, high-flying action, exciting chases and a wisecracking new handler, Derek (Anthony Anderson), Cody has to retrieve the device before the world's leaders fall under the evil control of a diabolical villain.

The Lawnmower Man.tagline: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

Silent Fall.tagline: An autistic boy witnesses his parents' double murder. Richard Dreyfuss as a controversial therapist, seeks to probe the child's mind in order to solve the case.

Just My Luck.tagline: Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

The Cotton Club.tagline: The Cotton Club was a famous night club in Harlem. The story follows the people that visited the club, those that ran it, and is peppered with the Jazz music that made it so famous.

Casper.tagline: A paranormal expert and his daughter bunk in an abandoned house populated by 3 mischievous ghosts and one friendly one.

The Thing Called Love.tagline: A group of newcomers to the country music business seek love and stardom.

The Rock.tagline: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

Babylon A.D..tagline: Veteran-turned-mercenary Toorop takes the high-risk job of escorting a woman from Russia to America. Little does he know that she is host to an organism that a cult wants to harvest in order to produce a genetically modified Messiah.

Child's Play 2.tagline: Chucky's back as the doll possessed by the soul of a serial killer, butchering all who stand in his way of possessing the body of a boy.

Child's Play 3.tagline: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy that defeated him and has since become adult.

Passenger 57.tagline: An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.

Texas Rangers.tagline: A ragtag group of youngsters band together after the American Civil War to form the Texas Rangers, a group charged with the dangerous, ruthless duty of cleaning up the West.

Hustle & Flow.tagline: With help from his friends, a Memphis pimp in a mid-life crisis attempts to become a successful hip-hop emcee.

We Don't Live Here Anymore.tagline: An indiscretion between two close friends tears down their respective marriages.

Stuck on You.tagline: Conjoined twins from Martha's Vineyard move to Los Angeles so that one of them can pursue an acting career.

Murder by Numbers.tagline: Two gifted high school students execute a "perfect" murder - then become engaged in an intellectual contest with a seasoned homicide detective.

Harrison's Flowers.tagline: When a Newsweek photojournalist disappears in war-torn Yugoslavia, his wife travels to Europe to find him.

Pok\u00e9mon 3: The Movie.tagline: The Pokemon master Ash must rescue his mother from the encasement of a crystal tower.

The Break-Up.tagline: In a bid to keep their luxurious condo from their significant other, a couple's break-up proceeds to get uglier and nastier by the moment.

Rocky V.tagline: Reluctantly retired from boxing and back from riches to rags, Rocky takes on a new protege who betrays him; As the champ's son must adjust to his family's new life after bankruptcy.

Showgirls.tagline: A young drifter, named Nomi, arrives in Las Vegas to become a dancer and soon sets about clawing and pushing her way to become the top of the Vegas showgirls.

Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back.tagline: The comic 'Bluntman and Chronic' is based on real-life stoners Jay and Silent Bob, so when they get no profit from a big-screen adaptation they set out to wreck the movie.

Air Force One.tagline: Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he - an ex-soldier - works from hiding to defeat them.

The Usual Suspects.tagline: A boat has been destroyed, criminals are dead, and the key to this mystery lies with the only survivor and his twisted, convoluted story beginning with five career crooks in a seemingly random police lineup.

At Close Range.tagline: In 1978 rural Pennsylvania an absentee father is reacquainted with his estranged teenage sons and they become intrigued with romanticized life of crime.

Body Snatchers.tagline: A teenage girl and her father discover alien clones are replacing humans on a remote U.S. military base in Alabama.

Fled.tagline: Two prisoners chained together flee during an escape attempt gone bad.

Forrest Gump.tagline: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.

The Object of My Affection.tagline: A pregnant New York social worker begins to develop romantic feelings for her gay best friend, and decides she'd rather raise her child with him, much to the dismay of her overbearing boyfriend.

Someone to Watch Over Me.tagline: A married New York cop falls for the socialite murder witness he's been assigned to protect.

City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's.tagline: Shortly after their first western adventure, Mitch Robbins and his friends discover a treasure map that belonged to their late trail guide Curly and set out to discover its secrets.

The Ice Harvest.tagline: A shady lawyer attempts a Christmas Eve crime, hoping to swindle the local mob out of some money. But his partner, a strip club owner, might have different plans for the cash.

Maniac Cop.tagline: In New York City, a man in a cop's uniform starts killing people for no apparent reason.

Titanic.tagline: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat, expecting to be married to a rich claimant by her mother, falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Streets of Fire.tagline: A mercenary goes after his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a gang.

A Sound of Thunder.tagline: When a hunter sent back to the prehistoric era runs off the path he must not leave, he causes a chain reaction that alters history in disastrous ways.

Il Postino: The Postman.tagline: Simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet; he uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

The Abandoned.tagline: An adopted woman returns to her home country and the family home that she never knew and must face the mystery that lies there.

A Fish Called Wanda.tagline: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.

Over Her Dead Body.tagline: A ghost tries to sabotage her former boyfriend's current relationship with a psychic.

Pineapple Express.tagline: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witness his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

Glitter.tagline: A young singer dates a disc jockey who helps her get into the music business, but their relationship become complicated as she ascends to super stardom.

Bio-Dome.tagline: Moronic best friends get themselves locked inside the Bio-Dome, a science experiment, along with a group of environmental scientists for one year.

The Good Thief.tagline: An aging gambler on a losing streak attempts to rob a casino in Monte Carlo. But someone's already tipped off the cops before he even makes a move.

Finding Nemo.tagline: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

The Firm.tagline: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

production.name: LUNI Productions GmbH and Company KG

How the Grinch Stole Christmas.tagline: A creature is intent on stealing Christmas.

Club Fed.tagline: A gangster's girlfriend is framed and sent to a minimum-security prison.

production.name: Equity Pictures Medienfonds GmbH & Co. KG II

The Matador.tagline: A globetrotting hitman and a crestfallen businessman meet in a hotel bar in Mexico City in an encounter that draws them together in a way neither expected.

The Invisible.tagline: After an attack leaves him in limbo -- invisible to the living and also near death -- a teenager discovers the only person who might be able to help him, is his attacker.

Platoon.tagline: A young recruit in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

production.name: Ce Qui Me Meut Motion Pictures

Insomnia.tagline: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

One Eight Seven.tagline: After surviving a brutal attack (Instrument used was a board with nails in it) by a student, teacher Trevor Garfield moves from New York to Los Angeles.

Friends with Money.tagline: After she quits her lucrative job, Olivia finds herself unsure about her future and her relationships with her successful and wealthy friends.

GoldenEye.tagline: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow agent believed to be dead.

Meet Joe Black.tagline: A media mogul acts as a guide to Death, who takes the form of a young man to learn about life on Earth and in the process, fall in love with his guide's daughter.

Meet the Parents.tagline: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

He Got Game.tagline: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

Sixteen Candles.tagline: A young girl's "sweet sixteenth" birthday becomes anything but special as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

Blue Car.tagline: A troubled young woman is encouraged by a teacher to enter a poetry contest.

Miss Potter.tagline: The story of Beatrix Potter, the author of the beloved and best-selling children's book, "The Tale of Peter Rabbit", and her struggle for love, happiness and success.

California Casanova.tagline: Stagehand at a nightclub falls for one of the performers. He wins her heart after taking lessons on suavity from a gigolo "count".

The Simpsons Movie.tagline: After Homer accidentally pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpson family are declared fugitives.

Norbit.tagline: A mild-mannered guy who is engaged to a monstrous woman meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.

The Salton Sea.tagline: After his wife is murdered, a man drifts into a world populated by thugs and speed junkies.

The Incredibly True Adventure of Two Gir.tagline: An adventurous love story between two young women of different social and economic backgrounds who find themselves going through all the typical struggles of a new romance.

Wing Commander.tagline: Blair, a fighter pilot, joins an interstellar war to fight the evil Kilrathi who are trying to destroy the universe.

Outside Providence.tagline: After one too many run ins with the law, a punk teenager from a working class background is sent to prep school by his frustrated dad, and learns a thing or two.

Vanity Fair.tagline: Growing up poor in London, Becky Sharp (Witherspoon) defies her poverty-stricken background and ascends the social ladder alongside her best friend, Amelia.

The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement.tagline: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she's being primed for an arranged marriage to a English suitor.

The Ten.tagline: Ten stories, each inspired by one of the ten commandments.

Bad Boys II.tagline: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstacy into Florida.

Seraphim Falls.tagline: At the end of the Civil War, a colonel hunts down a man with whom he has a grudge.

Man of the House.tagline: A Texas Ranger must protect a group of cheerleaders who have witnessed a murder.

American History X.tagline: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Ba.tagline: Follows the cross-country adventures of the pot-smoking duo as they try to outrun authorities who suspect them of being terrorists when they try to sneak a bong on board their flight to Amsterdam.

Malcolm X.tagline: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam and his assassination.

Once.tagline: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

The Hours.tagline: The story of how the novel "Mrs. Dalloway" affects three generations of women, all of whom, in one way or another, have had to deal with suicide in their lives.

Shaun of the Dead.tagline: A man decides to turn his moribund life around by winning back his ex-girlfriend, reconciling his relationship with his mother, and dealing with an entire community that has returned from the dead to eat the living.

American Gangster.tagline: In 1970s America, a detective works to bring down the drug empire of Frank Lucas, a heroin kingpin from Manhattan, who is smuggling the drug into the country from the Far East.

The Legend of Zorro.tagline: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) -- and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) -- to take action.

Scary Movie 4.tagline: Cindy finds out the house she lives in is haunted by a little boy and goes on a quest to find out who killed him and why. Also, Alien "Tr-iPods" are invading the world and she has to uncover the secret in order to stop them.

Freejack.tagline: Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race-car driver to 2009 New York, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.

Biloxi Blues.tagline: A group of young recruits go through boot camp during the Second World War in Biloxi Mississippi. From the play by Neil Simon.

Gone Baby Gone.tagline: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally. Based on the Dennis Lehane novel.

Aladdin.tagline: Aladdin, a street urchin, accidentally meets Princess Jasmine, who is in the city undercover. They love each other, but she can only marry a prince.

Spider-Man.tagline: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

The Promotion.tagline: Two assistant managers of a corporate grocery store vie for a coveted promotion.

The Pick-up Artist.tagline: A womanizer meets his match when he falls for a woman in debt to the mafia.

Kangaroo Jack.tagline: Two childhood friends, a New York hairstylist and a would-be musician, get caught up with the mob and are forced to deliver $50,000 to Australia, but things go haywire when the money is lost to a wild kangaroo.

Superstar.tagline: A nerdy Catholic schoolgirl, Mary Katherine Gallagher, dreams of superstardom.

Bright Lights, Big City.tagline: A disillusioned young writer living in New York City turns to drugs and drinking to block out the memories of his dead mother and estranged wife.

Ocean's Thirteen.tagline: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist, after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

Godzilla.tagline: A enormous, radioactively mutated lizard runs rampant on the island of Manhattan.

The Bourne Identity.tagline: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and without memory, then races to elude assassins and recover from amnesia.

Monster's Ball.tagline: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard reexamines his attitudes while falling in love with the African American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

The Last King of Scotland.tagline: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s

Mississippi Burning.tagline: Two FBI agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

The Pursuit of Happyness.tagline: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional endeavor.

Brideshead Revisited.tagline: A poignant story of forbidden love and the loss of innocence set in England prior to the Second World War.

P2.tagline: A businesswoman is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a parking garage on Christmas Eve.

Basic Instinct 2.tagline: Novelist Catherine Tramell is once again in trouble with the law, and Scotland Yard appoints psychiatrist Dr. Michael Glass to evaluate her. Though, like Detective Nick Curran before him, Glass is entranced by Tramell and lured into a seductive game.

The Matrix Revolutions.tagline: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.

The Little Vampire.tagline: A lonely boy becomes best friends with a vampire.

Death Wish 4: The Crackdown.tagline: Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey takes on the members of a vicious Los Angeles drug cartel to stop the flow of drugs after his girlfriend's daughter dies from an overdose.

Happy Feet.tagline: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

The Hotel New Hampshire.tagline: The film talks about a family that weathers all sorts of disasters and keeps going in spite of it all. It is noted for its wonderful assortment of oddball characters.

Smoke.tagline: A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.

Vanilla Sky.tagline: A successful publisher finds his life taking a turn for the surreal after a car accident with a jaded lover.

The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants.tagline: Four best girlfriends hatch a plan to stay connected with one another as their lives start off in different directions: they pass around a pair of secondhand jeans that fits each of their bodies perfectly.

Digimon: The Movie.tagline: Three different stories involving digital creatures collide together.

Doug's 1st Movie.tagline: Doug and his pal Skeeter set's out to find the monster of Lucky Duck Lake. Though things get really out of hand when some one blurts out that the monster is real.

Brewster's Millions.tagline: A minor-league baseball player has to spend $30,000,000 in thirty days in order to inherit $300,000,000. However, he's not allowed to tell anyone about the deal.

What Dreams May Come.tagline: After dying in a car crash a man searches the afterlife for his wife.

Dick Tracy.tagline: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

The Color of Money.tagline: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

The Hunt for Red October.tagline: In 1984, the USSR's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect, or to start a war?

The Reader.tagline: Post-WWII Germany: Nearly a decade after his affair with an older woman came to a mysterious end, law student Michael Berg re-encounters his former lover as she defends herself in a war-crime trial.

The Constant Gardener.tagline: A widower is determined to get to the bottom of a potentially explosive secret involving his wife's murder, big business, and corporate corruption.

Kiss of Death.tagline: A reformed convict goes undercover with the help of an angry detective to ensnare a psychotic mobster.

Novocaine.tagline: A dentist finds himself a murder suspect after a sexy patient seduces him into prescribing her drugs.

Looking for Comedy in the Muslim World.tagline: To improve its relations with Muslim countries, the United States government sends comedian Albert Brooks to south Asia to write a report on what makes followers of Islam laugh.

Return to Me.tagline: A man who falls in love with the woman who received his wife's heart must decide which woman it is who holds his heart.

Six Degrees of Separation.tagline: An affluent New York couple find their lives touched, intruded upon, and compelled by a mysterious young black man who is never quite who he says he is.

House of 1000 Corpses.tagline: Two teenage couples traveling across the backwoods of Texas searching for urban legends of murder end up as prisoners of a bizarre and sadistic backwater family of serial killers.

Brick.tagline: A teenage loner pushes his way into the underworld of a high school crime ring to investigate the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend.

The Iron Giant.tagline: A boy makes friends with an innocent alien giant robot that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

Rocky Balboa.tagline: Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement to step into the ring for the last time and face the heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

As Good as It Gets.tagline: A single mother/waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is in an accident.

Young Sherlock Holmes.tagline: When assorted people start having inexplicable delusions that lead to their deaths, a teenage Sherlock Holmes decides to investigate.

The Dark Knight.tagline: When Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent launch an assault on the mob, they let the clown out of the box, the Joker, bent on turning Gotham on itself and bringing any heroes down to his level.

The Abyss.tagline: A civilian diving team are enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

Guinevere.tagline: A young girl from an affluent family rebels and becomes involved with a much older photographer.

The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.tagline: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

Mr. Magoo.tagline: The myopic millionaire defeats jewel smugglers in his usual bumbling manner.

Blue Velvet.tagline: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of criminals who have kidnapped her child.

Derailed.tagline: When two married business executives having an affair are blackmailed by a violent criminal, the two must turn the tables on him to save their families.

Dan in Real Life.tagline: A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend.

The Joy Luck Club.tagline: The life histories of four Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

Tales from the Crypt: Demon Knight.tagline: A man on the run is hunted by a demon known as the Collector.

Zathura: A Space Adventure.tagline: Two young brothers are drawn into an inter-galactic adventure when their house is magically hurled through space by the board game they are playing.

Ghost Rider.tagline: Stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze gives up his soul to become a hellblazing vigilante, to fight against power hungry Blackheart, the son of the devil himself.

Flightplan.tagline: A claustrophobic, Hitchcockian thriller. A bereaved woman and her daughter are flying home from Berlin to America. At 30,000 feet the child vanishes and nobody admits she was ever on that plane.

Medicine Man.tagline: The movie speaks to the value of preserving the rain forest for the preservation of our diversity of life. Gorgeous scenery! It is worth watching just for it's pure beauty.

I'm Not There..tagline: Ruminations on the life of Bob Dylan, where six characters embody a different aspect of the musician's life and work.

Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country.tagline: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

Halloween.tagline: After being committed for 17 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution (where he was committed as a 10 year old) and he immediately returns to Haddonfield, where he wants to find his baby sister, Laurie. Anyone who crosses his path is in mortal danger.

Pulse.tagline: When their computer hacker friend accidentally channels a mysterious wireless signal, a group of co-eds rally to stop a terrifying evil from taking over the world.

Die Hard 2.tagline: John McClane, officer of the NYPD and hero of the Nakatomi Hostage Crisis, attempts to avert disaster as rogue military officials seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

Mighty Aphrodite.tagline: When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a prostitute.

Dazed and Confused.tagline: The adventures of incoming high school and junior high students on the last day of school, in May of 1976.

The Rugrats Movie.tagline: Tommy, Angelica, Chuckie, Phil and Lil get lost while on vacation and must find their way home.

The Children of Huang Shi.tagline: About young British journalist, George Hogg, who with the assistance of a courageous Australian nurse, saves a group of orphaned children during the Japanese occupation of China in 1937.

The Spanish Prisoner.tagline: An employee of a corporation with a lucrative secret process is tempted to betray it. But there's more to it than that.

The Dangerous Lives of Altar Boys.tagline: A group of Catholic school friends, after being caught drawing an obscene comic book, plan a heist that will outdo their previous prank and make them local legends.

Teacher's Pet.tagline: Spot (Lane) is a dog who can talk and read. Posing as a human, he sneaks into school with his master Leonard (Flemming). Educational adventures ensue.

production.name: Canadian Film or Video Production Tax Credit (CPTC)

Dr. Seuss' The Cat in the Hat.tagline: Sally and Conrad are two bored kids whose life is turned up-side-down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

Get Rich or Die Tryin'.tagline: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.

Manhattan Murder Mystery.tagline: A middle-aged couple suspects foul play when their neighbor's wife suddenly drops dead.

A Simple Plan.tagline: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.

Me and You and Everyone We Know.tagline: A lonely shoe salesman and an eccentric performance artist struggle to connect in this unique take on contemporary life.

Cocoon: The Return.tagline: The old age pensioners that left at the end of the first film come back to earth to visit their relatives. Will they all decide to go back to the planet where no-one grows old, or will they be tempted to stay back on earth?

The Curious Case of Benjamin Button.tagline: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with bizarre consequences.

Young Adam.tagline: A young drifter working on a river barge disrupts his employers' lives while hiding the fact that he knows more about a dead woman found in the river than he admits.

Nowhere in Africa.tagline: A German Jewish refugee family moves to and adjusts to a farm life in 1930's Kenya.

Major League.tagline: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

City Heat.tagline: A slick private eye and tough police lieutenant--once partners, now bitter enemies--reluctantly team up to investigate a murder.

The Ruins.tagline: A group of friends whose leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse when they, along with a fellow tourist embark on a remote archaeological dig in the jungle, where something evil lives among the ruins.

The Invasion.tagline: As a Washington psychiatrist unearths the origin of an alien epidemic, she also discovers her son might be the only way it can be stopped.

production.name: Mediastream Vierte Film GmbH & Co. Vermarktungs KG

I, Robot.tagline: In the year 2035 a techno-phobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

Lone Star.tagline: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

Enemy of the State.tagline: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

Boyz n the Hood.tagline: Saga of a group of childhood friends growing up in a Los Angeles ghetto.

Secret Window.tagline: A writer is accused for plagiarism by a strange man, who then starts haunting him for "justice."

The Village.tagline: The population of a small, isolated countryside village believe that their alliance with the mysterious creatures that inhabit the forest around them is coming to an end.

Redbelt.tagline: A fateful event leads to a job in the film business for top mixed-martial arts instructor Mike Terry. Though he refuses to participate in prize bouts, circumstances conspire to force him to consider entering such a competition.

U Turn.tagline: A young punk drifter heading to Vegas to pay off his gambling debt before the Russian mafia kills him, is forced to stop in a Arizona town where everything that can go wrong, does go wrong for him.

The Baader Meinhof Complex.tagline: A look at Germany's terrorist group, The Red Army Faction (RAF), which organized bombings, robberies, kidnappings and assassinations in the late 1960s and '70s.

About Schmidt.tagline: A man upon retirement embarks on a journey to his estranged daughter's wedding only to discover more about himself and life than he ever expected.

Drugstore Cowboy.tagline: A realistic road movie about a drug addict, his 'family', and their inevitable decline into crime.

Choke.tagline: A sex-addicted con-man pays for his mother's hospital bills by playing on the sympathies of those who rescue him from choking to death.

Trees Lounge.tagline: Tommy is an unemployed mechanic who spends most of his time in a bar (Trees Lounge) in a small blue collar town. He seems to always be thinking, "If only X then I could stop drinking".

Entrapment.tagline: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

The Last Castle.tagline: A court-martialed general rallies together 1200 inmates to rise against the corrupt system that put him away.

production.name: MHF Erste Academy Film GmbH & Co. Produktions KG

Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever.tagline: Tasked with destroying each other, an FBI agent and a rogue DIA agent soon discover that there's a much bigger enemy at work.

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 2. Produktions KG

The Quiet American.tagline: An older British reporter vies with a young U.S. doctor for the affections of a beautiful Vietnamese woman.

The Brothers Solomon.tagline: A pair of well-meaning, but socially inept brothers try to find their perfect mates in order to provide their dying father with a grandchild.

River's Edge.tagline: A high school slacker kills his girlfriend and shows off her dead body to his friends. However, the friends' reaction is almost as ambiguous and perplexing as the crime itself.

Look Who's Talking.tagline: After a single, career-minded woman is left on her own to give birth to the child of a married man, she finds a new romantic chance in a cab driver. Meanwhile the point-of-view of the newborn boy is narrated through voice over.

Jerry Maguire.tagline: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent with the only athlete who stays with him.

Slums of Beverly Hills.tagline: This semiautobiographical story follows a lower-middle-class teenager (Lyonne) and her neurotic family in 1976 Tinseltown.

Dead Heat.tagline: Two cops are brought back to life to chase down supernatural criminals.

Terminator 2: Judgment Day.tagline: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John, from a more advanced cyborg, made out of liquid metal.

Pride & Prejudice.tagline: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

Buffy the Vampire Slayer.tagline: A flighty teenage girl learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

Creepshow 2.tagline: Three more bone-chilling tales that include a vengeful wooden Native American, a monstrous blob in a lake, and a hitchhiker who wants revenge and will not die.

The Wedding Banquet.tagline: To satisfy his nagging parents, a gay landlord and a female tenant agree to a marriage of convenience, but his parents arrive to visit and things get out of hand.

Faithful.tagline: A depressed housewife whose husband is having an affair contemplates suicide, but changes her mind when she faces death by a killer hired to do her in.

The Kingdom.tagline: A team of U.S. government agents is sent to investigate the bombing of an American facility in the Middle East.

Swing Vote.tagline: In a remarkable turn-of-events, the result of the presidential election comes down to one man's vote.

Kalifornia.tagline: A journalist duo go on a tour of serial killer murder sites with two companions, unaware that one of them is a serial killer himself.

The History Boys.tagline: An unruly class of gifted and charming teenage boys are taught by two eccentric and innovative teachers, as their headmaster pushes for them all to get accepted into Oxford or Cambridge.

The Pelican Brief.tagline: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

The Wedding Date.tagline: Single-girl anxiety causes Kat Ellis (Messing) to hire a male escort (Mulroney) to pose as her boyfriend at her sister's wedding. Her plan, an attempt to dupe her ex-fiancé, who dumped her a couple years prior, proves to be her undoing.

The Pink Panther.tagline: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.

Beloved.tagline: Based on the book by Toni Morrison, in which a slave is visited by the spirit of her deceased daughter.

Rugrats Go Wild.tagline: The Rugrats get tangled in an exotic adventure, where they're helped by the Thornberrys, a family that travels the world making nature documentaries.

Snake Eyes.tagline: A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.

Patch Adams.tagline: A medical student in the 70's treats patients, illegally, using humor.

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III.tagline: The turtles find themselves transported back in time to ancient Japan.

The Princess Diaries.tagline: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her 15th year.

The New World.tagline: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.

The Avengers.tagline: Two British agents (John Steed and Emma Peel) team up to stop Sir August De Wynter from destroying the world with a weather changing machine.

The Man in the Iron Mask.tagline: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother who he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

Scream.tagline: A killer known as Ghostface begins killing off teenagers, and as the body count begins rising, one girl and her friends find themselves contemplating the "Rules" of horror films as they find themselves living in a real-life one.

We Are Marshall.tagline: When a plane crash claims the lives of members of the Marshall University football team and some of its fans, the team's new coach and his surviving players try to keep the football program alive.

The Count of Monte Cristo.tagline: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friends," escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge

Orange County.tagline: A guidance counselor mistakenly sends out the wrong transcripts to Stanford University under the name of an over-achieving high schooler.

production.name: Global Entertainment Productions GmbH & Company Medien KG

Hollow Man.tagline: Scientists discover how to make people invisible, but their test subject becomes an insane killer who stalks them.

Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate.tagline: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

Full Frontal.tagline: A day in the life of a group of men and women in Hollywood, in the hours leading up to a friend's birthday party.

Paradise Road.tagline: Fact-based recounting of a group of women who are imprisoned on the island of Sumatra by the Japanese during World War II and used music as a relief to their misery.

In the Name of the Father.tagline: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

Thank You for Smoking.tagline: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his twelve-year-old son.

Swimfan.tagline: A high school senior with a promising swimming career has a one-night stand with consequences.

Cellular.tagline: A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped; and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.

Volcano.tagline: A volcano erupts in downtown L.A., threatening to destroy the city.

Cassandra's Dream.tagline: The tale of two brothers with serious financial woes. When a third party proposes they turn to crime, things go bad and the two become enemies.

Everyone Says I Love You.tagline: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a shaky marriage while her half sister gets engaged.

Flatliners.tagline: Medical students bring themselves near death; their experiment begins to go awry.

Bugsy.tagline: The story of how Bugsy Siegel started Las Vegas.

The Wraith.tagline: Jamie, killed by neighborhood thugs, returns as a mystical figure named Jake (The Wraith) to gain revenge.

Beverly Hills Cop.tagline: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

The Santa Clause.tagline: When a man inadvertantly kills Santa on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

Children of the Corn II: The Final Sacri.tagline: A journalist and his son travel to Nebraska to investigate the mysterious town of Gaitlin where, unbeknownst to them, a murderous cult of children are waiting in the corn fields.

After Hours.tagline: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho whom he met that evening at a coffee shop.

Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas.tagline: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

Gossip.tagline: Three college students chose a class project on Gossip and how fast it spreads, which spirals out of control.

Corpse Bride.tagline: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

In Bruges.tagline: Guilt-stricken after a job gone wrong, hitman Ray and his partner await orders from their ruthless boss in Bruges, Belgium, the last place in the world Ray wants to be.

Austin Powers in Goldmember.tagline: Upon learning that his father has been kidnapped, Austin Powers must travel to 1975 and defeat the aptly-named villain Goldmember - who is working with Dr. Evil.

My Blueberry Nights.tagline: A young woman takes a soul-searching journey across America to resolve her questions about love while encountering a series of offbeat characters along the way.

Kiss of the Dragon.tagline: A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.

Undiscovered.tagline: A group of aspiring entertainers try to establish careers for themselves in the city of Los Angeles.

Duplex.tagline: A young couple has a chance to move into a gorgeous duplex in the perfect New York neighborhood. All they have to do is bump off the current tenant, a cute little old lady.

The Rainmaker.tagline: An idealistic young lawyer and his cynical partner take on a powerful law firm representing a corrupt insurance company.

Mad Money.tagline: Three female employees of the Federal Reserve plot to steal money that is about to be destroyed.

Walk the Line.tagline: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis and Carl Perkins.

The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen.tagline: In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, SF and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.

Cliffhanger.tagline: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

Cloverfield.tagline: Revolves around a monster attack in New York as told from the point of view of a small group of people.

Eve of Destruction.tagline: A terrorist hunter is hired by a scientist to deactivate her android double, a walking, talking, murderous nuclear bomb which has gone amok in the big city and is about to explode.

Freedom Writers.tagline: A young teacher inspires her class of at-risk students to learn tolerance, apply themselves, and pursue education beyond high school.

Bride of the Wind.tagline: This movie is a biopic of Alma Mahler, the wife of composer Gustav Mahler (as well as Walter Gropius and Franz Werfel), and the mistress of Oskar Kokoschka.

Seabiscuit.tagline: True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.

Starship Troopers.tagline: Humans in a fascistic, militaristic future do battle with giant alien bugs in a fight for survival.

Stepmom.tagline: A terminally-ill mother has to settle on the new woman in her ex-husband's life, who will be their new stepmother.

War.tagline: An FBI Agent seeks vengeance on a mysterious assassin known as "Rogue" who murdered his partner.

Hey Arnold! The Movie.tagline: A fourth grader and his best friend set out to stop an industrialist from bulldozing their town.

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 2. Produktions KG

K-PAX.tagline: Prot is a patient at a mental hospital who claims to be from a far away Planet. His psychiatrist tries to help him, only to begin to doubt his own explanations.

Jeepers Creepers II.tagline: Set a few days after the original, a championship basketball team's bus is attacked by The Creeper, the winged, flesh-eating terror, on the last day of his 23-day feeding frenzy.

Heaven.tagline: A woman takes the law into her own hands after police ignore her pleas to arrest the man responsible for her husband's death, and finds herself not only under arrest for murder but falling in love with an officer.

Slither.tagline: A small town is taken over by an alien plague, turning residents into zombies and all forms of mutant monsters.

The Wrestler.tagline: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

The Newton Boys.tagline: The story of the Newton gang, the most successful bank robbers in history, thanks to their good planning and minimal violence.

Scoop.tagline: An American journalism student in London scoops a big story, and begins an affair with an aristocrat as the incident unfurls.

Three to Tango.tagline: A rich businessman's assumption that his new colleague is gay leads him to ask the man to keep an eye on his mistress. However, the man is not gay, and begins to fall for the woman himself.

Near Dark.tagline: A young man reluctantly joins a travelling "family" of evil vampires, when the girl he'd tried to seduce is part of that group.

The Eye.tagline: A woman receives an eye transplant that allows her to see into the supernatural world. Remake of the Hong Kong film "Jian Gui".

Tin Cup.tagline: A washed up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the US Open in order to win the heart of his succesful rival's girlfriend.

Igor.tagline: Animated fable about a cliché hunchbacked evil scientist's assistant who aspires to become a scientist himself, much to the displeasure of the rest of the evil science community.

Whatever It Takes (new).tagline: A modern-day remake of the Cyrano DeBergerac tale.

One Hour Photo.tagline: An employee of a one-hour photo lab becomes obsessed with a young suburban family.

The Prophecy.tagline: The angel Gabriel comes to Earth to collect a soul which will end the stalemated war in Heaven, and only a former priest and a little girl can stop him.

Being Julia.tagline: Set in '30s London, the film involves stage actors and their experiences with love and revenge.

Moscow on the Hudson.tagline: When a Russian musician defects in Bloomingdale's department store in New York, he finds adjusting to American life more difficult than he imagined.

Planet of the Apes.tagline: An Air Force astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

Book of Shadows: Blair Witch 2.tagline: College students at a Boston college become fascinated by the events of the three missing filmmakers in Maryland, so they decide to go into the same woods and find out what really happened.

Sleeping with the Enemy.tagline: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

Transsiberian.tagline: A Trans-Siberian train journey from China to Moscow becomes a thrilling chase of deception and murder when an American couple encounters a mysterious pair of fellow travelers.

A Walk to Remember.tagline: The story of two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, who are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is made to do community service.

Pinocchio.tagline: Despite guidance from the Blue Fairy and the love of his father, a wooden puppet's curious spirit leads him into one wild adventure after another.

Rescue Dawn.tagline: A US Fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War.

Raising Arizona.tagline: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintupelets, their lives get more complicated than they anticipated.

Down in the Valley.tagline: Set in the present-day San Fernando Valley, the project revolves around a delusional man who believes he's a cowboy and the relationship that he starts with a rebellious young woman.

Zero Effect.tagline: The world's greatest detective Daryl Zero aided by his associate Steve Arlo investigates a complex and mysterious case of blackmail and missing keys for shady tycoon Gregory Stark who is less than forthcoming about what is really happening!

Tank Girl.tagline: Based on the British cult comic-strip, our tank-riding anti-heroine fights a mega-corporation, which controls the world's water supply.

Gods and Generals.tagline: The rise and fall of legendary war hero Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson as he leads the Confederacy to great success against the Union from 1861 to 1863. Prequel to the 1993 classic "Gettysburg".

South Central.tagline: A man is sent to prison for 10 years. Coming out of prison he wants to live a normal life and stop crime but his son has now followed the criminal path of his father.

Wyatt Earp.tagline: Wyatt Earp is a movie about a man and his family. The movie shows us the good times and the bad times of one of the West's most famous individuals.

Gattaca.tagline: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

Training Day.tagline: On his first day on the job as a narcotics officer, a rookie cop goes on a 24-hour training course with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears.

Iron Monkey.tagline: A martial artist/doctor steals from the corrupt authorities as a masked thief to give to the poor while another martial artist/doctor is forced to hunt him down. But a major threat unites them as a powerful and traitorous shaolin monk takes over the authorities.

Die Hard.tagline: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save wife Holly Gennaro and several others, taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

Slackers.tagline: When geek Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the exam system, he blackmails them to win over the college's most popular girl.

Beerfest.tagline: Two brothers travel to Germany for Oktoberfest, only to stumble upon a secret, centuries-old competition described as a "Fight Club" with beer games.

Mr. Woodcock.tagline: Taken aback by his mother's wedding announcement, a young man returns home in an effort to stop her from marrying his old high school gym teacher, a man who made high school hell for generations of students.

Hostel: Part II.tagline: Three American college students studying abroad are lured to a Slovakian hostel, and discover the grim reality behind it.

Flawless (new).tagline: Set in 1960 London, where a soon to retire caretaker convinces a glass-ceiling constrained American executive to help him steal a handful of diamonds from their employer, the London Diamond Corporation.

Miss Congeniality.tagline: An FBI agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

Bad Boys.tagline: Two hip detectives protect a murder witness while investigating a case of stolen heroin.

Anastasia.tagline: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family hooks up with two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

Employee of the Month.tagline: A slacker competes with a repeat winner for the "Employee of the Month" title at work, in order to gain the affections of a new female employee.

Men of Honor.tagline: The story of Carl Brashear, the first African American, then also the first amputee, US Navy Diver and the man who trained him.

Pretty Woman.tagline: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

The Rules of Attraction.tagline: The incredibly spoiled and overprivileged students of Camden College are a backdrop for an unusual love triangle between a drug dealer, a virgin and a bisexual classmate.

House of Sand and Fog.tagline: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her home's new owners.

Angels in the Outfield.tagline: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

Kingdom of Heaven.tagline: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

Gettysburg.tagline: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

Alive.tagline: Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.

The Shape of Things.tagline: Quiet, unassuming Adam is changing in a major way, thanks to his new girlfriend, art student Evelyn. Adam's friends are a little freaked by the transformation.

Point Break.tagline: An FBI agent goes undercover to catch a gang of bank robbers who may be surfers.

Saints and Soldiers.tagline: Four American soldiers and one Brit fighting in Europe during World War II struggle to return to Allied territory after being separated from U.S. forces during the historic Malmedy Massacre.

Bolt.tagline: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels.tagline: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

I.Q..tagline: Albert Einstein helps a young man who's in love with Einstein's niece to catch her attention by pretending temporarily to be a great physicist.

Escape from L.A..tagline: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

Daddy Day Care.tagline: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

The Last Days of Disco.tagline: Story of two female Manhattan book editors fresh out of college, both finding love and themselves while frequenting the local disco.

Against All Odds.tagline: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

View from the Top.tagline: A small-town woman tries to achieve her goal of becoming a flight attendant.

40 Days and 40 Nights.tagline: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

Wimbledon.tagline: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

Coyote Ugly.tagline: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

Everything Is Illuminated.tagline: A young Jewish American man endeavors to find the woman who saved his grandfather during World War II in a Ukrainian village, that was ultimately razed by the Nazis, with the help of an eccentric local.

Save the Last Dance.tagline: A white midwestern girl moves to Chicago, where her new boyfriend is a black teen from the South Side with a rough, semi-criminal past.

Sunshine.tagline: A team of international astronauts are sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying Sun with a nuclear fission bomb in 2057.

Courage Under Fire.tagline: A US Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

Fathers' Day.tagline: A woman cons two old boyfriends into searching for her runaway son by convincing both that they are the boy's father.

Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire.tagline: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

The Deep End.tagline: A woman spirals out of control while trying to keep her son from being found culpable in a murder investigation.

Runaway Jury.tagline: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

Casino.tagline: Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two mobster best friends and a trophy wife over a gambling empire.

The Ninth Gate.tagline: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

Mrs Henderson Presents.tagline: Laura Henderson buys an old London theater and opens it up as the Windmill, a performance hall which goes down in history for, among other things, its all-nude revues.

She's All That.tagline: A high school jock makes a bet that he can turn an unattractive girl into the school's prom queen.

The Brother from Another Planet.tagline: A mute alien with the appearance of a black human is chased by outer-space bounty hunters through the streets of Harlem.

The English Patient.tagline: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

Resident Evil: Extinction.tagline: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.

Air America.tagline: A young pilot finds himself recruited into a covert and corrupt CIA airlift organization operating in Vietnam War Era Laos.

Kiss or Kill.tagline: After a robbery scam that goes bad, lovers Nikki and Al take off into the Australian outback, pursued by the police and a malevolent footballer named Zipper Doyle, and meet a number of offbeat characters.

Clockers.tagline: Young drug pushers in the projects of Brooklyn live hard dangerous lives, trapped between their drug bosses and the detectives out to stop them.

City of Industry.tagline: A retired thief swears revenge on the lunatic who murdered his brother and partner, while going on the run with the loot they stole.

production.name: MFP Munich Film Partners GmbH & Company I. Produktions KG

School of Rock.tagline: A wannabe rock star in need of cash poses as a substitute teacher at a prep school, and tries to turn his class into a rock band.

Better Luck Tomorrow.tagline: A group of over-achieving Asian-American high school seniors enjoy a power trip when they dip into extra-curricular criminal activities.

The Untouchables.tagline: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

Kung Fu Hustle.tagline: In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

'Til There Was You.tagline: Two strangers, whose paths are always crossing, finally meet when fate steps in.
